doc.field: <description type="note">Preliminaries, introductory and editorial matter including notes and glossary omitted.</description>

VOL. I ORMULUM. Square brackets denote editorial insertions or emendations. DEDICATION. Nu, broþerr Wallterr, broþerr min Affterr þe flæshess kinde; & broþerr min i Crisstenndom Þurrh fulluhht & þurrh trowwþe; & broþerr min i Godess hus, ?ét o þe þride wise, Þurrh þatt witt hafenn takenn ba An re?hellboc to foll?henn, Unnderr kanunnkess had & lif, Swa summ Sannt Awwstin sette; Icc hafe don swa summ þu badd, & forþedd te þin wille, Icc hafe wennd inntill Ennglissh Goddspelless hall?he láre, Affterr þatt little witt þatt me Min Drihhtin hafeþþ lenedd. Þu þohhtesst tatt itt mihhte wel Till mikell frame turrnenn, ?iff Ennglissh follc, forr lufe off Crist, Itt wollde ?erne lernenn, & foll?henn itt, & fillenn itt Wiþþ þohht, wiþþ word, wiþþ dede. & forrþi ?errndesst tu þatt icc Þiss werrc þe shollde wirrkenn; & icc itt hafe forþedd te, Acc all þurrh Cristess hellpe; & unnc birrþ baþe þannkenn Crist Þatt itt iss brohht till ende. Icc hafe sammnedd o þiss boc Þa Goddspelless neh alle, Þatt sinndenn o þe messeboc Inn all þe ?er att messe. & a?? affterr þe Goddspell stannt Þatt tatt te Goddspell meneþþ, Þatt mann birrþ spellenn to þe follc Off þe??re sawle nede; & ?ét tær tekenn mare inoh Þu shallt tæronne findenn, Off þatt tatt Cristess hall?he þed Birrþ trowwenn wel & foll?henn. Icc hafe sett her o þiss boc Amang Goddspelless wordess, All þurrh me sellfenn, mani? word Þe ríme swa to fillenn; Acc þu shallt findenn þatt min word, E??whær þær itt iss ekedd, Ma?? hellpenn þa þatt redenn itt To sen & tunnderrstanndenn All þess te bettre, hu þe??m birrþ Þe Goddspell unnderrstanndenn; & forrþi trowwe icc þatt te birrþ Wel þolenn mine wordess, E??whær þær þu shallt findenn hemm Amang Goddspelless wordess. Forr whase mót to læwedd follc Larspell off Goddspell tellenn, He mót wel ekenn mani? word Amang Goddspelless wordess. & icc ne mihhte nohht min ferrs A?? wiþþ Goddspelless wordess Wel fillenn all, & all forrþi Shollde icc wel offte nede Amang Goddspelless wordess don Min word, min ferrs to fillenn. & te bitæche icc off þiss boc, Heh wikenn alls itt semeþþ, All to þurrhsekenn illc an ferrs, & to þurrhlokenn offte, Þatt upponn all þiss boc ne be Nan word ?æn Cristess lare, Nan word tatt swiþe wel ne be To trowwenn & to foll?henn. Witt shulenn tredenn unnderrfót & all þwerrt út forrwerrpenn Þe dom off all þatt laþe flocc, Þatt iss þurrh niþ forrblendedd, Þatt tæleþþ þatt to lofenn iss, Þurrh niþfull modi?nesse. Þe?? shulenn l?tenn hæþeli? Off unnkerr swinnc, lef broþerr; & all þe?? shulenn takenn itt Onn unnitt & onn idell; Acc nohht þurrh skill, acc all þurrh niþ, & all þurrh þe??re sinne. & unnc birrþ biddenn Godd tatt he Forr?ife hemm h?re sinne; & unnc birrþ baþe lofenn Godd Off þatt itt wass bigunnenn, & þannkenn Godd tatt itt iss brohht Till ende, þurrh hiss hellpe; Forr itt ma?? hellpenn alle þa Þatt bliþelike itt herenn, & lufenn itt, & foll?henn itt Wiþþ þohht, wiþþ word, wiþþ dede. & whase wilenn shall þiss boc Efft oþerr siþe writenn, Himm bidde icc þatt hét wríte rihht, Swa summ þiss boc himm tæcheþþ, All þwerrt út affterr þatt itt iss Uppo þiss firrste bisne, Wiþþ all swillc ríme alls her iss sett, Wiþþ all se fele wordess; & tatt he loke wel þatt he An bocstaff wríte twi??ess, E??whær þær itt uppo þiss boc Iss wr?tenn o þatt wise. Loke he well þatt hét write swa, Forr he ne ma?? nohht elless Onn Ennglissh wríttenn rihht te word, Þatt wite he wel to soþe. & ?iff mann wile w?tenn whi Icc hafe don þiss dede, Whi icc till Ennglissh hafe wennd Goddspelless hall?he lare; Icc hafe itt don forrþi þatt all Crisstene follkess berrhless Iss lang uppo þatt an, þatt te?? Goddspelless hall?he lare Wiþþ fulle mahhte foll?he rihht Þurrh þohht, þurrh word, þurrh dede. Forr all þatt æfre onn erþe iss ned Crisstene follc to foll?henn I trowwþe, i dede, all tæcheþþ hemm Goddspelless hall?he lare. & forrþi whase lerneþþ itt & foll?heþþ itt wiþþ dede, He shall onn ende wurrþi ben Þurrh Godd to wurrþenn borr?henn. & tærfore hafe icc turrnedd itt Inntill Ennglisshe spæche, Forr þatt I wollde bliþeli? Þatt all Ennglisshe lede Wiþþ ære shollde lisstenn itt, Wiþþ herrte shollde itt trowwenn, Wiþþ tunge shollde spellenn itt, Wiþþ dede shollde itt foll?henn, To winnenn unnderr Crisstenndom Att Godd soþ sawle berrhless. & ?iff þe?? wilenn herenn itt, & foll?henn itt wiþþ dede, Icc hafe hemm hollpenn unnderr Crist To winnenn þe??re berrhless. & I shall hafenn forr min swinnc God læn att Godd onn ende, ?iff þatt I, forr þe lufe off Godd & forr þe mede off heffne, Hemm hafe itt inntill Ennglissh wennd Forr þe??re sawle nede. & ?iff þe?? all forrwerrpenn itt, Itt turrneþþ hemm till sinne, & I shall hafenn addledd me Þe Laferrd Cristess are, Þurrh þatt icc hafe hemm wrohht tiss boc To þe??re sawle nede, Þohh þatt te?? all forrwerrpenn itt Þurrh þe??re modi?nesse. Goddspell onn Ennglissh nemmnedd iss God word, & god tiþennde, God errnde, forrþi þatt itt wass Þurrh hall?he Goddspellwrihhtess All wrohht & wr?tenn uppo boc Off Cristess firste come, Off hu soþ Godd wass wurrþenn mann Forr all mannkinne nede, & off þatt mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Wass lesedd út off helle, & off þatt he wisslike ras Þe þridde da?? off dæþe, & off þatt he wisslike stah Þa siþþenn upp till heffne, & off þatt he shall cumenn efft To demenn alle þede, & forr to ?eldenn iwhillc mann Affterr hiss a?henn dede. Off all þiss god uss brinngeþþ word & errnde & god tiþennde Goddspell, & forrþi ma?? itt wel God errnde ben ?ehatenn. Forr mann ma?? uppo Goddspellboc Godnessess findenn seffne Þatt ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Uss hafeþþ don onn erþe, Þurrh þatt he comm to manne, & þurrh Þatt he warrþ mann onn erþe. Forr an godnesse uss hafeþþ don Þe Laferrd Crist onn erþe, Þurrh þatt he comm to wurrþenn mann Forr all mannkinne nede. Oþerr godnesse uss hafeþþ don Þe Laferrd Crist onn erþe, Þurrh þatt he wass i flumm Jorrdan Fullhtnedd forr ure nede; Forr þatt he wollde uss waterrkinn Till ure fulluhht hall?henn, Þurrh þatt he wollde ben himm sellf Onn erþe i waterr fullhtnedd. Þe þridde god uss hafeþþ don Þe Laferrd Crist onn erþe, Þurrh þatt he ?aff hiss a?henn lif Wiþþ all hiss fulle wille, To þolenn dæþþ o rodetre Sacclæs wiþþutenn wrihhte, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh his dæþ Út off þe defless walde. Þe ferþe god uss hafeþþ don Þe Laferrd Crist onn erþe, Þurrh þatt hiss hall?he sawle stah Fra rode dun till helle, To t?kenn út off helle wa Þa gode sawless alle, Þatt haffdenn cwemmd himm i þiss lif Þurrh soþ unnshaþi?nesse. Þe fifte god uss hafeþþ don Þe Laferrd Crist onn erþe, Þurrh þatt he ras forr ure god Þe þridde da?? off dæþe, & lét te posstless sen himm wel Inn hiss mennisske kinde; Forr þatt he wollde fesstnenn swa Soþ trowwþe i þe??re brestess Off þatt he, wiss to fulle soþ, Wass risenn upp off dæþe, & i þatt illke flæsh þatt wass Forr uss o rode na??ledd; Forr þatt he wollde fesstnenn wel Þiss trowwþe i þe??re brestess, He let te posstless sen himm wel Well offte siþe onn erþe, Wiþþinnenn da??ess fowwerrti? Fra þatt he ras off dæþe. Þe sexte god uss hafeþþ don Þe Laferrd Crist onn erþe, Þurrh þatt he stah forr ure god Upp inntill heffness blisse, & sennde siþþenn Hali? Gast Till hise Lerninngcnihhtess, To frofrenn & to beldenn hemm To stanndenn ?æn þe defell, To gifenn hemm god witt inoh Off all hiss hall?he lare, To gifenn hemm god lusst, god mahht, To þolenn alle wawenn, All forr þe lufe off Godd, & nohht Forr erþli? loff to winnenn. Þe seffnde god uss shall ?ét don Þe Laferrd Crist onn ende, Þurrh þatt he shall o Domess da?? Uss gifenn heffness blisse, ?iff þatt we shulenn wurrþi ben To findenn Godess are. Þuss hafeþþ ure Laferrd Crist Uss don godnessess seffne, Þurrh þatt tatt he to manne comm, To wurrþenn mann onn erþe. & o þatt hall?he boc þatt iss Apokalypsis nemmnedd Uss wrát te posstell Sannt Johan, Þurrh Hali? Gastess lare, Þatt he sahh upp inn heffne an boc Bisett wiþþ seffne innse??less, & sperrd swa swiþe wel þatt itt Ne mihhte nan wihht oppnenn, Wiþþutenn Godess hall?he Lamb Þatt he sahh ec inn heffne. & þurrh þa seffne innse??less wass Rihht swiþe wel bitacnedd Þatt sefennfald godle??c þatt Crist Uss dide þurrh hiss come; & tatt nan wihht ne mihhte nohht Oppnenn þa seffne innse??less, Wiþþutenn Godess Lamb, þatt comm, Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn Þatt nan wihht, nan enngell, nan mann, Ne naness kinness shaffte, Ne mihhte þurrh himm sellfenn þa Seffne godnessess shæwenn O mannkinn, swa þatt itt mannkinn Off helle mihhte lesenn, Ne gifenn mannkinn lusst, ne mahht, To winnenn heffness blisse. & all all swa se Godess Lamb, All þurrh hiss a?henn mahhte, Lihhtlike mihhte & wel inoh Þa seffne innse??less oppnenn, All swa þe Laferrd Jesu Crist, All þurrh his a?henn mahhte, Wiþþ Faderr & wiþþ Hali? Gast An Godd & all an kinde, All swa rihht he lihhtlike inoh & wel wiþþ alle mihhte O mannkinn þurrh himm sellfenn þa Seffne godnessess shæwenn, Swa þatt he mannkinn wel inoh Off helle mihhte lesenn, & gifenn mannkinn lufe & lusst, & mahht & witt & wille, To stanndenn inn to cwemenn Godd, To w?nenn heffness blisse. & forr þatt hali? Goddspellboc All þiss godnesse uss shæweþþ, Þiss sefennfald godle??c þatt Crist Uss dide þurrh hiss are, Forrþi birrþ all Crisstene follc Goddspelless lare foll?henn. & tærfore hafe icc turrnedd itt Inntill Ennglisshe spæche, Forr þatt I wollde bliþeli? Þatt all Ennglisshe lede Wiþþ ære shollde lisstenn itt, Wiþþ herrte shollde itt trowwenn, Wiþþ tunge shollde spellenn itt, Wiþþ dede shollde itt foll?henn, To winnenn unnderr Crisstenndom Att Crist soþ sawle berrhless. & Godd Allmahhti? ?ife uss mahht & lusst & witt & wille, To foll?henn þiss Ennglisshe boc Þatt all iss hali? lare, Swa þatt we motenn wurrþi ben To brukenn heffness blisse. Am[æn]. Am[æn]. Am[æn]; Icc þatt tiss Ennglissh hafe sett Ennglisshe menn to lare, Icc wass þær þær I crisstnedd wass Orrmin bi name nemmnedd. & icc Orrmin full innwarrdli? Wiþþ muþ & ec wiþþ herrte Her bidde þa Crisstene menn, Þatt herenn oþerr rédenn Þiss boc, hemm bidde icc her þatt te?? Forr me þiss bede biddenn, Þatt broþerr þatt tiss Ennglissh writt Allræresst wrát & wrohhte, Þatt broþerr forr hiss swinnc to læn Soþ blisse móte findenn. Am[æn]. Þa Goddspelless alle þatt icc Her o þiss boc ma?? findenn, Hemm alle wile icc nemmnenn her Bi þe??re firrste wordess. & t?le wile icc settenn to, To don ?uw tunnderrstanndenn, Hu féle sinndenn o þiss boc Goddspelless unnderr alle. PREFACE. Þiss boc iss nemmnedd Orrmulum Forrþi þatt Orrm itt wrohhte, & itt iss wrohht off quaþþrigan, Off Goddspellbokess fowwre; Off quaþþrigan Amminadab, Off Cristess Goddspellbokess. Forr Crist ma?? þurrh Amminadab Rihht full wel ben bitacnedd; Forr Crist toc dæþ o rodetre All wiþþ hiss fulle wille. & forrþi þatt Amminadab O Latin spæche iss nemmnedd O Latin boc Spontaneus, & onn Ennglisshe spæche Þatt weppmann þatt summ dede doþ Wiþþ all hiss fulle wille, Forrþi ma?? Crist full wel ben þurrh Amminadab bitacnedd; Forr Crist toc dæþ o rodetre All wiþþ hiss fulle wille. Þatt wa??n iss nemmnedd quaþþrigan Þatt hafeþþ fowwre wheless; & Goddspell iss þatt wa??n, forrþi Þatt itt iss fowwre bokess; & Goddspell iss Jesusess wa??n Þatt gaþ o fowwre wheless, Forrþi þatt itt iss sett o boc Þurrh fowwre Goddspellwrihhtess. & Jesuss iss Amminadab, Swa summ icc hafe shæwedd, Forr þatt he swallt o rodetre All wiþþ hiss fulle wille. & Goddspell forr þatt illke þing Iss Currus Salomoniss, Forr þatt itt i þiss middellærd, Þurrh Goddspellwrihhtess fowwre, Wa??neþþ soþ Crist fra land to land Þurrh Cristess Lerninngcnihhtess, Þurrh þatt te?? i þiss middellærd Flittenn & farenn wide, Fra land to land, fra burrh to burrh, To spellenn to þe lede Off soþ Crist & off Crisstenndom, & off þe rihhte læfe, & off þatt lif þatt ledeþþ menn Upp inntill heffness blisse. Þurrh swillc þe?? berenn Hælennd Crist Alls iff þe?? karrte wærenn Off wheless fowwre, forr þatt all Goddspelless hall?he lare Iss—alls icc hafe shæwedd ?uw, O fowwre Goddspellbokess. & forrþi ma?? Goddspell full wel Ben Sálemanness karrte, Þiss iss to seggenn opennli? Þe Laferrd Cristess karrte. Forr Jesu Crist Allmahhti? Godd, Þatt alle shaffte wrohhte, Iss wiss þatt soþe Salemann Þatt sette griþþ onn erþe Bitwenenn Godd & menn, þurrh þatt He ?aff hiss lif o rode, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe defless walde. & forrþi ma?? soþ Crist ben wel Þurrh Salemann bitacnedd, Forr Salomon iss onn Ennglissh Þatt mann þatt soþ sahhtnesse & trigg & trowwe griþþ & friþþ Re??seþþ bitwenenn lede, & foll?heþþ itt wiþþ all hiss mahht, Þurrh þohht, þurrh word, þurrh dede. All þuss iss þatt hall?he Goddspell, Þatt iss o fowwre bokess, Nemmnedd Amminadabess wa??n & Salemanness karrte; Forr þatt itt wa??neþþ Crist till menn Þurrh fowwre Goddspellwrihhtess, Rihht alls iff itt wære þatt wa??n Þatt gaþ o fowwre wheless. & tuss iss Crist Amminadab Þurrh gastli? witt ?ehatenn, Forr þatt he toc o rode daeþ Wiþþ all hiss fulle wille. & Salomon he nemmnedd iss, Swa summ icc hafe shæwedd, Forr þatt he sette griþþ & friþþ Bitwenenn heffne & erþe, Bitwenenn Godd & menn, þurrh þatt Þatt he toc dæþ o rode, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe defless walde. & all þuss þiss Ennglisshe boc Iss Orrmulum ?ehatenn, Inn quaþþrígan Amminadab, Inn Currum Salomonis. & off Goddspell icc w?le ?uw ?ét summ del mare shæwenn; ?ét wile icc shæwenn ?uw forrwhi Goddspell iss Goddspell nemmnedd. & ec icc wile shæwenn ?uw Hu mikell sawle sellþe & sawle berrhless unnderrfoþ Att Goddspell all þatt lede, Þatt foll?heþþ Goddspell þwerrt út wel Þurrh þohht, þurrh word, þurrh dede. All mannkinn, fra þatt Adam wass Þurrh Drihhtin wrohht off eorþe, Anán till þatt itt cumenn wass Till Cristess dæþ o rode, All fór till helle forr þatt gillt Þatt Adam haffde gilltedd, Þurrh þatt he Godess b?deword Forrlét forr lítell nede. Forr wel he mihhte lokenn himm, ?iff þatt he wollde himm lokenn, Fra þatt anl?pi? treo þatt himm Drihhtin forrbodenn haffde, Þær þær he fand off oþre treos Full gode treos ino?he. & forrþi þatt he bracc onn?æn Drihhtin all hise þannkess, Forrþi wass mikell wræche sett Onn?æn þatt woh wiþþ rihhte. Forr þatt wass mikell wræche wiss Þatt all follc fór till helle, To ben á butenn ende þær Forr áness manness gillte. & itt wass þohh full mikell rihht, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Þatt all follc wass forrgillt, þurrh þatt Þatt Adam wass forrgilltedd. Forr all follc wass þatt illke streon Þatt Adam haffde strenedd, & all follc wass forrþi forrgillt Þær Adam wass forrgilltedd. Adam wass wurrþenn deofless þeoww Þurrh þatt he díde hiss wille, & all þatt streonedd wass þurrh himm Wass streonedd to þatt illke, To ben unnderr deofless þeowwdom, To farenn all till helle. & tatt wass rihht tatt mannkinn wass Unnderr þe deofless walde, All swa summ Adam wurrþenn wass, Þatt haffde hemm alle streonedd, & all se iss her bitwenenn þe & tin eorþlike laferrd; Forr all swa summ þu þeowwtesst himm, Swa shall þin sune himm þeowwtenn, Butt iff he wurrþe lesedd út Off hiss þeowwdomess bandess. Nu mihht tu sen þatt tatt wass rihht Þatt mannkinn fór till helle, All affterr þatt tatt Adam for, Þatt haffde hemm alle streonedd; & alle forenn all forrþi Till helless þeossterrnesse, ?a þa þatt wærenn gode menn, ?a þa þatt wærenn ille. Þær wærenn f?le gode menn Biforenn Cristess come, Þatt cwemmdenn Godd þurrh hali? lif, & þurrh unnshaþi?nesse, & tohh ne mihhte nani? mann Þurrh hise gode dedess Útbresstenn off þe deofless band, & út off helle walde. Acc son se tíme comm þærto Þatt Godd itt wollde betenn, Godd ræw off mann, & tatt forrþi Þatt he wass wrohht off eorþe. Off all þatt enngleflocc þatt fell Off heoffness ærd till helle Ne ræw himm nohht, swa þatt he þe??m Fra píne wollde lesenn; Forrþi þatt te?? ne gilltenn nohht Þurrh flæshess unntrummnesse, Acc þurrh þatt laþe modi?le??c Þatt comm all off hemm sellfenn, Forrþi ne ræw himm nohht off hemm, Ne nohht off here píne; Acc Drihhtin ræw off mann, forrþi Þatt he wass wrohht off eorþe. & son se tíme comm þærto Þatt Godd uss wollde lesenn Út off þe laþe gastess band, Út off þe deofless walde, He sennde uss sone hiss word, hiss witt, Hiss Sune, hiss mahht, hiss kinde, To takenn ure mennisscle??c, To wurrþenn mann onn eorþe, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe deofless walde. Acc ?uw birrþ unnderrstanndenn her Þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste Wass borenn i þiss middellærd Þurrh Godess lefe wille, To cumenn forþ bitwenenn menn, To spellenn & to fullhtnenn Biforenn Crist Allmahhti? Godd, To ?arrkenn hise we??ess. Rihht swa summ bidell birrþ ben sennd, To ?arrkenn & to gre??þenn Onn?æn hiss laferrd tær þær he Shall cumenn swiþe newenn, Rihht o þatt wise comm Johan Biforenn Cristess come, To ?arrkenn follc onn?æness Crist, To takenn wiþþ hiss lare. & her icc wile shæwenn ?uw Hu Sannt Johan Bapptisste Wass sennd þurrh Godd biforenn Crist, To ?arrkenn Cristess we??ess; HOMILIES. SECUNDUM LUCAM I. Fuit in diebus Herodis Regis Judee sacerdos quidam nomine Zacharias. An preost wass onn Herodess da?? Amang Judisskenn þeode, & he wass, wiss to fulle soþ, ?ehatenn Zacarí?e, & haffde an duhhti? wif, þatt wass Off Aaroness dohhtress; & ?ho wass, wiss to fulle soþ, Elysabæþ ?ehatenn. & te?? wærenn biforenn Godd Rihhtwise menn & gode. menn, Þatt wærenn hæfedd prestess & allderrmenn & hirdess off Þa fowwre & twennti? gengess Þatt wærenn prestess, Drihhtin Godd To þewwtenn wukemalumm, Off þa twa s?þe twellfe menn Wass an Abyas nemmnedd Oþþr Abyud, & inn hiss hird Wass Zakaryass fundenn, & off hiss kinn an hali? hirdess Todæledd haffde þane o twa, To settenn twe??enn hirdess, An hird tatt off Eleazár Wass sprungenn & was strenedd, An oþerr þatt off Ytamár Wass strenedd her to manne. & e??þerr hird & e??þerr hus Todæledd wass þohhwheþþre Onn hirdess rihht sextene, & ec Onn hirdess twi??ess fowwre. & tatt hird tatt todæledd wass Onn hirdess rihht sextene, All þatt hird off Eleazar Wass strenedd her to manne; & tatt, forr þatt Eleazar Sextene suness haffde, & off illc an serlepess wass An hird to manne strenedd. & tatt hird tatt todæledd wass Onn hirdess twi??ess fowwre, All þatt hird wass þurrh Ytamar To manne onn erþe strenedd; & tatt, forrþi þatt Ytamar Rihht ehhte suness haffde, & off illc an serlepess wass An hird to manne strenedd; & ta sextene þatt Ele- -azar her haffde strenedd, Þa hirdess þatt, witt tu full wel, Haffdenn an hird onn hæfedd, Haffdenn an hæfedd hird tatt wass Abufenn alle þoþre, Alls iff itt wære laferrdflocc Offr alle þoþre flockess. & tatt tatt swa wass hæfedd hird, Þatt hird wass i þatt time Nemmnedd Eleazaress hus, Eleazaress hewenn. & all se itt fór onn oþerr hallf Inn Ytamaress chilldre. Forr Ytamaress hird wass ec Þatt illke wise dæledd Onn hirdess ehhte, se??þ þe boc, & haffde an hird onn hæfedd, & haffde an hæfedd hird tatt wass Abufenn alle þoþre, Alls iff itt wære laferrdflocc Offr alle þoþre flokkess. & tatt tatt swa wass hæfedd hird, Þatt hird wass i þatt time ?ehatenn Ytamaress hus, & Ytamaress hewenn. & illc an hird wass nemmnedd a?? Bi name, inn all þatt time, Affterr summ aþell mann & god Þatt i þatt hird wass hæfedd. & illc an hird wel wisste inoh Whillc lott badd hise prestess I Godess temmple serrfenn Godd. & a?? comm Zacaryas Unnderr þehhtennde lott wiþþ lac To þewwtenn i þe temmple. & o þatt illke wise comm A?? dækenn affterr dækenn, All affterr þatt his lott himm fell To þewwtenn i þe temmple. Þatt Godess enngell Gabriæl Comm dun o Godess hallfe I Godess hus, wiþþ Godess word, O rihht hallf bi þatt allterr Þær Zacarías, Godess preost Wiþþ recless þeowwtenn shollde, Þatt wass full wel, forr itt wass don All all se Drihhtin wollde. Forr he comm dun wiþþ Godess word, To kiþenn itt onn eorþe, Þatt Cristess bidell Sannt Johan Þa shollde cumenn newenn Innto þiss lif biforenn Crist, To ?arrkenn hise we??ess Biforenn himm þatt shollde ben Hæfedd off alle preostess, & offringlac rihht god inoh Affterr hiss Faderr wille, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe deofless walde, Swa þatt mann mihhte winnenn her To brukenn eche blisse, Þatt e??whær upponn hali? boc Iss þurrh rihht hallf bitacnedd. & forrþi shulenn alle þa Þatt shulenn habbenn blisse Tosamenn stanndenn att te dom O rihht hallf bi þe Deme, Bi Jesu Crist o Domes da?? Þær he shall all follc demenn; Forrþi þatt hemm þurrh þatt rihht hallf Shall ben full wel bitacnedd, Þatt hemm beþ ?arrkedd þurrh Drihhtin To brukenn eche blisse; & son se Zacari?e sahh Þatt enngless brihhte leome, He warrþ forrfæredd & forrdredd, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ. & Godess enngell toc himm þær To beldenn & to frofrenn. Forr ure wrecche kinde iss swillc Þatt itt ma?? ben forrfæredd, ?iff þatt itt ohht fælike seþ Þe wl?te off ennglekinde. & Godess enngell iss full meoc, & milde, & soffte, & bliþe, To beldenn & to frofrenn þe, ?iff he þe seþ forrgloppnedd. Acc deofell iss, þatt witt tu wel, Off grimme & niþfull herrte; Forr ?iff he seþ þatt mann iss ohht Forrfæredd off hiss sihhþe, He w?le himm færenn, ?iff he ma??, & skerrenn máre & máre. Acc whas itt iss þatt wæpnedd iss Wiþþ fulle trowwþe o Criste, Þohh þatt he se þe laþe gast, Niss he rihht nohht forrfæredd. Þatt Godess enngell Gabriæl Till Zacarí?e se??de, Witt tu þatt Drihhtin hafeþþ herrd & ?atedd tine beness, & tatt tin wif Elysabæþ Þe shall an sune childenn, Þatt se??de he ful iwiss forrþi Þatt ta wass cumenn tíme Þatt Drihhtin wollde lesenn út Hiss follc off deofless walde, Þatt Zacariass Godess preost, & oþre gode preostess, & mani? hali? læwedd mann O Drihhtin haffde bonedd. Forr alle þa þatt cwemmdenn Godd Biforenn Cristess come, Þe?? alle bædenn innwarrdli? Forr att te come off Sannt Johan Bigann all ure blisse, All þatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Comm till mannkinn onn eorþe, & bohhte þurrh hiss a?hen dæþ Mannkinn fra deofless walde. Þærfore se??de ?ho þiss word Till Gabriæl hehenngell, Hu ma?? þiss forþedd ben þurrh me Þatt nan weppmann ne cnawe? Forr þiss wass se??d alls iff ?ho þuss Wiþþ oþre wordess se??de, Whatt gate ma?? ícc berenn child, Ícc-þatt wel hafe fesstnedd I míne þohhtess þatt I nan Weppmann ne wile cnawenn? Icc hafe fesstnedd i min þohht To libbenn i clænnesse, Swa þatt icc,—?iff þatt itt ma?? ben, Nan macche nile cnawenn; & nát I nohht hu þatt ma?? ben, Þatt I ma?? ben wiþþ childe I min ma??þhad, i clene bedd, Wiþþutenn macchess mæne; & bliþelike I wollde sen & witenn þurrh þe sellfenn, Whatt gate þiss ma?? ben þatt tu O Godess hallfe kiþesst. & Godess enngell Gabriæl ?aff hire anndswere & se??de; Þu best wiþþ childe off Hali? Gast, & best tohh ma??denn clene. & ?ho toc wel wiþþ Godess word To wurrþenn swa wiþþ childe, Þatt ?ho þohhwheþþre shollde ben Ma??denn all þwerrt út clene. & ?ho wharrþ þa wiþþ childe swa All affterr Godess wille; & nisste itt nan lifisshe mann Þatt ?ho wass swa wiþþ childe; Forr ?ho ne se??de itt nani? mann, Ne Godess enngell nowwþerr; Forr þatt itt shollde wurrþenn wel Forrholenn wiþþ þe defell, Þatt Godess sune shollde ben Her borenn o þatt wise. & hire wambe siþþenn toc To waxenn alls itt birrde, & ?hót forrhall wiþþ alle menn Wiþþ sibbe & wiþþ unnsibbe. & ?ho wass siþþenn affterr þatt Brohht ham till hire macche. & he warrþ sone siþþenn warr, Son se he sahh hire wambe, Þatt ?ho wass waxenn summ del gr?t, & tatt ?ho wass wiþþ childe, & wollde forrþrihht hire himm fra All stillelike shædenn. & Godess enngell comm himm to Onn uhhtenn þær he sleppte, & se??de himm þatt hiss macche wass Off Hali? Gast wiþþ childe, & badd himm ben full milde & mec, To lefftenn & to lutenn Þatt clene ma?? þatt shollde ben Allmahhti? Godess moderr. & ?ho þa siþþenn se??de himm wel, All hu ?ho fesstnedd haffde Inn hire þohht all hire lif To ledenn i clænnesse; & he warrþ þa þurrh hire bun To libbenn i clænnesse; & baþe leddenn i ma??þhad All þe??re lif till ende. & tohh wass heh & soþ weddlac Haldenn onn e??þerr hallfe, Forr e??þerr wass wiþþ oþerr mec & god att alle nede. & all wass mænelike þing Whatt littless se þe?? haffdenn; & all onn ane wise fell Till e??þerr þe??ress herrte, All þatt tatt owwþerr h?re comm Off sellþe & off unnsellþe. & forrþi wass bitwenenn hemm Weddlac rihht full wel haldenn, Þohh þatt te?? leddenn here lif I ma??þhad all till ende. Nu habbe icc shæwedd ?uw summ del Off ure laffdi? Mar?e, Hu ?ho wass wurrþenn þurrh Drihhtin Off Hali? Gast wiþþ childe. Forr ?ho wass all Drihhtin bitahht Wiþþ bodi? & wiþþ sawle; Forr ?ho wass, wiss to fulle soþ, All full off hall?he mahhtess, Off herrsummle??c, off rihhtwisle??c, & off soþfasst meocnesse, Off soþ clænle??c, off god ?æple??c, Off strenncþe, off mettfasstnesse, Off soþfasst lufe, off soþfasst þild, Off rihhtwis swinncfullnesse. Þatt ?ho wass rædi? tunnderrgan Drihhtiness will to foll?henn, Þatt wass,—þatt witt tu fuliwiss, Fullfremedd herrsummnesse; & itt wass ec soþ rihhtwisle??c, Forr þatt iss rihht onn eorþe, Þatt mannkinn be till Drihhtin Godd Herrsumm onn alle wise. & soþ meocle??c wass opennli? Inn hire anndswere shæwedd, Þurrh þatt ?ho se??de þatt ?ho wass Ammbohht Drihhtin to þeowwtenn. Þatt ?ho wass full off soþ clænle??c, Þatt ma?? mann unnderrstanndenn, Þurrh þatt tatt Drihhtin hire chæs All wimmannkinn bitwenenn, To wurrþenn filledd all þweorrt út I bodi? & i sawle Off Godess Gastess hall?he mahht, To wurrþenn Godess moderr. Þær wass full sene þatt ?ho wass All full off soþ clænnesse, Forr Drihhtin shuneþþ alle þa Þatt unnclænnesse foll?henn. & ?ho wass full off god ?æple??c, & tatt wass full wel sene, Þær ?ho toc onn full aldeli? To fra??nenn Godess enngell, All hu ?ho shollde berenn child Wiþþutenn macchess mæne, ?ho, þatt ne wollde næfre ben Þurrh were o life filedd. & ?ho wass full off strenncþe & mahht, To stanndenn ?æn þe deofell; Forr ?ho tradd deofell unnderrfót Þwerrt út onn alle wise; Forr nass nan wimmann borenn her Biforenn hire o life, Ne nan ne wass whil þatt ?ho wass Bitwenenn menn onn eorþe, Ne nan ne beoþ her i þiss lif Affterr þe laffdi? Mar?e, Þatt mu?he wurrþenn hire lic Inn ani? hali?nesse, Ne tredenn dun þe deofless mahht, Swa-summ ?ho tradd wiþþ alle. Annd ?ho wass full off mett & mæþ Onn alle kinne wise, Swa þatt nan þing att oferrdon Ne keppte ?ho to foll?henn; Forr hire þohht & hire word & hire weorrc wass clene, & all wiþþ witt & all wiþþ skill & all wiþþ mettfasstnesse. Off soþe lufe wass ?ho full, & tatt full wel wass sene I þatt tatt Drihhtin hire chæs To wurrþenn Godess moderr; Forr nære ?ho nohht Drihhtin Godd Swa sellcuþlike cweme, ?iff þatt ?ho nohht ne wære full Off soþfasst lufess mahhte; Forr alle þa þatt hafenn witt & waxenn manness elde, ?iff þatt te?? cwemenn Drihhtin Godd, Witt tu þatt te?? himm cwemenn Wiþþ lufe off Drihhtin & off mann, & wiþþ þe rihhte læfe. & ?ho þatt cwemmde himm allre mæst Off all mannkinn onn eorþe, ?ho wass wiss allre manne mast Off soþfasst lufe filledd; Forr ?ho wass god útnumennli?, & milde & meoc & bliþe, ?a towarrd Godd, ?a towarrd mann, Onn alle kinne wise. & ?ho wass full off soþfasst þild To þolenn & to dre?henn Wiþþ soþ meocle??c, wiþþ witt, wiþþ skill, Illc seollþe & illc unnseollþe. & tu mihht w?tenn þatt ?ho wass Full wel off þild bifundenn; Forr niss nan mahht rihht god inoh Bisorenn Godess e?hne, Butt iff itt beo þurrh þildess gold All full wel oferrgildedd. Forr þild birrþ ben wiþþ iwhillc mahht To beoldenn itt & strengenn, Swa þatt itt mu?he ben till uss God wæpenn ?æn þe deofell, Þatt æfre & æfre stanndeþþ inn To scrennkenn ure sawless, To don uss to forrgilltenn uss ?æn Godd o sume wise. & ?ho wass swinncfull, witt tu wel, Inn alle gode dedess; Forr unnlusst & forrswundennle??c Iss Drihhtin swiþe unncweme, & ?ho wass Drihhtin dere & lef & cweme onn alle wise; Þurrh whatt we w?tenn þatt ?ho wass Off idellnesse clene. [Þohh þatt te] laffdi? Mar?e wass Swa sellcuþlike wurrþedd Þurrh Drihhtin, þatt ?ho shollde ben Allmahhti? Godess moderr, Ne toc ?ho þohh nan modi?le??c Off hire miccle sellþe, Acc toc to shæwenn sone anan Meocnesse þess te mare; Forr þatt ?ho wollde ?ifenn uss God bisne in hire sellfenn, Off þatt tatt uss birrþ la?henn uss ?iff Godd uss he?heþþ here; Forr wha sitt iss þatt he?hedd iss Þurrh Drihhtin her onn eorþe, Himm birrþ himm sellfenn fuliwiss Þurrh soþ meocnesse la?henn, Affterr þatt bisne þatt himm ?aff Þe laffdi? Sannte Mar?e, Þurrh þatt tatt ?ho warrþ swiþe meoc Affterr þatt ?ho wass he?hedd & hofenn upp þurrh Godd, to ben Allwældennd Godess moderr. Forr affter þatt tatt Gabriæl Wass cumenn dun off heoffne, To kiþenn þatt ?ho shollde ben Off Hali? Gast wiþþ childe, ?ho ras hire upp, & fór anan Upp inntill he?he cludess Till hire me?he Elysabæþ, To lutenn hire & lefftenn. & tatt wass wiss soþfasst metle??c, Þatt ure laffdi? Mar?e Swa ferrde till Elysabæþ, To lutenn hire & lefftenn; Forr þohh þatt ?ho wass hali? wif, Þohh wass ?ho miccle lahre, Þann ure laffdi? Mar?e wass Onn alle kinne wise; Forr þatt Elysabæþ wass wif, & Mar?e ma??denn clene; & ec Elysabæþess child Þurrh faderr streon wass streonedd, & Mar?e wass o faderr hallf Wiþþutenn streon wiþþ childe; & ec Elysabæþess child Wass mann & nohht na mare, & Mar?ess child wass mann & Godd An had i twinne kinde; & forrþi wass Elysabæþ Onn alle wise lahre, Þann ure laffdi? Mar?e wass, & wel itt birrþ uss trowwenn, Forr ?ho wass he?hesst i þiss lif Off all mannkinn onn eorþe, & ?ho iss nu & æfre beoþ He?hesst off alle shaffte. SECUNDUM LUCAM III. Exurgens Maria abiit in montana cum festinatione. Itt se??þ þatt Sannte Mar?e fór Wiþþ mikell hih þatt we??e, & tatt wass swa þurh hire don Forr uss to ?ifenn bisne, Þatt uss birrþ a?? wiþþ mikell hih, Wiþþ mikell ?eorrnfullnesse, Foll?henn & fillenn all þatt gaþ Till ure sawle bote; Forr nan ne ma?? nohht w?tenn her Hu lannge mann ma?? libbenn, To stanndenn inn to cwemenn Crist To winnenn Cristess are. Forrþi mann birrþ beon ?eorrnfull a??, Whil þatt mann lifeþþ here, To cwemenn Crist þurrh hali? lif, & þurrh unnshaþinesse, Þurrh soþ & rihht, þurrh witt & skill, Þurrh mett & soþ meocnesse, Þurrh clene þohht & word & weorrc, Þurrh lufe, & hope, & læfe, Swa þatt mann mu?he wurrþi beon To winnenn Cristess are. Forr niss nan time inn oþer lif Affterr þiss lifess ende, To takenn wiþþ þe wake leod, To fedenn hemm & claþenn, To wasshenn hemm, to warrmenn hemm, To beddenn hemm & frofrenn; Ne nohht niss time inn oþerr lif Affterr þiss lifess ende, To ?ifenn Godd te tende del Off all þin a?henn ahhte, To lakenn Godd, to þeowwtenn Godd, To sekenn kirrke ?eorne, To lufenn & to foll?henn griþþ, & messeda?? to freollsenn, To winnenn Cristess are swa & eche lifess blisse. & forrþi birrþ uss hi?henn her To cwemenn Crist o life, Swa þatt we moten wurrþi beon To winnenn Cristess are. & Godd Allmahhti? ?ife uss swa To flen illc hæfedd sinne, Swa þatt we motenn wurrþi ben To brukenn [eche] blisse. Amæn. Þatt tatt te laffdi? Mar?e fór, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, To spekenn wiþþ Elysabæþ I cludi? landess munntess, Þær ?ho wiþþ hire macche wass Inn an Judisskenn chesstre; Þatt tacneþþ uss well mikell þing Off ure sawle nede. Son summ þe laffdi? Mar?e wass Off Hali? Gast wiþþ childe, ?ho ras upp sone anan, & for Upp inntill he?he munntess, Forr þatt ?ho wollde lutenn þær & lefftenn hire lahre; & all swa birrþ illc mann þatt iss Þurrh Godess millce beldedd, & frofredd her þurrh Hali? Gast, & strengedd inn hiss herrte, Swa þatt hiss herrte iss hofenn upp To foll?henn Godess wille, All swa birrþ himm forrþrihht anan All risenn upp off sinne, & sti?henn a?? þurrh hali? lif Upp inntill he?he mahhtess, & lefftenn a?? & lutenn þa Þatt sinndenn hise lahre, & cumenn swa þurrh hali? lif Inntill Judisskenn chesstre, Þatt iss upp inntill lufe & lusst, To lofenn Godd & wurrþenn, & ec to clennsenn a?? hiss lif, Þurrh soþfasst annd?ætnesse, Off all þatt iss onn?æness Godd, & weordeþþ ohht te sawle. All þiss wass uss bitacnedd wel Þurrh þatt Judisskenn chesstre, Þatt sannte Mar?e ferrde till Þær itt wass i þe munntess; Forr þatt ?ho wollde lutenn þær & lefftenn hire lahre, Affterr þatt ?ho wass hofenn upp To wurrþenn Godess moderr. & ?ho bilæf þreo moneþþ þær, Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn, Þatt Godess þeoww birrþ habbenn her A?? soþfasst læfe o Criste, & soþfasst hi?, & hope onn himm, & soþfasst lufe o baþe, O Drihhtin & onn iwhillc mann I þohht, i word, i dede. Forr wha sitt iss þatt wæpnedd iss Wiþþ þise þrinne mahhtess, Þatt illke mann iss sti?henn wel Upp inntill he?he munntess, & he ma?? stanndenn wel onn?æn Þe deofell wiþþ swillc wæpenn. Son summ þe laffdi? Mar?e comm Till Zacari?ess bottle, & spacc þær wiþþ Elysabæþ, Forrþrihht te?? wærenn baþe Off Godess Gastess hall?he witt Þurrh heore chilldre filledd; & tatt uss tacneþþ opennli? Þurrh þe??re baþre bisne, Þatt Drihhtin ?ifeþþ hali? witt Þa menn þatt wel himm foll?henn. Þatt tatt Elysabæþ spacc þær Till Sannte Mar?e & se??de; Rihht affterr þatt tin greting word Wass cumenn i min ære, Min child i blisse sone onngann To blissenn i min wambe, Þatt wass swa summ ?ho se??de þuss Wiþþ opennlike spæche, Son summ þu gann to gretenn me Wiþþ þine milde wordess, Min child tatt i min wambe liþ Bigann itt te to þannkenn, Forr he bigann forrþrihht anan To stirenn & to buttenn; & tatt forrþi þatt he wass gladd, Laffdi?, forr þatt tu come, & ec forr þatt he wollde swa Allmahhti? Drihhtin he??lenn Þatt nu liþ, alls he wát full wel, I þin unnwemmedd wambe. & tatt Elysabæþ spacc þær Till Sannte Mar?e, & se??de; & tu full ædi? wurrþenn arrt, Forr þatt tu mihhtesst trowwenn; Þatt wass swa summ ?ho se??de þuss Wiþþ all full openn spæche, Þin seollþe iss all unnse??enndlic, Forr þatt tu toc wiþþ trowwþe Þatt word tatt Godess enngell þe O Godess hallfe brohhte; & bettre arrt tu þann ure preost, Þatt nohht ne mihhte trowwenn Þatt word tatt himm þurrh Gabriæl Wass se??d o Godess hallfe, Forr whatt himm wass hiss spæche anan Þurrh Drihhtin all biræfedd. & tatt Elysabæþ spacc þær Till Sannte Mar?e & se??de; Forr all shall filledd ben i þe Þatt word tatt Godd te se??de, Þatt wass swa summ ?ho se??de þuss Wiþþ all full openn spæche, All þatt shall filledd ben i þe Þurrh Godess hall?he mahhte, Þatt Godess enngell Gabriæl Þe se??de o Godess hallfe Off-þatt tu sholldesst ben þurrh Godd Off Hali? Gast wiþþ childe. Her ma?? mann sen full opennli? Þatt Zacari?ess macche, Þatt gode wif Elysabæþ, Off Godess Gast wass filledd, Þatt se??de till þe laffdi? þær Off hire miccle seollþe, Þatt Drihhtin haffde sennd hiss word Till hire, & tatt itt shollde Ben filledd all þurrh Drihhtin Godd Inn hire & Sannte Mar?e, ?ét tanne naffde se??d rihht nohht Till hire off swillke þinge. Þurrh Godess Gast & nohht þurrh mann ?hót unnderrstod, & wisste Hu Sannte Mar?e wurrþenn wass Off Godess Gast wiþþ childe. Þatt ure laffdi? Mar?e wass Þreo moneþþ i þe munntess Wiþþ hire me?he Elysabæþ, Þatt wass forr þatt ?ho wollde Seon hire childenn hire child, Forr þatt wass, wiss to soþe, Þe maste þing forr whatt ?ho wass Þatt time cumenn þære. & all swa birrþ þatt illke mann, Þatt Drihhtin hafeþþ beoldedd & strengedd ohht þurrh Hali? Gast To foll?henn he?he mahhtess, A?? birrþ himm habbenn hope o Godd & soþfasst lufe & troww[þe] i clene unnwemeddnesse; Forrþi þatt Jesu Cristess hird Iss clene, & all unnwemmedd Inn hire trowwþe towarrd Godd, & ec inn hire lare. Itt se??þ þatt Josæp wass rihhtwis, & tatt iss tunnderrstanndenn Forr þatt hiss trowwþe wass full god, Þatt Godess sune shollde Ben borenn i þiss middellærd Off ma??denn þweorrt út clene. & tekenn þatt he wass rihhtwis, He wass ædmod & milde, I þatt tatt he ne wollde nohht Unnshaþi? wimmann wre?henn; Forr e??þerr birrþ wiþþ oþerr ben, ?iff þatt itt Godd shall cwemenn; Forr a?? birrþ rihhtwisnesse ben Þurrh mildheorrtnesse temmpredd, Swa þatt itt summ del nesshe be To þolenn & to dre?henn; & mildheorrtnesse birrþ ben a?? Þurrh rihhtwisnesse strengedd, Swa þatt te millce nohht ne be To soffte, ne to nesshe; Forr mann ma?? skét to soffte ben ?æn þa þatt Drihhtin wraþþenn. Þurrh þatt Josæp wass ho?hefull & mikell ummbeþohhte, Off whatt himm wære bettst to don Off þatt himm wass bilummpenn, Off þatt hiss macche wurrþenn wass Wiþþutenn himm wiþþ childe, Þær þurrh he ?aff ?uw, læwedd follc, Full opennlike bisne, Þatt ?uw birrþ nimenn mikell gom To ?emenn ?ure macchess, Þatt te?? ne falle nohht i gillt Þurrh ?ure ?emelæste. & ec Josæp uss ?aff þurrh þatt Full god & halsumm bisne, Þatt Godess þeoww himm ?eorne birrþ Biþennkenn & bilokenn, Off all þatt tatt he wile don & tatt he wile mælenn, Swa þatt itt Drihhtin cweme be, & halsumm till hiss sawle. Þurrh þatt he wollde stilleli? Fra Sannte Mar?e shædenn, Þær þurrh wass sene þatt he wass Rihhtwis & milde baþe. Rihhtwis he wass, þatt witt tu wel, O þatt hallf, þatt he nollde Nohht haldenn wiþþ þatt illke þing Þatt he nohht off ne wisste; He sahh þatt ?ho wiþþ childe wass, & nisste he nohht whæroffe, & wisste þatt ?ho clene wass Off alle menn onn eorþe, & forrþi wollde he fleon þatt þing Þatt he nohht off ne wisste, Swa-þatt he wære gilltelæs Biforenn Godess e?hne. & milde he wass onn oþerr hallf, I þatt he nollde wre?enn Þatt wimmann þatt wass gilltelæs, Þatt ?ho ne wære stanedd. & forr þatt Josæp sohhte raþ Swa lannge inn hise þohhtess, Off whatt himm wære bettst to don, Þatt he ne felle i sinne; Forrþi comm himm þatt he wass wurrþ Þatt Godd himm sennde hiss enngell, To raþenn himm þe bettste raþ Off-whatt himm wass to donne. & tatt me doþ full opennli? To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt ?iff þatt icc amm ho?hefull & mikell ummbeþennke, Whillc gate icc mu?he cwemenn Godd I þohht, i word, i dede, Drihhtin me ?ifeþ witt & mihht To forþenn wel min wille, Þatt I shall cunnenn cwemenn Godd & wel itt mughenn forþenn. Þatt Godess enngell comm o nihht Till Josæp þær he sleppte, Þatt uss bitacneþþ þatt tatt mann Iss Drihhtin lef & dere, Þatt, i þiss lifess þeossterrle??c, Forr?eteþþ & forrwerrpeþþ To ?eornenn affterr weorelldþing Þurrh sinnfull gredi?nesse; Forr rihht all swa summ icc amm fre Fra weorelldþingess lusstess, A whil þatt icc amm i min bedd Þurh slæpess bandess bundenn, Rihht swa þe soþe lufe off Godd Birrþ bindenn all min heorrte, Þatt icc be þweorrt út all se fre Fra sinnfull gredi?nesse, Swa þatt icc weorelldþing forrseo To winnenn ohht wiþþ sinne. & witt tu þatt tiss weorelldlif Iss wel þurrh nihht bitacnedd, Forr all þiss weorelldlif iss full Off sinness þeossterrnesse. & sinne iss opennlike inoh Þurrh þeossterrnesse tacnedd, Forr sinne, ?iff þút lufesst ohht, Forrblendeþþ all þin heorrte, Swa-þatt itt litell nimeþþ gom Hu mikell pine itt foll?heþþ. & tatt tatt Godess enngell spacc Till Josæp þær he sleppte, & se??de þatt hiss macche wass Off Hali? Gast wiþþ childe, Þatt birrþ uss lokenn whatt itt iss & whatt itt wile seggenn; Forr uss birrþ unnderrstanndenn wel & soþfasstlike trowwenn, Þatt Godess Gast iss soþfasst Godd & Allmahhti? wiþþ alle, & Godess Gast iss kariteþ & soþfasst lufe nemmnedd; & tatt wass all þurrh kariteþ & þurrh soþ lufe forþedd, Þatt Godess Sune Allmahhti? Godd Warrþ mann off Sannte Mar?e. & tatt he se??de þatt ?ho wass Off Hali? Gast wiþþ childe, Þatt se??de he wiss forr þatt ?ho wass Þurrh kariteþ wiþþ childe; Forr Godd warrþ mann þurrh cariteþ & þurrh soþ lufe onn eorþe. Þurrh soþfasst lufe wass itt don, Forr ure Drihhtin haffde Swa mikell lufe towarrd uss, Forr whatt he wollde uss lesenn Út off þe laþe gastess hannd, & brinngenn uss till heoffne. Forr ?uw birrþ unnderrstanndenn wel & soþfasstlike trowwenn, Þatt nass ?ho nohht wiþþ childe þa Off Hali? Gast tatt wise, Þatt Hall? Gast wass wurrþenn mann, Nass ?ho nohht swa wiþþ childe; Forr Godess Gast ne warrþ nohht mann, Þiss birrþ uss alle trowwenn, Acc Godess Sune Allmahhti? Godd Warrþ mann off Sannte Mar?e. & tatt he se??de þatt ?ho wass Off Hali? Gast wiþþ childe, Þatt se??de he wiss forr þatt itt wass Þurrh Godess ?ife wurrþenn; Forr Hali? Gast iss soþfasst Godd & Godess ?ife nemmnedd; & all þurrh Godess ?ife itt wass & all þurrh Godess wille, Þatt ?ho wiþþ childe wurrþenn wass Wiþþutenn iwhillc macche. Forrlætenn & forrworrpenn. & her mann unnderrstanndenn ma?? Þurrh þiss Josæpess bisne, Þatt mann birrþ lokenn allre mast A?? till hiss a?henn sawle; Forr birrþ me nowwþerr hellpenn þe To lif, ne to þe sawle, Swa þatt icc ohht forrgillte me ?æn Godd onn ani? wise. Acc all þatt icc ma?? gengenn þe, Swa þatt I nohht ne gillte, All birrþ me bl?þelike don Forr heofennlike mede, & nohht ne birrþ me gengenn þe Forr eorþli? loff to winnenn. Josæp all unnderrstod full wel Þatt Godess enngell se??de, & ras himm upp off slæpe anan Þurrh soþfasst herrsummnesse, & dide all alls himm bedenn wass, & toc wel wiþþ hiss macche; Forr þatt he wisste þa þurrh whatt ?ho wurrþenn wass wiþþ childe. & wel bilimmpeþþ þatt itt se??þ Þatt he ras upp off slæpe, Forr he wass þa brohht út off all Orrtrowwþe & orrraþnesse, Son summ he wisste inoh þurrh whatt Hiss macche wass wiþþ childe; Forr þatt wass þurrh wanntrowwþess slæp, Þatt he wass off hiss macche All orrraþ whatt he mihhte don, Off þatt ?ho wass wiþþ childe. & tær he ras upp off þatt slæp Þær Godess enngell se??de, O whillke wise hiss macche wass Wiþþutenn himm wiþþ childe; Forr siþþenn toc he swiþe wel Wiþþ hire onn alle wise, & toc to þeowwtenn hire anan Wiþþ þæw att alle nede. & swa bilæf ?ho þa wiþþ himm Inn Nazaræþess chesstre, & ?ede þa wiþþ childe þær All all se fele móneþþ, Alls iff itt wære an oþerr child Þatt wære onn hire streonedd, Forrþi þatt ure Laferrd Crist, Þatt wass inn hire wambe, Wass wurrþenn all þweorrt út soþ mann I bodi? & i sawle, Wiþþutenn þatt tatt he wass wiss All þweorrt út clene off sinne. & forr þatt he wass wurrþenn mann Off hire flæshess kinde, All all swa ?ede ?ho wiþþ himm Till hire rihhte time, Alls iff he wære anoþer child Þatt wære onn hire streonedd. Annd hire me?he Elysabæþ Wass gladd inoh & bliþe Off hire dere child Johan, & lefli? ?ho himm fedde; & swiþe wel he wex & þraf, & Drihhtin wass he cweme; Forr affterr þatt te Goddspell se??þ, Þatt þweorrt út nohht ne le?heþþ, Wisslikess þingess Godess hannd Wass wiþþ þatt child onn eorþe. & tatt wass upponn all hiss lif Full opennlike sene; Forr son summ he wass waxenn swa Þurrh hise freondess fode, Þatt he þa mihhte himm sellf ben wel Hiss a?henn hellpe & hirde, & tatt he cuþe himm ane ben & lokenn till himm sellfenn, Forrþrihht anan he flæh awe?? Fra faderr & fra moderr, & flæh himm inntill wesste land Þær itt wass all unnbiggedd, & shadde himm all þweorrt út fra menn, Forr þatt he wollde himm ?emenn, Swa þatt he þurrh an idell word Ne shollde himm nohht forrgilltenn. & tær he ledde himm ane hiss lif Fra þatt he wass full litell Till þatt he waxenn wass, & neh Off þritti? winnterr elde. Hiss claþ wass off ollfenntess hær, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Hiss girrdell wass off shepess skinn Abutenn hise lendess, Hiss drinnch wass waterr a?? occ a??, Hiss mete wilde rotess, & ?iff he mihhte findenn ohht Off huni? i þatt wesste. Swillc lif wass tacnedd þurrh þatt lac Þatt all wass brennd till asskess, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd ?uw Biforenn o þiss lare; Forr þu ne mihht nohht ledenn her Nan bettre lif onn eorþe Þann iss, þatt tu þweorrt út forrse & all þweorrt út forrwerrpe All weorelldlike lif & lusst, & fleo fra menn till wesste, & tær wiþþ hard & hali? lif Be ?eorrnfull Crist to cwemenn; Forr swillc lif iss all þweorrt út dæd Fra weorelldshipess lusstess, & itt iss all þurrh hali? fir Off soþfasst lufe o Criste Turrnedd till asskess & till dusst, Forrþi þatt swillke leode A?? foll?henn soþ meocnessess sloþ, Þatt iss þurrh asskess tacnedd. & Sannt Johan bigann swillc lif Whann he wass ?ét full litell, & a?? hétt held full wel anan Till þatt he ?aff hiss ende. & swa birrþ illc Crisstene mann Þatt ?eorneþþ affterr blisse, A?? himm birrþ gode dedess don Whil þatt hiss lif himm lassteþþ; Forr mann ne ma?? nohht borr?henn ben, Swa summ soþ boc uss kiþeþþ, Þohh mann biginne god to don, Butt iff mann wel itt ende. Uss birrþ biginnenn god to don, & haldenn a þæronne, & uss birrþ endenn ure lif Inn ure gode dede; & ta shall ure Laferrd Crist Att ure lifess ende Uss ?ifenn ure swinnkess læn, Wiþþ enngless eche blisse; & Godd Allmahhti? gife uss swa To cwemenn Crist onn erþe Swa þatt we motenn wurrþi ben To brukenn heffness blisse. Amæn. Nu wile icc here shæwenn ?uw Off ure laffdi? Mar?e, Off hu ?ho barr þe Laferrd Crist. Att hire rihhte time, Swa þatt ?ho þohh þær affterr wass A ma??denn þweorrt út clene; SECUNDUM LUCAM VII. Exiit edictum. An Romanisshe Kaserrking Wass Augusstuss ?ehatenn, & he wass wurrþenn Kaserrking Off all mannkinn onn eorþe, & he gann þennkenn off himm sellf, & off hiss miccle riche. & he bigann to þennkenn þa, Swa sum þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Off þatt he wollde witenn wel Hu mikell fehh himm come, ?iff himm off all hiss kinedom Illc mann an peninng ?æfe. & he badd settenn upp o writt All mannkinn, forr to lokenn Hu mikell fehh he mihhte swa Off all þe weorelld sammnenn, Þurrh þatt himm shollde off illc an mann An peninng wurrþenn reccnedd. & ta wass sett tatt iwhillc mann, Whær summ he wære o lande, Ham shollde wendenn to þatt tun Þatt he wass borenn inne, & tatt he shollde þær forr himm Hiss hæfeddpeninng reccnenn, Swa þatt he ?æn þe Kaserrking Ne felle nohht i wíte. & i þatt illke time wass Josæp wiþþ Sannte Mar?e I Galilew, & i þatt tun Þatt Nazaræþ wass nemmnedd. & ta þe?? baþe forenn ham Till þe??re baþre kinde; Inntill þe land off ?errsalæm Þe?? forenn samenn baþe, & comenn inntill Beþþleæm Till þe??re baþre birde, Þær wass hemm baþe birde to, Forr þatt te?? baþe wærenn Off Daviþþ kin?ess kinness menn, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ. & Daviþþ kin?ess birde wass I Beþleæmess chesstre; & hemm wass baþe birde þær Þurrh Daviþþ kin?ess birde; Forr þatt te?? baþe wærenn off Daviþess kin & sibbe. & Sannte Mar?ess time wass Þatt ?ho þa shollde childenn, & tær ?ho barr Allmahhti? Godd Þatt all þiss weorelld wrohhte, & wand himm sone i winndeclút, & le??de himm inn an cribbe; Forrþi þatt ?ho ne wisste whær ?ho mihhte himm don i bure. & tohh þatt Godd wass borenn þær Swa dærnelike onn eorþe, & wundenn þær swa wreccheli? Wiþþ clutess inn an cribbe, Ne wollde he nohht forrholenn ben Þohhwheþþre i þe??re clutess, Acc wollde shæwenn whatt he wass Þurrh heofennlike takenn. Forr sone anan affterr þatt he Wass borenn þær to manne, Þær onnfasst i þatt illke land Wass se?henn mikell takenn. An enngell comm off heoffness ærd, Inn aness weress hewe, Till hirdess þær þær þe?? þatt nihht Biwokenn þe??re faldess, Þatt enngell comm & stod hemm bi Wiþþ heoffness lihht & leome. & forrþrihht summ þe?? sæ?henn himm Þe?? wurrdenn swiþe offdredde; & Godess enngell hemm bigann To frofrenn & to beldenn, & se??de hemm þuss o Godess hallf Wiþþ swiþe milde spæche; Ne beo ?e nohht forrdredde off me, Acc beo ?e swiþe bliþe, Forr icc amm sennd off heoffness ærd To kiþenn Godess wille, To kiþenn ?uw þatt all follc iss Nu cumenn mikell blisse, Forr ?uw iss borenn nu to da?? Hælennde off ?ure sinness, An wennchell þatt iss Jesu Crist, Þatt w?te ?e to soþe. & her onnfasst he borenn iss I Daviþþ kingess chesstre, Þatt iss ?ehatenn Beþþleæm, I þiss Judisskenn birde. & her icc wile shæwenn ?uw Summ þing to witerr takenn; ?e shulenn findenn ænne child I winndeclutess wundenn, & itt iss inn a cribbe le??d, & tær ?ét mu?henn findenn. & sone anan se þiss wass se??d Þurrh an off Godess enngless, A mikell here off enngleþeod Wass cumenn út off heoffne, & all þatt hirdeflocc hemm sahh & herrde whatt te?? sungenn. Þe?? alle sungenn ænne sang Drihhtin to lofe & wurrþe, & tuss þe?? sungenn alle imæn, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Si Drihhtin upp inn heoffness ærd Wurrþminnt & loff & wullderr, & upponn eorþe griþþ & friþþ, Þurrh Godess mildheorrtnesse, Till iwhillc mann þatt habbenn shall God heorrte & a?? god wille. & sone anan se þiss wass þær Þurrh Godess enngless awwnedd, Þe?? wenndenn fra þa w?kemenn All út off þe??re sihhþe. Þa hirdess tokenn sone þuss To spekenn hemm bitwenenn; Ga we nu till þatt illke tun Þatt Beþþleæm iss nemmnedd, & loke we þatt illke word Þatt iss nu wrohht onn eorþe, Þatt Drihhtin Godd uss hafeþþ wrohht & awwnedd þurrh hiss are. & sone anan þe?? ?edenn forþ Till Beþþleæmess chesstre, & fundenn Sannte Mar?e þær & Josæp hire macche, & ec þe?? fundenn þær þe child Þær itt wass le??d i cribbe. & ta þe?? unnderrstodenn wel Þatt word tatt Godess enngless Hemm haffdenn awwnedd off þatt child, Þatt te?? þær haffdenn fundenn; & ta þe?? wenndenn hemm onn?æn Wiþþ rihhte læfe o Criste, & tokenn innwarrdlike Godd To lofenn & to þannkenn All þatt te?? haffdenn herrd off himm, & se?henn þurrh hiss are. & sone anan þe?? kiddenn forþ Amang Judisskenn þeode All þatt te?? haffdenn herrd off Crist, & se?henn wel wiþþ e?hne; & iwhillc mann þatt herrde itt ohht Forrwunndredd wass þæroffe. & ure laffdi? Mar?e toc All þatt ?ho sahh & herrde, & all ?hót held inn hire þohht, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, & le??de itt all tosamenn a?? I swiþe þohhtfull heorrte, All þatt ?ho sahh & herrde off Crist, Whas moderr ?ho wass wurrþenn. Annd o þatt illke nahht tatt Crist Wass borenn her to manne, Wass he ?ét, alls hiss wille wass, Awwnedd onn oþerr wise. He sette a steorrne upp o þe lifft Full brad, & brihht, & shene, Onn æst hallf off þiss middellærd, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Amang þatt follc þatt cann innsihht Off mani? þing þurrh steorrness, Amang þe Calldeowisshe þeod Þatt cann innsihht o steorrness. & tatt þeod wass hæþene þeod Þatt Crist ?aff þa swillc takenn; Forrþi þatt he þe??m wollde þa To rihhte læfe wendenn. & son se þe?? þatt steorrneleom Þær sæ?henn upp o liffte, Þreo kingess off þatt illke land Full wel itt unnderrstodenn, & wisstenn witerrli? þærþurrh Þatt swillc new king wass awwnedd, Þatt wass soþ Godd & soþ mann ec, An had off twinne kinde. All þiss þe?? unnderrstodenn wel Forr þatt itt Godd hemm úþe, & cómenn samenn alle þreo, & settenn hemm bitwenenn, Þatt illc an shollde þrinne lac Habbenn wiþþ him o lade, & tatt te?? sholldenn farenn forþ To le??tenn & to sekenn Þatt newe king, þatt borenn wass Amang Judisskenn þeode. & sone anan þe?? forenn forþ Illc an wiþþ þrinne lakess, Forr þatt ta lakess sholldenn uss Well mikell god bitacnenn. & te??re steorrne wass wiþþ hemm To ledenn hemm þe we??e, Forr a?? itt fl?t upp i þe lifft Biforenn hemm a litell, To tæchenn hemm þatt we??e rihht Þatt ledde hemm towarrd Criste. Acc fra þatt Kalldewisshe land, Þatt te?? þa comenn offe, Wass mikell we??e till þatt land Þatt Crist wass borenn inne; & forrþi wass hemm ned to don God þra?he to þatt we??e, Forr rihht onn hiss þrittende da?? Þe?? comenn till þatt chesstre, Þær ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Wass borenn her to manne; Þuss wass þe Laferrd Jesu Crist Awwnedd o twinne wise Forrþrihht anan, i þatt tatt he Wass borenn her to manne, Forr þatt menn sholldenn cnawenn himm & lofenn himm & wurrþenn, & cumenn till þe Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe, & winnenn swa to cumenn upp Till heofennrichess blisse. Her endenn twa Goddspelless þuss, & uss birrþ hemm þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt te?? lærenn uss Off ure sawle nede. Forrþrihht anan se time comm, Þatt ure Drihhtin wollde Ben borenn i þiss middellærd Forr all mannkinne nede, He chæs himm sone kinness menn All swillke summ he wollde, & whær he wollde borenn ben He chæs all att hiss wille. &, alls hiss lefe wille wass, Hiss moderr Sannte Mar?e Comm rihht inntill þatt illke tun & till þatt illke bottle, Þatt he wollde inne borenn ben & awwnedd her onn eorþe. & forrþi þatt ma??þhadess lif Iss he?hesst allre life, Forrþi chæs ure Laferrd Crist An ma??denn himm to moderr, Forr þatt he lufeþþ alle þa Þatt soþ clænnesse foll?henn. & forr þatt he wass borenn her Sahhtnesse & griþþ to settenn Bitwenenn Drihhtin, heoffness king, & mannkinn her onn eorþe, Forrþi chæs he to wurrþenn mann O þatt Ke??seress time, Þatt held wiþþ mikell griþþ & friþþ Hiss kinedom onn eorþe. & forr þatt he wass wurrþenn mann To ?ifenn menn onn eorþe Hiss a?henn hall?he flæsh & blod, Soþ bræd to þe??re sawle, Forrþi chæs he þatt illke tun To wurrþenn borenn inne, Þatt wass ?ehatenn Beþþleæm, Forrþi þatt itt bitacneþþ Þatt hus þatt bræd iss inne don, & tatt iss Cristess kirrke; Forr Cristess flæsh & Cristess blod Iss hall?hedd inn hiss kirrke, Forr þær to wurrþenn lifess bræd Till alle Cristess þeowwess. & all all swa se þa wass sett Þurrh þatt Kaseress hæse, Þatt illc mann shollde cumenn ham Inntill hiss a?henn birde, Forr þær to reccnenn till þe king An peninng forr himm sellfenn, & tatt mann shollde hiss name þær Att hame o wr?te settenn, All all swa biddeþþ ure king, Þe Laferrd Crist off heffne, Þatt illc mann shule cumenn ham Inntill hiss a?henn birde, Þatt iss inntill rihht Crisstenndom, & inntill rihhte læfe, Inntill þatt soþfasstnessess ham Þatt mann wass shapenn inne, & reccnenn himm þatt peninng þær Þatt tacneþþ rihhtwisnesse; & he shall writenn alle þa Þatt cwemmdenn himm o life Onn eche lifess bokess writt, To brukenn heoffness blisse. & ec þurrh þatt tatt Josæp comm Wiþþ ure laffdi? Mar?e Till Beþþleæm, Daviþess burrh, Forr sillferr þær to reccnenn Forr Mar?e, & forr himm sellfenn ec, Affterr þe kingess hæse, Þurrh þatt we mu?henn sen full wel, Þatt Jesuss nohht ne wollde Ben borenn nowwhar i þe land, Bútt inn hiss a?henn birde; Forr ure laffdi? Mar?e wass Þatt illke kingess me?he, Forr ?ho wass off Daviþess kinn Þatt Drihhtin wass full dere. & hire sune wass himm lic O f?le kinne wise; Forr Crist wass strang wiþþ hannd inoh To werrpenn dun þe deofell, & Crist wass æfre swillc to sen & á beoþ butenn ende, Þatt gode ?eorrndenn himm to sen, & æfre shulenn ?eorrnenn. & tiss iss þatt uss opennli? Daviþess name tacneþþ; Forr itt uss tacneþþ strang wiþþ hannd & luffsumm onn to lokenn, & Crist iss baþe-strang wiþþ hannd, & luffsumm onn to lokenn. & Crist iss all se Daviþþ wass Shephirde, & king, & kemmpe, Forr Crist iss allre kinge King, & alle shaffte Laferrd. & Daviþþ king sloh Goliát, Hæþene follkess kemmpe, & Crist band uss þe laþe gast, All hellewaress strenncþe. & Daviþþ, whanne he ?ung mann wass, Þa wass he shepess hirde, & Crist iss hirde off hise shep, Off hise dere þeowwess. & Crist wass hirde god inoh Þatt ?aff hiss a?henn sawle, To lesenn hise shep þærwiþþ Út off þe deofless walde. Þa gode menn þatt lufenn Crist, & hise la?hess haldenn, Þe?? alle sinndenn Cristess shep, Forr þatt te?? sinndenn alle Æddmode & meoke & milde menn, All affterr shepess kinde. & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Wass borenn her to manne, Þatt time þatt hiss moderr wass I þeowwdom unnderr laferrd, Þatt dide he forr to shæwenn swa Unnse??enndli? meocnesse, To tæchenn þurrh himm sellfenn swa, & þurrh hiss hall?he bisne, Þatt ?uw birrþ berenn bliþeli? Þeowwdom off ?ure laferrd; & ec forr þatt he wollde swa Þurrh hiss þeowwdom útlesenn Off deofless þeowwdom alle þa, Þatt well himm sholldenn foll?henn. & tatt te laffdi? Mar?e warrþ I Nazaræþ wiþþ childe, & tatt ?ho comm off Galileow Till Beþþleæmess chesstre, Þatt time þatt ?ho Jesu Crist To manne shollde childenn, Þatt iss nu filledd illke da?? Þurrh Jesu Cristess þeowwess. Forr Nazaræþ onn Ennglissh iss Alls iff þu nemmne blosstme, & Galileow bitacneþþ wheol, Swa summ soþ boc uss kiþeþþ, & Beþþleæm tacneþþ þatt hus Þatt lifess bræd iss inne, & Godess þeowwess blomenn a?? Inn alle gode þæwess, Her i þiss middellærdess lif Þatt þurrh þe wheol iss tacnedd. Forr all þiss middellærdess þing A?? turrneþþ her & wharrfeþþ Nu upp, nu dun, swa summ þe wheol, & nohht ne stannt itt stille. & Cristess þeowwess a?? occ a?? Forrho?henn & forrwerrpenn All weorelldshipess fule lusst, & alle fule þæwess, & cumenn út off Galileow Gastlike o swillke wise, & cumenn inntill Beþþleæm, Þatt tacneþþ Cristess kirrke, Þatt Cristess flæsh & Cristess blod Þe sawle bræd iss inne. & Jesu Crist iss borenn þær Swa summ itt wære off moderr, Þurrh þatt tatt hise þeowwess þær Wiþþ spell off Godess lare Don læwedd follc to sen summ del, & don hemm tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt Crist iss Godd, & Crist iss mann, An had off twinne kinde. Forrþrihht anan se Jesu Crist Wass borenn off hiss moderr, ?ho wand himm sone i winndeclút, & le??de himm inn an cribbe. Acc uss birrþ w?tenn þatt he warrþ, All wiþþ hiss a?henn wille, Unnorne & wrecche & usell child Inn ure mennisscnesse, Forr þatt he wollde inn heoffness ærd Uss alle makenn riche. & he þatt all þiss middellærd Onn alle wise shrideþþ, He wollde wundenn ben forr uss I wrecche winndeclutess, Forr þatt he wollde shridenn uss Wiþþ heofennlike wæde. & he þatt all þiss weorelld shop & alle shaffte stereþþ, He lét himm baþe bindenn her Wiþþ bandess fét & hande, Forr þatt he wollde unnbindenn uss Off hellepiness bandess. & heoffne & lifft & land & sæ Wiþþ Goddcunndnesse filleþþ Þatt illke child, tatt tær wass le??d Inn an full naru cribbe, Forr þatt he wollde ?ifenn uss All heoffness rume riche. & he þatt fedeþþ enngleþeod & alle cwike shaffte, He la?? all, alls hiss wille wass, Biforenn asse i cribbe, Swa summ he wære ?ifenn himm To wurrþenn himm to fode, Forr þatt he wollde brinngenn uss Upp inntill heoffness blisse, & ?ifenn uss himm sellfenn þær Wiþþ enngless eche fode. Þuss Godess Sune, Allmahhti? Godd, Wass wrecche mann onn eorþe, Forr swa to brinngenn mannkinn onn To ?eornenn affterr litell, Forr þatt he lufeþþ alle þa Þatt hise la?hess haldenn, & lufenn, forr þe lufe off himm, To libbenn her onn eorþe Full wrecchelike inn uselldom Off metess & off claþess. & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Wass le??d inn asse cribbe, Þatt tacneþþ uss, þatt he comm her To wurrþenn mann onn eorþe Wiþþ mannkinn þatt wass stunnt, & dill, & skilllæs swa summ asse. & asse-þohh itt litell be, Itt hafeþþ mikell afell To berenn upp well mikell sæm, ?iff mann itt doþ þæronne. & swa wass neh all follc þatt da?? Þatt Crist comm her to manne, Neh all itt wass þa strang inoh To þeowwtenn laþe gastess, To berenn upp þatt laþe sæm, To don alle þe??re wille. & þurrh þatt Godd wass wurrþenn mann Forr ure miccle nede, Þurrh þatt wass he, þatt witt tu wel, All wiþþ hiss lefe wille Niþþredd & wannsedd wunnderrli?, & la?hedd inn himm sellfenn, Forr o þatt hallf þatt he wass mann, Mann mihhte himm fon & pinenn Wiþþ hát & kald, wiþþ nesshe & harrd, Wiþþ pine off þrisst & hunngerr, & cwellenn himm mann mihhte wel Inn ure mennisscnesse. & Godd wass wurrþenn swa forr uss ?ét lasse þann an enngell; Forr mann ne ma?? nohht enngell seon Ne t?kenn himm ne bindenn, Ne pinenn himm, ne cwellenn himm, Forr he ne de?eþþ næfre. Acc Drihhtin Godd warrþ her forr þe ?ét lasse þann hiss enngell, & lah?hre inoh, forrþi þatt he Þe wollde ?ifenn bisne, Þatt te birrþ a?? þe sellfenn her Þurrh soþ meocnesse la?henn, & lætenn swiþe unnorneli? & litell off þe sellfenn. Þatt hirdess wokenn o þatt nahht Þatt Crist wass borenn onne, Þatt wass swa summ hiss wille wass, Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn Þatt he forrþi wass wurrþenn mann, Forr þatt he wollde sammnenn An flocc off menn till Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe, Þatt sholldenn wurrþenn hise shep Þurrh heore unnshaþi?nesse, & sholldenn habbenn oferr hemm Bisscopess, preostess, dæcness; Forr þatt te?? sholldenn hirdess ben To ?emenn hemm & gætenn, & ec forr þatt he wollde ben Himm sellf útnumenn hirde, Swa þatt he wollde hiss a?henn lif Forr hise shep forrlætenn. Þatt Godess enngell comm o nihht, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, To spekenn wiþþ þa wakemenn Þatt wokenn heore faldess, & tatt he comm þatt nihht till hemm Wiþþ heoffness lihht & leome, & tatt te?? wærenn forr þatt lihht, & forr þatt enngless sihhþe, Forrdredde swiþe fasste anan, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, & ec þatt Godess enngell toc To frofrenn hemm wiþþ worde, All þatt wass don þurrh Jesu Crist Forr mikell þing to tacnenn. Itt tacneþþ uss þatt ure Godd Well offte senndeþþ enngless Inntill þiss middellærd, tatt iss All full off þeossterrnesse, Þatt iss off all þatt ifell iss Inn alle kinne sinne. Itt tacneþþ þatt he senndeþþ hemm Inntill þiss þeossterrnesse, To frofrenn þa þatt wakenn wel Onn?æness laþe gastess, & stanndenn inn to shildenn hemm Fra deofless swikedomess. & all þatt flocc þatt hemm iss sét To ?emenn & to gætenn, To frofrenn swillke senndeþþ Godd Enngless & hall?he sawless, & a?? þe?? cumenn dun till þa Wiþþ heoffness lihht & leome, Þatt iss wiþþ witt & god innsihht Inn alle kinne þinge, Forr Drihhtin ?ifeþþ her hiss þeoww God witt, & mahht, & wille, To stanndenn ?æn þe laþe gast & ?æn all þatt he læreþþ. Acc a?? þe?? sinndenn þohh swa þehh Well swiþe sare offdredde Off domess da?ess starrke dom, & off þe Demess irre, All all swa summ þa w?kemenn Well swiþe offdredde wærenn Off heoffness brihhte lihht & leom, & off þatt enngless sihhþe; Acc hihht & hope o Drihhtin Godd & onn hiss mildheorrtnesse, Þatt frofreþþ hemm & beoldeþþ hemm To foll?henn Godess lare, To fandenn, ?iff þe?? mu?henn swa Þe Demess are winnenn. & tatt wass uss bitacnedd wel Þurrh þatt tatt Godess enngell Toc sone anan wiþþ milde word Þa w?kemenn to frofrenn, Forr þatt he wisste wel þatt te?? Off himm forrdredde wærenn; Forr Godess enngell frofreþþ mann, ?iff þatt he seoþ himm færedd; Forr Godess enngell iss full meoc, & soffte, & milde, & bliþe, & deofell iss all full off niþ, & full off grammcunndnesse, & full off h?te towarrd mann, & full off modi?nesse, & ?iff he seoþ þe mann forrdredd, He wile himm skerrenn mare, & ræfenn himm hiss rihhte witt, & shetenn inn hiss heorrte. Acc whas itt iss þatt wæpnedd iss Wiþþ fulle trowwþe o Criste, Þohh þatt he grissli? deofell seo, Niss he rihht nohht forrfæredd. Þatt enngell se??de þatt he wass Þa cumenn forr to kiþenn, O Godess hallfe, þær till hemm An swiþe mikell blisse, Þatt shollde ben till all þe follc; Þatt se??de he forr þatt tanne Wass cumenn i þiss middellærd Full mikell blisse & sellþe, Till alle þa þatt sholldenn wel O Godess Sune lefenn, O Jesu Crist tatt borenn wass Þatt illke nahht to manne. He se??de þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass borenn her to manne Nohht o þe nahht, acc o þe da??, Forr mikell þing to tacnenn; Forr da??ess lihht bitacneþþ uss All eche lifess blisse, & nahht bitacneþþ all þatt wa Þatt iss inn hellepine. & Crist wass borenn i þiss lif To lesenn uss off helle, Forr þatt he wollde ?ifenn uss Wiþþ enngless eche blisse. & tatt wass uss bitacnedd ec Þurrh þatt, tatt Godess enngell Wass awwnedd till þa w?kemenn Wiþþ heoffness lihht & leome; Forr Godess Sune Jesu Crist Wass wurrþenn mann onn eorþe, To ?ifenn heoffness lihht & leom Þatt follc þatt shollde himm foll?henn. Þatt Godd Allmahhti? wurrþenn wass ?ung child inn ure kinde, & wrecche child off wrecche kinn, Þatt doþ uss tunnderrstanndenn Þatt uss birrþ mikell lufenn Crist, & lofenn himm & wurrþenn, Off þatt he wollde himm sellfenn swa Forr ure lufe la?henn, & off þatt he warrþ wrecche mann Forr uss to makenn riche, Wiþþ enngless upp inn heoffness ærd, Wiþþutenn ende i blisse. Annd þurrh þatt, tatt tær awwnedd wass An here off Godess enngless, Þatt time þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass borenn her to manne, Þurrh þatt wass uss don þær full wel To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt enngless stanndenn a?? occ a?? To lofenn Godd & wurrþenn. & þurrh þatt illke wass uss ec Don full wel tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt uss birrþ lofenn Drihhtin a?? Wiþþ innwarrd heorrtess tunge, & þannkenn himm þatt miccle god Þatt he doþ uss onn eorþe. & þurrh þatt illke wass uss ec Don full wel tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt Crist, all enngleþeode king, Wass borenn her to manne, Alls iff he ?æn þe laþe gast Wiþþ h?re wollde fihhtenn, To winnenn Adam & hiss kinn Út off þe deofless walde, & settenn enngless oferr hemm To ?emenn hemm & gætenn, & forr to shildenn hemm onn?æn Þe deofless laþe wiless. Annd Godess enngless wærenn þa Well swiþe glade wurrþenn Off þatt, tatt Godd wass wurrþenn mann, Forr þatt te?? wisstenn alle, Þatt te??re genge shollde ben Wiþþ gode sawless ekedd, & wurrþedd ec, & all forrþi Þe?? wærenn swiþe bliþe, & all forrþi þe?? sungenn þa Þiss sang wiþþ mikell blisse, Si Drihhtin upp inn heoffness ærd Wurrþshipe, & loff, & wullderr, & upponn eorþe griþþ & friþþ, Þurrh Godess mildheorrtnesse, Till iwhillc mann þatt habbenn shall God heorrte & a?? god wille. Þiss sungenn þe??, forrþi þatt te?? Full wel þær unnderrstodenn, Þatt te??re genge shollde ben Þurrh hall?he sawless ekedd, Þurrh whatt biforenn Drihhtin Godd, ?iff þatt itt waxenn mihhte, Wurrþshipe & wullderr shollde ben, Swa summ itt waxenn wære, & ec forr þatt te?? wisstenn wel Þatt Godd comm her to manne, Forr þatt he wollde griþþ & friþþ & soþ sahhtnesse settenn Bitwenenn Drihhtin, heoffness king, & mannkinn her onn eorþe, Þatt mannkinn shollde mu?henn wel Upp cumenn inntill heoffne, Þatt heoffness here mihhte swa Þurrh hall?he sawless waxenn, Þurrh whatt biforenn Drihhtin Godd Wurrþshipe waxenn shollde, ?iff þatt himm mihhte waxenn ohht & wurrþenn bettre & mare. Þatt griþþ wass sett till alle þa, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Þatt sholldenn wurrþenn gode menn, & habbenn a?? god wille Till þa þatt sholldenn unnderrfon Wiþþ blisse Cristess come, & nohht till þa þatt sholldenn himm Forrho?henn & forrwerrpenn; Forr niss nohht Godess griþþ wiþþ þa Þatt wiþþrenn Godd onn?æness, Acc hellewawenn iss till þa All affterr þe??re wrihhte. & her mann unnderrstanndenn ma??, Whillc mann iss Drihhtin cweme, Þatt illke mann iss Drihhtin lef Þatt hafeþþ gode wille; Forr whase itt iss þatt illke mann Þatt hafeþþ a?? god wille, Þatt illke mann ne sinn?heþþ nohht, Ne gillteþþ hise þannkess, Ne towarrd Godd, ne towarrd mann, ?iff þatt he ma?? himm lokenn. & ?iff þatt iss þatt he missdoþ Onn ani? kinne wise, Itt reoweþþ himm, & sone anan He stannt itt inn to betenn. Þatt Godess enngell comm o nahht Wiþþ heoffness lihht onn eorþe, Þatt tacneþþ þatt tiss middellærd Wass full off þeossterrnesse, Þurrh illkess kinness hæþenndom Inn iwhillc unnclænnesse, Þatt time þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass borenn her to manne, To ?ifenn heoffness lihht & leom Þatt follc þatt shollde himm cwemenn. & tatt tatt enngell nohht ne comm Till kingess ne till eorless, Ne till þatt laþe riche flocc Þatt foll?heþþ modi?nesse, Þatt doþ uss tunnderrstanndenn wel Þatt Drihhtin Godd forrwerrpeþþ All modi?le??c, & gredi?le??c, & irre, & gluterrnesse, & all þatt foll?heþþ horedom & swikedom onn eorþe, Þatt mann ma?? findenn allre mast I þa þatt sinndenn riche. Þatt Godess enngell awwnedd wass In aness weress hewe, Þatt wass forrþi þatt enngell ma??, Wiþþ hiss Drihhtiness wille, Himm awwnenn alls he wære a mann I manness limess alle, I bodi? þatt he doþ himm inn Off heofennlike kinde. & Godd wiþþ enngless ?ife uss á To brukenn heffness blisse. Am[æn.] & forrþi wass itt upponn himm Þurrh Drihhtin firrst bigunnenn, Forr þatt itt shollde ben onn himm Till himm full witerr tákenn, Þatt he wass Drihhtin swiþe lef Þurrh trowwþess rihhtwisnesse. & itt wass ec þurrh Drihhtin sett To wurrþenn himm to tákenn, Þatt Drihhtin haffde ?ifenn himm Swillc blettcinng & swillc sellþe, Þatt he wiþþ all hiss rihhte streon, Þatt shollde hiss trowwþe foll?henn, A butenn ende shollde ben Wiþþ Godd inn heoffness blisse. & itt wass sett þurrh Godd onn himm, Forr þatt itt shollde himm tacnenn, Þatt alle þa þatt sholldenn himm Wiþþ trowwþe & dede foll?henn, Well ?eorne birrdenn clennsenn hemm I bodi? & i sawle, ?iff þatt te?? wolldenn habbenn lott Wiþþ himm inn eche blisse. & itt wass sett onn himm þurrh Godd, Forr þatt itt shollde himm tacnenn, Þatt Godess Sune Jesu Crist To manne cumenn shollde, & wurrþenn borenn off hiss kinn Inn ure mennisscnesse, To clennsenn her þurrh Crisstenndom, Þurrh fulluhht, & þurrh læfe, An flocc þatt shollde lufenn himm & hise la?hess haldenn, Þatt shollde risenn upp off dæþ O domess da??, þatt wise Þatt tanne shollde itt lesedd ben Fra dæþess ?occ þurrh Criste, & all þweorrt út ben clennsedd ta Off flæshess unntrummnesse, Swa þatt itt shollde ben wiþþ Crist A butenn ende i blisse. & itt wass ec þurrh Drihhtin sett, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Forr þatt itt shollde clennsenn hemm Off all Adamess sinne, All all se fulluhht clennseþþ nu Þa þatt itt unnderrfanngenn. Forr all swa se??de Drihhtin þa Till þatt Judisskenn þeode, All swa summ ure Laferrd Crist Se??de till hise þeowwess, Affterr þatt he wass wurrþenn mann & spacc wiþþ menn onn eorþe. An off Drihhtiness chilldre, Swa summ þatt Goddspell kiþeþþ uss Þatt Crist himm sellf uss se??de; Her hafe icc shæwedd nu till ?uw Rihht ædi?nessess seoffne, Þatt wærenn, alls icc se??de ?uw, Þurrh tale off seoffne tacnedd; Forr tale off seoffne stannt o boc Forr mikell þing to tacnenn; Forr itt uss tacneþþ opennli?, Swa summ icc hafe shæwedd, Þa seoffne bedess þatt mann finnt Uppo þe Paterr Nossterr, & seoffne ?ifess þatt mann foþ Off Hali? An oþerr Goddspellwrihhte wass Marcuss by name nemmnedd, & he wass Goddspellwrihhte god, Acc he ne wass nan posstell. Þe þridde Goddspellwrihhte wass Lucas by name nemmnedd, & he wass Goddspellwrihhte god, Acc he ne wass nan posstell. Þe ferþe Goddspellwrihhte wass Johan, & he wass posstell. Her hafe I nemmnedd nu till ?uw Þa fowwre Goddspellwrihhtess, Þatt wærenn uss bitacnedd wel Þurrh tale off fowwerr hunndredd; Forr þe??re lif fullfremedd wass Inn alle gode dedess, All swa þe tale off hunndredd iss Fullfremedd tale nemmnedd. & tise fowwre wærenn ec Þurrh fowwre der bitacnedd, Þatt Godess þeww Ezechyel Sahh þurrh gastlike sihhþe. Þe feorþe deor þatt he þær sahh Wass inn an ærness like, Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn uss Johan þe Goddspellwrihhte, Þatt wrát uss onn hiss Goddspellboc Off Cristess Goddcunndnesse, Off-hu þe Laferrd Jesu Crist Inn hiss goddcunnde kinde A?? wass, & iss, & æfre beoþ Hiss Faderr efennmete, Allmahhti? & Allwældennd Godd Þatt alle shaffte wrohhte, Wiþþ Faderr & wiþþ Hali? Gast All an i Goddcunndnesse. & tatt wass rihht tatt ærn wass sett Onn?æn þatt Goddspellwrihhte, Þatt mast wrát onn hiss Goddspellboc Off Cristess Goddcunndnesse; Forr i þatt tatt he wrát off swillc He flæh upp inntill heoffne, Þurrh þatt he wrát her i þiss lif Off Godess depe kinde, & tær wass he full lic wiþþ ærn Þatt fle?heþþ upp full he?he. Þuss wærenn þurrh þa fowwre deor Þa fowwre menn bitacnedd Þatt wr?tenn off þe Laferrd Crist Goddspell o fowwre bokess. & tise fowwre gode menn, Wiþþ heore fowwre bokess, Sinndenn gastlike i gastli? witt An wa??n wiþþ fowwre wheoless, Þatt bereþþ i þiss middellærd Drihhtin fra land to lande; Forr wíde & síde spelledd iss Þurrh heore fowwre bokess Off ure Laferrd Jesu Crist, & hu mann birrþ himm þeowwtenn. & whære o lande summ itt iss Þatt mann off Goddspell spelleþþ, Hu mann birrþ þeowwtenn Jesu Crist & lufenn himm & drædenn, Þær iss þe Laferrd Crist himm sellf, & tiderr iss he wa??nedd Uppo þatt hall?he wa??n þatt gaþ O fowwre Goddspellwheless. Hiss name wass Amminadab, & upponn Ennglissh spæche Itt tacneþþ uss þatt mann þatt doþ God werrc wiþþ innwarrd herrte, Wiþþ mikell lusst, wiþþ all hiss mahht, Wiþþ all hiss fulle wille. & tatt mann iss Sponntaneuss O Latin spæche nemmnedd, Þatt doþ wiþþ innwarrd herrte god & all wiþþ fulle wille; & swa wass Crist sponntaneuss Inn all hiss hall?he dede, Forr all þatt he to manne comm To wurrþenn mann onn erþe, & tatt himm ummbeshorenn wass Hiss shapp o þalde wise, & tatt he rihht full herrsumm wass Till Sannte Mar?e hiss moderr, Þatt he wass fullhtnedd i þe flumm Att Sannt Johan Bapptisste, & tatt he siþþenn affterr þatt Held fasste i wilde wesste, & tatt he þurrh þe laþe gast Wass siþþenn fandedd þri??ess, & tatt he dide mikell god Wiþþ larspell & wiþþ dede, & tatt he siþþenn t?kenn wass All gilltelæs & bundenn & na??ledd uppo rodetre, & tatt he swallt o rode, & tatt he ras þe þridde da?? Off dæþess slæp to life, & stah upp inntill heffness ærd; All dide he þatt onn erþe Wiþþ innwarrd herrtess lufe & lusst, Wiþþ all hiss fulle wille; & forrþi wass he full wel þurrh Amminadab bitacnedd, Þatt tacneþþ uss þatt mann þatt doþ God werrc wiþþ innwarrd herrte, Wiþþ all hiss mahht, wiþþ mikell lusst, Wiþþ all hiss fulle wille. & þurrh Amminadabess wa??n Wass Cristess Goddspell tacnedd, Þatt iss o fowwre bokess sett Þurrh fowwre Goddspellwrihhtess; & tærfore iss Cristess Goddspell, All Cristess hall?he lare, Alls iff itt wære Cristess wa??n O fowwre Goddspell wheless. & ure Laferrd Crist himm sellf Inn ure mennisscnesse Wass tacnedd þurrh þa fowwre deor, Þatt we nu spækenn offe. Forr he wass mann forr ure ned To lesenn uss off helle. & he wass tacnedd þurrh þe leo; Forr þatt he ras onn erþe, All alls hiss lefe wille wass, Þe þridde da?? off dæþe. & he wass tacnedd þurrh þe callf; Forr he wass uppo rode All alls hiss lefe wille wass Offredd Drihhtin to lake. & he wass taccnedd þurrh þatt ærn; Forr he stah upp till heoffne O þatt da?? þatt upponn Ennglissh Iss Hall?he Þurrsda?? nemmnedd. He riseþþ upp & sahhtleþþ himm Wiþþ Godd þurrh rihht dædbote, & iss swa tacnedd þurrh þatt deor Þatt wass i leoness like, Þatt riseþþ o þe þridde da?? Affterr hiss lifess ende, & a?? himm langeþþ heþennwarrd & upp till heoffness blisse; Forr all hiss lufe & all hiss lusst Iss na??ledd upp inn heoffne, Swa þatt he þwerrt út all forrseoþ Þiss weorelldþingess sellþe, & all hiss herrte fle?heþþ upp & all forrwerrpeþþ eorþe, & iss swa tacnedd þurrh þatt deor Þatt wass inn ærness like; Forr ærn ma?? fle?henn i þe lifft Full he?he towarrd heoffne, & tacneþþ wel þatt gode mann Þatt ?eorneþþ upp to Criste. Þuss wærenn þurrh þa fowwre deor Þa fowwre menn bitacnedd, Þatt writenn off þe Laferrd Crist Goddspell o fowwre bokess. & Jesu Crist himm sellf wass ec Þurrh alle fowwre tacnedd, & illc an hali? mann þatt rihht Drihhtiness la?hess haldeþþ Wass tacnedd þurrh þa fowwre deor, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd. & alle wærenn tacnedd uss Þurrh tale off fowwerr hunndredd, Þatt wærenn þurrh þe fifte staff Off Cristess name tacnedd; Forr all þatt tatt ta fowwre deor Uss haffdenn to bitacnenn, All wass itt rihht fullfremedd þing & þwerrt út god wiþþ alle, All swa summ illc an hunndredd iss Full tale, & all fullwaxenn Swa þwerrt út, tatt itt nohht ne ma?? Þuss mihht tu swinnkenn hali? swinnc & swinnkenn Godd tocweme, & tuss þu mihht te weorelldþing Wiþþ Godess lefe winnenn, & sone summ itt wunnenn iss, Þét birrþ wislike nittenn Uppo þe sellfenn, & o þa Þatt littnenn to þin fode, Wiþþ mett & mæþ i mete & drinnch, & ec inn ?ure claþess. Rihht shriffte off þe??re sinness, & ledenn siþþenn hali? lif, & foll?henn Cristess lare, & foll?henn heoffness lihht & leom Inn alle gode dedess, & winnenn Cristess hellpe & hald & Cristess millce & are, All all swa summ þa kingess efft I þe??re rihhte we??e Fundenn forrþrihht tatt steorrneleom, Þatt ledde hemm rihht to Criste. & all þatt, tatt Herode king Badd ta þreo kingess sekenn Þatt ?unge king, & lakenn himm, & bu?henn himm o cnewwe, & cumenn efft onn?æn till himm & witenn himm to seggenn, ?iff þatt te?? haffdenn fundenn himm, Whære i þe land he wære, Forr þatt he wollde himm cumenn to To lakenn himm & lutenn, All þatt badd he þurrh swikedom & all þurrh ille wiless; Forr ?iff he mihhte findenn himm Ne wollde he nohht himm lakenn, Acc wollde himm swiþe bliþeli? Wiþþ swerdess egge cwellenn. & off þiss laþe swikedom Ne wisstenn nohht ta kingess Þatt comenn off Kalldéaland, To sekenn Crist forr gode; Forr affterr þatt uss Latin boc Þurrh hali? lare shæweþþ, Þatt mann iss fox & hinnderr?æp & full off ille wiless, Þatt haldeþþ wiþþ þe laþe gast & foll?heþþ deofless wille; & swa niss nohht tatt illke mann Þatt foll?heþþ Cristess bisne, Niss he nohht hinnderr?æp ne pratt To foll?henn ille wiless, Acc iss shepisshe & bilewhit, All clene off ille þohhtess. Þatt sallfe þatt te?? ?æfenn himm, Þatt iss Myrra ?ehatenn, Itt iss full bitterr & full be??sc, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn uss Þatt dæþess bitterrnesse Þatt Godess Sune, Allmahhti? Godd, Wass wurrþenn mann to dre?henn. Nu birrþ uss alle foll?henn well Þa Kalldewisshe kingess Wiþþ hali? lifess gastli? lac, & ec wiþþ ure trowwþe; Forr uss birrþ lefenn wel þatt Crist Iss King off alle kingess, & swa we mu?henn offrenn himm Gastlike gold to lake; & uss birrþ lefenn þatt he iss Soþ Godd i mennisscnesse, & swa we mu?henn offrenn himm Gastlike lac off recless; & uss birrþ lefenn þatt he wass Soþ mann i lif & sawle, Forr þatt he wollde þolenn dæþ Forr all mannkinne nede, & swa we mu?henn offrenn himm Gastli? þatt illke sallfe Þatt mann doþ o þe dæde lic, Swa summ ?e littlær herrdenn. & tu mihht lakenn Jesu Crist, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Wiþþ alle þise þrinne lac Þurrh þine gode þæwess. ?iff þatt tu foll?hesst witt & skill & soþ wissdomess leome, Þa lakesst tu þe Laferrd Crist Wiþþ gold i þine þæwess; Forr rihht all swa summ hord off gold Mang menn iss horde deresst, Rihht swa iss allre deresst lac Biforenn Godess ehne, ?iff þatt we foll?henn rihht tatt witt Þatt foll?heþþ Godess wille, Þatt hall?he witt tatt læreþþ uss To berr?henn ure sawle. & ?iff þu cwemesst tin Drihhtin Wiþþ bedess & wiþþ wecchess, Þa lakesst tu þin Drihhtin swa Alls itt wiþþ recless wære; Forr rihht all swa summ recless smec Iss god & swét to dowwnenn, All swa iss hali? bedesang Full swét biforenn Criste. & ?iff þatt tu þin flæshess will & hire fule lusstess Wiþþstanndesst þurrhútlike wel & cwennkesst wel & cwellesst, Þa slast tu swa þin a?henn flæsh & hire fule wille, & offresst Godd þurrh hali? þæw Þatt derewurrþe sallfe Þatt mann doþ o þe dæde lic, Þurrh þatt tu slast & cwennkesst Þin a?henn flæshess fule lusst & hire fule wille. Þuss birrþ uss alle foll?henn wel, Þurrh þæwess & þurrh trowwþe, Þa kingess þatt wiþþ þrinne lac Comenn Drihhtin to lakenn; & tuss birrþ uss þurrh hali? lif Drihhtin gastlike lakenn, Swa þatt we motenn cwemenn himm & berr?henn ure sawle. Þe?? brohhtenn Drihhtin þrinne lac To don uss tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt ure Godd iss þripell Godd Inn Allmahhti? þrimmnesse, Faderr, & Sune, & Hali? Gast, An Godd all untodæledd, Þatt æfre wass, & iss, & beoþ Wiþþutenn ord & ende, & all þatt wass, & iss, & beoþ, He shop, & ah, & steoreþþ. & ?uw birrþ unnderrstanndenn wel & lefenn wel & trowwenn, Þatt mikell flocc off oþre menn Comm forþ wiþþ þa þreo kingess Út off þe Kalldewisshe land Till Beþþleæmess chesstre. Acc Goddspellboc ne spekeþþ nohht Off all þatt oþerr genge, Acc opennlike & wel itt uss Off þa þreo kingess telleþþ, Forrþi þatt tær wass þurrh þa þreo Þe Crisstenndom bigunnenn Bitwenenn all hæþene follc Þatt þurrh þreo menn wass streonedd, Affterr þatt tatt all mannkinn wass Þurrh Noþess flod offdrunncnedd; Forr all follc wass þurrh Noþess flodd O Noþess time drunncnedd. & efft þurrh Noþess suness þreo Wass hæþenn þeode streonedd, & all hæþene follc wass þær Þurrh þa þreo kingess awwnedd; Forr þurrh þa þreo þatt comenn forþ Þe Laferrd Crist to lakenn, Þurrh hemm, swa summ icc habbe se??d, Wass Crisstenndom bigunnenn Bitwenenn þatt hæþene þeod Þatt þurrh þreo menn wass streonedd.
