Þatt hord tatt haldenn wass & hidd, & dærne & all unnawwnedd, A whil þatt ta Kalldisskenn menn Amang unnwiness wærenn, Þatt hord wass to bitacnenn uss, Þatt uss ne birrþ nohht awwnenn Hu mann birrþ lefenn uppo Godd, Ne nohht off Godess lare, Biforenn þatt unnfæle follc Þatt skirrpeþþ þær onn?æness, Biforenn þa þatt t?kenn all Onn hæþinng þatt we spellenn; Forr ?iff þe?? herenn ohht off. Godd, & skirrpenn þær onn?æness, Þa beþ hemm ?arrkedd mare inoh & werrse pine inn helle, Þann iff þe?? haffdenn herrd itt nohht Ne skarnedd tær onn?æness, & forrþi birrþ þe lokenn þe Þatt tu till hemm ne spelle, Þatt hemm ne falle þurrh þin spell Þe mare wa to dre?henn. Heroffe se??þ þe Goddspellboc Þatt Crist himm sellf þuss se??de; Ne birrþ þe nohht nan hali? þing Biforenn hundess werrpenn, Ne nohht ne birrþ þe to þe swin Werrpenn marrgrotestaness; Forr þa þatt lætenn hæþeli? Off Godess hall?he lare, Þe?? sindenn wiss hundess & swin Þurrh þe??re laþe sinness. & þurrh þatt hord tatt oppnedd wass & dra?henn forþ & awwnedd Þurrh þa þre kingess, i þatt hus Þatt Crist wass borenn inne, Þærþurrh wass uss tacnedd tatt uss Birrþ awwnenn Godess lare Till alle þa þatt lufenn itt, & ?ernenn itt to lernenn, Till alle þa þatt cumenn forþ To wurrþenn Cristess þewwess, Till alle þatt i Godess hus Þurrh soþ mecnesse turrnenn Till fulluhht & till Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe, Hemm alle uss birrþ i Godess hus Wiþþ soþ mecnesse shæwenn Hu þe??m birrþ lefenn uppo Godd, & hise la?hess haldenn. Þa þre kingess lakedenn Crist Wiþþ þrinne kinne lakess, Wiþþ recless, & wiþþ gold, & ec Wiþþ myrra, an dere sallfe, Forr þatt te?? wisstenn þatt he wass Soþ Godd i mennisscnesse, & King off alle shaffte, & ec Soþ mann þatt wollde swelltenn. & ec þa kingess comenn þa Till Crist wiþþ swillke lakess, To lihhnenn þatt lærede follc, Þatt þurrh dwallkennde lare Tahhtenn & turrndenn lawedd follc To lefenn wrang o Criste. Þe?? gæfenn Crist recless to lac, Forr þatt te?? wolldenn lihhnenn All þatt unnfæle læredd led, Þatt dide menn to trowwenn Þatt nass nohht rihht to brinngenn lac Ne toffrenn ohht till owwþerr, Till Sune, ne till Hali? Gast, Acc till þe Faderr ane. Off all þiss laþe læredd follc Þatt we nu mælenn ummbe Wass ma??stredwale, an defless þeww, Þatt Arriuss wass nemmnedd. Þe?? brohhtenn Crist off myrre lac, Forr þatt te?? wolldenn lihhnenn All þatt unnfæle læredd led, Þatt dide menn to trowwenn Þatt Jesu Crist nass næfre dæd In ure mennisscnesse. Off all þiss laþe læredd follc Þatt we de Þa þreo kingess i pe??re þohht O Drihhtin haffdenn bonedd, Þatt he þe??m ?æfe raþ þatt nahht Þurrh Hali? Gastess rune, ?iff þatt te?? sholldenn oþerr nohht Efft wendenn till Herode. & Godess Gast anndswere hem ?aff Him sellf & nohht þurh enngell, Þatt te?? ne sholldenn nohht on?æn Efft wendenn till Herode, Acc farenn ham till here land All wiþþ summ oþerr we??e. All þiss hem-se??de Godess Gast O bedde þer þe?? slepptenn, Forr þatt he wollde þurrh þatt slep Well mikell þing bitacnenn. Itt tacneþþ uss þatt alle þa Sinndenn Drihhtin full cweme, Þatt slæpenn fra þe weorrldess lusst & wakenn a?? wiþþ Criste. & tatt ta kingess forenn ham All wiþþ an oþerr we??e, Þatt uss bitacneþþ mikell þing, Þatt uss iss ned to foll?henn. Uss alle birrþ till ure land Wiþþ oþerr we??e wendenn; Ure allre land iss Paradis, Forr þeþenn út we comenn. Adam & Éve wærenn don I Paradisess riche, To libbenn a wiþþutenn dæþ, & a?? occ a?? i blisse, ?iff þatt þe?? wolldenn Godess word & Godess wille foll?henn. Acc þe?? forrlurenn Paradys Þurrh þe??re baþre gillte, Þurrh þatt te?? Godess bodeword Forrletenn & forr?emmdenn. Þe?? ba forrlurenn Paradis Þurrh laþ unnherrsummnesse; & uss birrþ cumenn efft onn?æn Þurrh luffsumm herrsummnesse; Forr uss birrþ beon fullherrsumm follc To foll?henn Godess wille, & swa we mu?henn cumenn efft Onn?æn wiþþ oþerr we??e. Þe?? ba forrlurenn Paradys Þurrh sinnfull gredi?nesse; & uss birrþ weorelldþingess lusst Forrbu?henn & forrwerrpenn, & uss birrþ foll?henn mett & mæþ I claþess & i fode, Forr swa to cumenn efft onn?æn Till Paradisess riche Wiþþ all an oþerr kinness lif, Þatt iss, wiþþ oþerr we??e. Þe?? ba forrlurenn Paradys Þurrh hefi? modinesse; & uss birrþ foll?henn soþ meocle??c Wiþþ bodi? & wiþþ herrte. Uss birrþ lætenn unnorneli? & litell off uss sellfenn, & lætenn wel off oþre menn, & lutenn hemm & lefftenn; & swa we mu?henn cumenn efft Onn?æn wiþþ oþerr we??e Till ure land i Paradys, Þurrh soþ meocnessess lade. Þe?? ba forrlurenn Paradys Þurrh sinnfull gluterrnesse, & tu þurrh mæþ i mete & drinnch Mihht winnenn efft tatt illke; Forr mikell mihhte itt hellpenn uss To winnenn heoffness blisse, ?iff þatt we wolldenn t?kenn a?? Unnorne fode & litell, & ?iff we wolldenn shunenn a?? To fillenn uss wiþþ esstess; Forr swa we mihhtenn foll?henn Crist & hise Leorninngcnihhtess, Þatt tokenn a?? wiþþ mikell mæþ & a?? unnorne fode. All þuss we mu?henn cumenn efft Till Paradysess riche Wiþþ oþerr we??e, ?iff þatt we All affterr ure mihhte A?? foll?henn Godess bodeword & a?? forrbu?hen sinne, Onn?æn þatt ta twa firrste menn Ne wolldenn nowwþerr haldenn, Ne foll?henn Godess bodeword, Ne ?emenn hemm fra sinne. Þa kingess alle forenn ham, & come þe?? na mare Till þatt unnfæle Herode king; Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn Þatt whase wile borr?enn beon & brukenn eche blisse, Himm birrþ all þwerrt út wurrþenn shadd Fra deofell & fra sinne. & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Uss ?ife þurrh hiss are To shædenn uss fra sinne swa, & fra þe deofless wille, Swa þatt we motenn borr?henn beon Att ure lifess ende. Amæn; SECUNDUM LUCAM XI. Postquam impleti sunt dies purificationis Marie. Forrþrihht se tíme comm þærto Þatt ure laffdi? Mar?e, Affterr Judisskenn la?hess boc, Þe minnstre shollde sekenn, Menn tokenn hire dere child & bærenn himm to kirrke, & leddenn hire forþ wiþþ himm, Swa summ þe boc hemm tahhte. Þe?? comenn inntill ?errsalæm & inntill Godess minnstre, Forr þatt te?? sholldenn offrenn þær Þe child o Godess allterr, Wiþþ all swillc lac alls hemm wass sett Þurrh Drihhtin þær to brinngenn. Þatt lac þatt tær wass brohht wiþþ himm Wass twe??enn cullfre briddess, Swa summ þe Goddspellwrihhte se??þ, Oþþr itt wass twe??enn turrtless. & tær wass cumenn o þatt da?? An hali? mann to minnstre, & he wass hatenn Symeon, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, & he wass full off Hali? Gast Þatt dide himm tunnderrstanndenn Þatt tatt wass Godess Sune & Godd, Þatt tær wass brohht to kirrke. & he wass an Judisskenn mann Full hali? i þatt time, & haffde ?eornedd inn hiss þohht A?? affterr Cristess come, & haffde ?eornedd a?? þatt he Swa lannge mosste libbenn, Þatt he wiþþ ehhne mihhte seon Þe Laferrd Crist onn eorþe. & Drihhtin haffde ?atedd himm Þatt bone þatt he ?eorrnde, & haffde himm se??d þurrh Hali? Gast, Þatt nohht ne shollde he swelltenn Biforenn þatt he shollde seon Crist, Godess Sune, onn eorþe. & he wass brohht þurrh Hali? Gast Þatt da?? till Godess temmple. & son se Cristess kinness menn Þær brohhtenn Crist to kirrke, Þatt hall?he were Symeon Himm toc bitwenenn arrmess, & se??de towarrd Drihhtin þuss, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ; Læt nu Drihhtin, l?t nu þin þeoww Út off þiss weorelld wendenn Wiþþ griþþ, swa summ þu me bihét, L?t me nu newenn swelltenn; Forr her I seo full witerrli? Þin Hælennd Crist onn eorþe, Þatt þurrh þin are ?arrkedd iss. Biforenn alle þeode, Till hæþenn þeode lihht & leom Off eche rihhtwisnesse, & till þiss Judewisshe follc Wurrþshipe & eche wullderr. Josæp, swa summ þe Goddspell se??þ, & Mar?e Cristess moderr Wundredenn baþe off all þatt hemm Wass cwiddedd tære off Criste. & Symeon þatt hall?he mann ?aff hemm blettsinn?e baþe, & se??de to þe laffdi? þuss, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Þiss child iss borenn her to þann Þatt f?le shulenn fallenn, & f?le shulenn risenn upp I þiss Judisskenn þeode. & tiss child iss to merrke sett Bitwenenn menn onn eorþe, & mani? mann þiss merrke shall Wiþþstanndenn & wiþþseggenn. & te shall þurrh þiss childess swerd Þurrhwundedd beon þin sawle, Þurrh whamm shall mani? dærne þohht Beon oppnedd all & awwnedd. & ec þær comm an widdwe forþ Þatt wass Drihhtin full cweme, & ?ho wass full off Hali? Gast To spekenn þær off Criste, & ?ho spacc þære off Crist till þa Þatt ?eorrndenn Cristess come, & se??de hemm whatt tatt wennchell wass, & whatt he shollde forþenn. Þatt widdwe wass an hali? wif, & ?ho wass hatenn Anne, & ?ho wass clene ma??dennmann Þatt da?? þatt ?ho toc macche; & siþþenn wass ?ho sefenn ?er God wif wiþþ hire macche. & tanne comm hiss endeda?? & ?ho bilæf o life. & affter þatt tatt he wass dæd Ne toc ?ho wiþþ nan oþerr, Acc ledde siþþenn widdwe lif Inn alle gode þæwess. & ?ho wass, þatt witt tu full wel, A?? siþþenn att te temmple, To þeowwtenn Godd wiþþ bedesang, Wiþþ fasstinng & wiþþ wecche. & ?ho wass sexti? winnterr ald & fowwre & twennti? þanne; & hire faderr Fanuæl Wass off Asæress ma??þe, & Asær wass, þatt witt tu wel, An off þe Patriarrkess. & ?ho spacc off þatt little child Þatt tær wass brohht to kirrke, Off þatt he wass Allmahhti? Godd, & mann i lif & sawle. & affterr þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass offredd tær wiþþ lakess, & affterr þatt te?? haffdenn don All þatt te boc hemm tahhte, Þe?? wenndenn ham wiþþ heore child, & feddenn himm wiþþ blisse, All alls hiss lefe wille wass Þatt menn himm sholldenn fosstrenn. & te??re child, te Laferrd Crist, Wel wex, & wel wass frofredd; & he wass full off Godess witt, & full off Godess wille; Her endenn twa Goddspelless þuss, & uss birrþ hemm þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt te?? lærenn uss Off ure sawle nede. Rihht o þatt da?? þatt Crist wass off Fowwerrti? da?hess elde, Rihht o þatt da?? þe?? brohhtenn himm Wiþþ lac till Godess allterr; & tatt da?? mang Ennglisshe menn Iss Kanndellmesse nemmnedd. & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Þa wollde, þatt hiss moderr Swa shollde to þe kirrke gan, & Godess la?he fillenn, Swa summ ?ho shollde clennsedd beon, ?ho þatt wass þwerrt út clene, ?ho þatt wass clene ma??denn þa & siþþenn butenn ende, Þatt dide he, forr he wollde swa Þurrh himm & þurrh hiss moderr Uss alle samenn brinngenn onn To foll?henn þe??re bisne, To foll?henn Godess la?hess wel A?? affterr ure mihhte; Forr þatt iss ure Crisstenndom Þatt shall uss alle berr?henn, ?iff þatt we Cristess la?hess rihht Wiþþ innwarrd herrte foll?henn. Þatt lac þatt offredd wass wiþþ Crist Wass twe??enn cullfre briddess, Swa summ þe Goddspell telleþþ uss, Oþþr itt wass twe??enn turrtless, Þatt wass þatt lac þatt ta wass sett, Amang Judisskenn þeode, Þurrh Drihhtin sellfenn to þatt wif Þatt usell wass & wædle. To riche wif Godd haffde sett An lamb & ec an cullfre, & ?iff ?ho naffde cullfre nan Þa toc ?ho lamb & turrtle. & a?? ?ho brohhte twinne lac, Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn Þatt her iss twinne lufe sett Bitwenenn menn onn eorþe; Forr uss birrþ lufenn Godd & mann, Swa summ þe Goddspell tæcheþþ, Forr swa to winnenn resste & ro & eche lifess blisse. Þe lamb bitacneþþ uss þatt uss Birrþ ure Drihhtin cnawenn, & lufenn himm, & foll?henn himm, & herrcnenn hise spelless, & iwhillc an birrþ milde beon & follhsumm towarrd oþerr. & swa we mu?henn alle imæn Þe lambess bisne foll?henn; Forr lamb iss soffte & stille deor, & liþe & meoc & milde, & itt cann cnawenn swiþe wel Hiss moderr þær ?ho blæteþþ, Bitwenenn an þusennde shep Þohh þatt te?? blætenn alle. & uss birrþ all swa cnawenn Godd Bitwenenn alle shaffte, & uss birrþ witenn whatt iss Godd, & whatt iss Godess shaffte, & all hu mann birrþ þeowwtenn Godd Himm ane, & nohht hiss shaffte. Þiss birrþ uss unnderrstanndenn all, Þatt ure nan ne þurrfe Út off þe rihhte we??e gan Wiþþ dede, ne wiþþ trowwþe. Þe laffdi? lac wass litell lac Forrþi þatt ?ho wass wædle, Acc itt wass god biforenn Godd, Forr ?ho wass Godd full cweme; & itt bitacneþþ mikell þing, Þatt uss Cullfre ne lifeþþ nohht bi flessh, Ne bi nan þing þatt de?eþþ, & te birrþ ?emenn þe full wel Fra dæde werrkess alle, Fra depe sinness þatt tu mahht Wel nemmnenn dæde werrkess; Forr sinness dra?henn sinnfull mann Till helledæþ onn ende, Butt iff he mu?he hemm i þiss lif Birewenn Crist tocweme. libbenn, & murrcnenn affterr Drihhtin Crist, & foll?henn swa þe turrtle. & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Wass, alls icc habbe shæwedd, Firrst ummbeshorenn onn hiss shapp, & siþþenn brohht to kirrke, Þatt uss bitacneþþ witerrli? Þurrh opennlike bisne, Þatt whase wile cumenn inn Till heofennrichess kirrke, Himm birrþ all ummbeshorenn beon & clennsedd all off sinne; Forr all þatt cumeþþ upp till Godd All itt iss þwerrt út clene. O Moysæsess la?he stod, Swa summ itt Drihhtin sette, Þatt all þatt hemm wass borenn firrst Off ahhte þatt wass clene, Þe firrste callf, þe firrste lamb, Þe firrste kide, & swillke, All þatt wass clene deor, all þatt Þatt mann ma?? etenn offe, All shollde beon to Drihhtin Godd Upponn hiss allterr offredd. & all þatt wass unnclene deor, Off horrs, off asse, off swillke, All þatt mann shollde biggen út Wiþþ fife wehhte off sillferr. & tatt wass sett þurrh Drihhtin Godd Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn, Þatt te birrþ seggenn wiþþ þin muþ, & ec wiþþ innwarrd herrte, Þatt all þin clene dede iss don Þurrh Godd & þurrh hiss hellpe; & swa þe birrþ itt offrenn Godd Þurrh þatt te birrþ wel trowwenn, Þatt Drihhtin setteþþ i þin þohht God dede to biginnenn, Swa þatt itt all bigunnenn iss & forþedd þurrh hiss hellpe. & te birrþ biggenn út att Godd All þin unnclene dede, & all þe birrþ itt biggenn út Wiþþ fife wehhte off sillferr, Þatt iss, þatt te birrþ biggenn út All þin missdede & sinne Þurrh rihht dædbote, þatt birrþ beon O fife wise forþedd. Forr whase wile clennsenn himm & wiþþ hiss Godd himm sahhtlenn, Himm birrþ off all hiss sinne beon Þurrh fiffald pine clennsedd; Forr himm birrþ forr þe lufe off Godd, & forr hiss woh to betenn, O fife wise pinenn her Hiss bodi? & hiss sawle; Forr himm birrþ lokenn himm þatt he Ne seo nan þing wiþþ sinne; & tatt iss, butt an wunnderr beo, An lott off hefi? shriffte. & himm birrþ lokenn himm þatt he Ne lisste nohht wiþþ ære Till naness kinness idellle??c, Þatt hali? mann forrwerrpeþþ; & tatt iss wiss an oþerr lott Off god & hali? shriffte. & himm birrþ lokenn himm full wel Fra luffsumm æte & wæte, & himm birrþ takenn fode & claþ Unnorne & litell baþe; & tatt iss wiss þe þridde lott Off god & hefi? shriffte. & himm birrþ lokenn himm þatt he Ne ?eorne nohht to dowwnenn Wiþþ sinne naness kinness þing, Þatt hafeþþ swete stinnchess; & tatt iss wiss þe feorþe lott Off god & hali? shriffte. & himm birrþ lokenn himm þatt he Ne gillte nohht wiþþ wille, Ne þurrh hiss þohht, ne þurrh hiss word, Ne þurrh hiss bodi? dede; & tatt iss wiss þe fifte lott Off god & hali? shriffte. Þuss birrþ himm forr þe lufe off Godd, & forr hiss woh to betenn, O fife wise pinenn her Hiss bodi? & hiss sawle, & biggenn út att Drihhtin swa All hiss unnclene dede Þurrh rihht shriffte, þatt birrþ beon þuss O fife wise forþedd, All all swa summ þe la?heboc Badd Issraæle þeode A?? biggenn út unnclene deor Wiþþ fife wehhte off sillferr. O Moysæsess la?he stod, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd, Þatt a?? þe?? sholldenn brinngenn lac Wiþþ child till Godess allterr, Wiþþ cnapechild, wiþþ ma??dennchild, Wiþþ baþe onn ane wise. Þe lac wass lamb & cullfre bridd, Oþþr itt wass lamb & turtle; & ?iff ?ho wass summ wædle wif Þatt lamb ne mihhte winnenn, Þa brohhte ?ho wiþþ hire child Twa cullfress oþerr turrtless. All þiss wass sett þurrh Drihhtin Godd Forr mikell þing to tacnenn; Forr cnapechild bitacneþþ uss Strang mahht i gode dedess, & ma??dennchild bitacneþþ uss Wac mahht i gode dedess, Forr sume foll?henn i þiss lif All þwerrt út gode dedess, & sinndenn þurrh þe cnapechild Full opennli? bitacnedd; Forr cnapechild iss afledd wel Affterr weppmanne kinde. & sume sinndenn i þiss lif Off miccle lasse mahhte, & foll?henn affterr þe??re mahht Þohhwheþþre Godess wille, & sinndenn þurrh þe ma??dennchild Full opennli? bitacnedd; Forr ma??denn child iss all unnstrang Affterr wifmanne kinde. & a?? wass lamb wiþþ e??þerr child O Godess allterr offredd, & lamb iss all unnskaþefull & stille deor & milde, & whase wile lakenn Godd Wiþþ hise gode dedess, Himm birrþ beon all unnskaþefull, & soffte, & meoc, & milde. & a?? wass cullfre wiþþ þe lamb Onn allterr-oþerr turrtle; Forr iwhillc mann birrþ wepenn her, & sikenn sare & suhh?henn, & beon well swiþe sare offdredd, Þatt all hiss gode dede Ne mune himm nohht beon god inoh To berr?henn himm fra pine. & wop wass uss bitacnedd wel Þurrh cullfre & turrtle baþe; Forr þe??re sang iss lic wiþþ wop, Þatt w?tenn menn ino?he. & ?iff þatt ?ho wass wædle wif Þatt lamb ne mihhte winnenn, Þa wass þe lac wiþþ hire child Off twe??enn cullfre briddess, Swa summ þe Goddspellwrihhte se??þ, Oþþr itt wass twe??enn turrtless. & ?iff þu Drihhtin nohht ne mihht ?ét lakenn himm tocweme, Swa summ þe wære ned, wiþþ lamb Off soþ unnshaþi?nesse, Þatt iss, ?iff þu ne mahht nohht ?ét All ?emenn þe fra sinne, Þa loc þu þatt tu lake Godd Wiþþ twe??enn cullfre briddess, Þatt iss-wiþþ twinne kinne wop Forþ wiþþ þin gode dede; Loc þatt tu wepe da??whammli? Forr all þin unnclænnesse, & wep forr þatt tu narrt nohht ?ét Inn heoffne inn eche blisse. Þuss mihht tu wel wiþþ twinne wop Drihhtin tocweme lakenn, ?iff þatt iss þatt tu wepesst rihht O þise twinne wise. & te birrþ habbenn twinne wop ?ét onn an oþerr wise, & tu mihht lakenn Godd tærwiþþ Well swiþe wel tocweme, ?iff þatt iss þatt tu þwerrt út wel Wepesst onn e??þerr wise; Forr þe birrþ beon full sare offdredd Off helless grimme pine, & te birrþ ?eorne stanndenn inn To betenn þine sinness, Wiþþ serr?he & sít, wiþþ bitter wop, & ec wiþþ hefi? shriffte, To sahhtlenn þe wiþþ þin Drihhtin Forr helle to forrbu?henn. & affterr þatt tu clennsedd arrt Off alle þine sinness, All affterr þatt te preost te badd Þatt tu þe sholldesst clennsenn, Þa siþþenn iss þin hope o Godd Þatt tu wiþþ himm arrt sahhtledd; & siþþenn ?ifeþþ he þe mahht To lusenn himm wiþþ herrte, Þurrh þatt tu didesst all þin mahht To betenn þine sinness. & forrþi þatt te þinnkeþþ wiss Þatt tu wiþþ himm arrt sahhtledd, Off nan þing elless niss þe nohht Butt off þatt an þing ane, To stanndenn inn to cwemenn himm Onn alle kinne wise; Noff nan þing narrt tu þa forrdredd Butt off þatt an þing ane, Off þatt tu shule wraþþenn himm O sume kinne wise. Þuss mahht tu wel wiþþ twinne wop Þin Godd tocweme lakenn, ?iff þatt iss þatt tu wepesst rihht O þise twinne wise. Þær ure Laferrd Crist wass brohht To kirrke wiþþ hiss moderr, Þær comenn forrþ to lofenn himm An weppmann & an widdwe, & forr he wollde litell. & forrþi lét he cwellenn þa Þe miccle & ec þe little, Þatt Crist ne shollde mu?henn himm O nane wise attwindenn. Þa chilldre þatt he cwellenn lét Bitacnenn all þatt genge, Þatt fra þatt da?? till þiss fór upp Þurrh marrtirdom till Criste, Þatt genge þatt wass milde & meoc, & ædmod all se chilldre, & all wiþþutenn modi?le??c, & all wiþþutenn braþþe, & clene off hete & clene off niþ, & clene off gredi?nesse, & off galnesse skir & fre & all off ille wiless, All all swa summ þe ?unge child Iss clene off swillke sinness. & tatt ta chilldre swulltenn þær Off twe??enn ?eress elde, Þatt uss bitacneþþ opennli? Þatt all þatt hall?he genge, Þatt borr?henn iss þurrh marrtirdom, Flæh upp wiþþ twe??enn wengess, Þurrh þatt te?? cwemmdenn Jesu Crist Wiþþ spelless & wiþþ dedess. Herode king bitacneþþ uss Þe laþe gast off helle; & he ma?? wel bitacnenn himm Whamm he stod inn to foll?he. Forr all swa summ þe laþe gast A?? niþþreþþ Godess genge, & cwelleþþ hemm & wannseþþ hemm, Þurrh hise unnfæle þeowwess, All swa þatt laþe Herode king Þurrh hise laþe þeowwess Offcwalde, forr to cwellenn Crist, Þa gilltelæse chilldre. & þurrh þatt tatt Herode king Lét slæn þa little barrness, Þærþurrh wass uss bitacnedd wel All onn an oþerr wise, Þatt ifell gast ma?? oferr þa Þatt foll?henn barrness þæwess Inn illc unnwitt, inn illc unnitt, Inn ægede & i le??kess. Forr Latin boc uss se??þ full wel Þatt tatt mann iss forrwarr?edd Þatt iss an hunndredd winnterr ald, & foll?heþþ childess gæress. & off þiss illke se??de þuss Þe posstell Sannte Pawell; A?? whil þatt I wass litell child Icc held o childess þæwess, & son summ icc wass waxenn mann, Þa flæh I childess cosstess. & uss birrþ alle samenn wel Hiss hall?he bisne foll?henn, & all forrwerrpenn illc unnitt Off ægede & off le??kess, & uss birrþ beon full ho?hefull Abutenn ure sawless. Herode king ma?? swiþe wel Þe laþe gast bitacnenn; Forr all hiss werrc & all hiss will Wass ifell gast full cweme, & onn himm sellfenn wass inoh Hiss a?henn sinne sene; Forr wel biforenn þatt he swallt Wass himm þatt wa bigunnenn, Þatt he shall dre?henn a?? occ a?? Inn helle wiþþ þe deofell; Forr he warrþ seoc, & he bigann To rotenn busenn eorþe, & tohh he toc wiþþ mete swa Þatt nan ne mihhte himm fillenn, & swa he stannc þatt iwhillc mann Wass himm full laþ to nehh?henn; & all himm wærenn fét & þeos Tobollenn & toblawenn. Þa læchess þatt himm comenn to & himm ne mihhtenn hælenn He sloh, & se??de þatt te?? himm Ne kepptenn nohht to berr?henn. & he toc iwhillc hæfedd mann Off all hiss kineriche, & lét hemm stekenn inn an hus, & haldenn swiþe fasste, & badd tatt mann hemm shollde slæn, Son summ he shollde de?enn. He þohhte þatt mann munnde beon Off hiss dæþ swiþe bliþe, & wisste þatt mann munnde þa Forr hemm full sare wepenn, & wollde swa þatt all þe follc Þatt time shollde wepenn, Þatt mann himm shollde findenn dæd Þohh itt forr himm ne wære; Loc nu ?iff he wass deofless þeoww & all i deofless walde. & he ?aff hise cnihhtess þa Fiffti? be??sannz to mede; Forr þatt te?? sholldenn att hiss dæþ Þa riche menn offcwellenn. Acc whatt forrþi nass þatt nohht don Affterr hiss laþe wille, Forr nollde nan mann cwellenn hemm Þatt da?? þatt he toc ende. & ?ét he dide mare inoh Off deofellshine o life, Ær þann he ?aff hiss fule gast To farenn inntill helle; He wollde himm sellfenn wiþþ an cnif Offcwellenn, ?iff he mosste; Loc ?iff he wass inoh bitahht Þe laþe gast off helle. He badd himm brinngenn ænne cnif An appell forr to shrædenn, & se??de þatt himm lisste þa Wel etenn off an appell; & mann þa brohhte cnif himm to, & he þa toc itt sone, & icchedd himm a litell upp & wollde himm sellfenn mirrþrenn, Acc mann grap þa þatt cnif himm fra To reddenn himm fra dæþe, & tokenn alle samenn þa To wepenn & to wanenn, Forr þatt he wiþþ hiss a?henn hannd Himm sellfenn wollde cwellenn. & an off hise suness wass Anntipater ?ehatenn; & he wass i cwarrterrne þa Onnfasst te kingess bure, Þær he wass þurrh hiss faderr ær Wiþþ mikell wraþþe worrpenn. & te??re wop & te??re ræm Comm full wel till hiss ære, & he þa forr hiss faderr dæþ Wel wennde þatt te?? wepptenn, & he warrþ swiþe bliþe þa, & toc to lahh?henn lhude. & mann þa se??de þatt te king, & he warrþ wraþ & bollghenn, & badd tatt mann himm sollde anan Wiþþ swerdess egge cwellenn; & tatt wass þanne sone don To forþenn himm hiss wille. & twe??enn haffde he l?tenn ær Off hise suness cwellenn, Ær þann þatt ifell comm himm to Þatt held himm þa swa fasste. Hiss feorrþe sune he ?aff þe land & sette himm þær to kinge, & he wass, þatt witt tu full wel, Arrchelauss ?ehatenn. & ?ét he haffde suness ma, Acc himm he ?aff þatt crune, To weldenn all hiss kinedom Affterr hiss lifess ende; & affterr þatt ta wass he dæd Inn all hiss miccle sinne. Acc þær wass mikell oferrgarrt & modi?nesse shæwedd Abutenn þatt stinnckennde lic, Þær itt wass brohht till eorþe; Forr all þe bære wass bile??d Wiþþ bætenn gold & sillferr, & all itt wass e??whær bisett Wiþþ deorewurrþe staness, & all þatt wæde þatt tær wass Uppo þe bære fundenn, All wass itt off þe bettste pall Þatt ani? mann ma?? a?henn, & all itt wass wundenn wiþþ gold & sett wiþþ deore staness, & all he wass wurrþlike shridd, Alls iff he wære o life, & onn hiss hæfedd wærenn twa Gildene cruness sette, & himm wass sett inn hiss rihht hannd An dere kine?errde; & swa mann barr þatt fule lic Till þær he bedenn haffde. & hise cnihhtess alle imæn Forþ ?edenn wiþþ þe bære, Wiþþ heore wæpenn alle bun, Swa summ þe?? sholldenn fihhtenn. Þatt oþerr follc all ?ede bun, Swa summ itt birrþ, wiþþ like. & ec þær ?edenn wiþþ þe lic Full wel fif hunndredd þewwess, To strawwenn gode gresses þær, Þatt stunnkenn swiþe swete, Biforenn þatt stinnkennde lic Þær menn itt berenn sholldenn. & tuss þe?? alle brohhtenn himm Wiþþ mikell modi?nesse Till þær þær he pe??m haffde se??d Þatt te?? himm brinngenn sholldenn. Swillc mann wass þatt Herode king Þatt let te chilldre cwellenn, Forr þatt he wollde cwellenn Crist Amang hemm, ?iff he mihhte. Acc Cristess time nass nohht ?ét Þatt he ?ét wollde swelltenn, & forrþi sloh Herode king All rihht forr nohht ta chilldre. He sloh þa chilldre gilltelæs, & itt hemm comm to blisse, Þe?? gæfenn heore shorrte lif Forr eche lifess blisse. Off hemm iss writenn o Latin, Þatt te?? inn heoffness blisse A foll?henn ure Laferrd Crist Whatt gate summ he ganngeþþ; & tatt iss se??d forrþi þatt te?? Himm sinndenn swiþe like, Forr þatt te?? ferrdenn off þiss lif I clene unnwemmeddnesse. & affterr þatt Herode king Wass witenn út off life, Wiþþ all swillc ende alls he wass wurrþ Þurrh hise depe sinness, Hiss sune toc forrþrihht anan Þær affterr himm to rixlenn, Þatt Arrchelauss nemmnedd wass, Swa summ ?e littlær herrdenn. & he wass Drihhtin swiþe laþ & deofell swiþe dere Þurrh hæþenndom, & þurrh hiss lif Þatt all wass full off sinness. & he wass o þe tende ?er Fra þatt he toc to rixlenn Biforr þe Romanisshe king Full hefilike wre?edd, & himm wass þa þe kinedom Forr hise gilltess ræfedd, & he wass flemmd & drifenn út All affterr hise wrihhte, Þurrh Rome burrh?ess Kaserrking Þatt Augustuss wass nemmnedd, Þatt flemmde himm út forrþi þatt he Wass ifell mann wiþþ alle, & modi? mann att oferrdon, & grimme wiþþ þe leode. & he wass drifenn út forrþi Off all þe kineriche, & he flæh inntill oþerr land Þatt nemmnedd wass Vienne, & tære he wass unnorneli?, & tære he toc hiss ende. & loc nu ?iff Crisstene king Birrþ beon rihhtwis & milde, & god wiþþ all hiss follc þatt iss Inn all hiss kineriche, Þatt he ne beo biforenn Godd Haldenn & tald forr werrse Þann þatt hæþene Kaserrking, Þatt draf all út off lande An mahhti? king & riche king & rihht forr nan þing elless, Butt forr þatt he wass modi? mann & grimme wiþþ hiss leode; & siþþenn wass þe kinedom O fowwre daless dæledd, Þær i þe Judewisshe land Þatt Arrchelauss haffde. & Arrchelawess breþre þreo Þreo daless unnderrfengenn Att Rome burr?ess Kaserrking, Þatt tær wass oferrlaferrd; Þe feorþe dale wass bitahht Pilate Pontiwisshe. Herode king off Galileo Wass Arrchelawess broþerr, & himm þe land off Galileo Wass all bitahht to gætenn. & an Filippe an hæfedd mann Wass Arrchelawess broþerr, & twe??enn landess wærenn himm Bitahhte forr to gætenn, Þatt an land wass Yturea & Trachonys þatt oþerr. & Lysias an hæfedd mann Wass Arrchelawess broþerr, & himm wass sett, tatt witt tu wel, To ?emenn & to gætenn Þurrh Rome king an land tatt wass ?ehatenn Abyline. Judealand & ?errsalæm Wass all bitahht Pilate, Acc he nass nohht ta breþre sibb, Ne nohht off þe??re birde; Forr he wass off Ponntisske land, Off all an oþerr leode. O þise fowwre menness da?? Bigann Johan Bapptisste, I wesste bi þe flumm Jorrdan, To fullhtnenn & to spellenn. O þatt Kaseress da?? þatt wass Tyberiuss ?ehatenn, Onn hiss fiftende ?er fra þatt Þatt he bigann to rixlenn I Rome riche, toc Johan To fullhtnenn & to spellenn Off Godess Sune, Crist, tatt he Þa shollde cumenn newenn, To leosenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe deofless walde, & turrnenn menn till Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe, & tæchenn hemm & hellpenn hemm To winnenn heoffness blisse, Þurrh soþ & rihht, þurrh witt & skill, Þurrh mett & soþ meocnesse, Þurrh clene þohht & word & weorrc, Þurrh lufe & hope & læfe. & o þa fowwre menness da?? Þatt tokenn all þatt riche, Þatt wass biræfedd Arrchelaw All forr hiss modi?nesse, O þe??re da?? wass att te flumm Crist, Godess Sune, fullhtnedd. & hemm wass all þe kinedom O fowwre daless dæledd, Swa summ þe Romanisshe king Itt haffde þanne dæledd, Þatt ta wass Kaserr oferr hemm & oferr f?le kingess. & off þa fowwre riche menn Þatt tokenn þa to rixlenn, Off hemm wass an Herode king, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd, & he wass ifell mann inoh, & wel itt wass himm kinde. & o þatt lattre Herodess da?? Wass Crist o rode pinedd, & he wass att tatt illke ræd, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, & tatt himm comm till hefi? wa Þurrh Godess rihhtwisnesse. & Godd Allmahhti? ?ife uss swa To foll?henn Cristess lare, Swa þatt we motenn wurrþi ben To winnenn Cristess are. Amæn. SECUNDUM MATHEUM XIIII. Defuncto autem Herode, ecce angelus Domini apparuit in sompnis Joseph dicens, Surge accipe puerum et matrem ejus, et vade in terram Israel. Affterr þatt tatt Herode king Wass endedd inn hiss sinne, Drihhtiness enngell comm anan Till Josæp inn Egippte, & tær he comm till himm o nahht & fand himm þanne o slæpe, & tære he spacc anan wiþþ himm & se??de þuss wiþþ worde; Josæp, ris upp & tacc þe child, & tacc þe childess moderr, & farr till Issraæless land Inntill þin a?henn birde; Forr alle þa þatt hafenn sohht Þe child, forr himm to cwellenn, Nu sinndenn dæde & farenn út Off life i þe??re sinness. & he ras up & toc þe child, & toc þe childess moderr, & fór till Issraæless land Inntill hiss a?henn birde. & alls he comm onn?æn well neh Inntill hiss a?henn birde, Mann se??de himm þa þatt Arrchelaw Wass hofenn upp to kinge, To rixlenn i Judealand Affterr hiss faderr ende; & he ne durrste nohht forrþi Inntill þatt ende liþenn. & himm wass se??d o slæpe þa Onn hiss Drihhtiness hallfe, Þatt he þa shollde wiþþ þe child & wiþþ þe childess moderr Inntill þe land off Galileo Flittenn, & tær bilefenn. & he for þiderr sone anan & comm þær till an chesstre Þatt wass ?ehatenn Nazaræþ, & tær bilæf he þanne, To fillenn þatt tatt cwiddedd wass Forrlannge þurrh prophete, Þatt Godess Sune shollde beon Bitwenenn menn onn eorþe Nemmnedd te Nazarisshe mann, Off Nazaræþess chesstre. Her endeþþ nu þiss Goddspell þuss & uss birrþ itt þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt itt læreþþ uss Off ure sawle nede. Rihht o þatt ?er wass Crist full neh Off ehhte ?eress elde Þatt he comm off Egippte land Till Nazaræþess chesstre; Forr sefenn winnterr haffde he beon Tosamenn inn Egippte, & he wass, þanne he þiderr for, Neh off an ?eress elde. Þatt Jesu Crist comm efft onn?æn Inntill hiss a?henn birde, Son summ þatt laþe Herode king & ta þatt wiþþ himm heldenn Inn heore sinness fellenn dun, & forenn inntill helle, Þatt uss bitacneþþ witerrli? Þurrh all full openn bisne Þatt Cristess hird, Cristene follc, Shall farenn inntill heoffne & inntill Paradisess ærd, Inntill þe??re a?henn birde. Forr affterr þatt te laþe gast & alle þatt himm foll?henn Þurrh Drihhtin shulenn worrpenn beon Dun inntill hellepine. & tatt shall beon o Domess da??, Swa shall itt tanne wharrfenn Bitwennen Cristess hall?he þeod & deofless laþe genge. Forr þa shall all þe deofless hird Till helle wiþþ þe deofell, & siþþenn shall all Cristess hird Wiþþ Crist till heoffne wendenn. Þurrh þatt tatt enngell se??de þuss Till Josæp þær he sleppte, Farr inntill Issraæless land Wiþþ Crist & wiþþ hiss moderr, Þurrh þatt ne mihhte nohht Josæp Inoh wel unnderrstanndenn Inntill whillc ende off all þatt land He badd himm þanne liþenn. & forrþi wollde he farenn þa Wiþþ Crist & wiþþ hiss moderr Inntill þe land off ?errsalæm, & tære he wollde biggenn Att Godess temmple i ?errsalæm, & onnfasst tær abutenn; Forr þatt himm þuhhte mikell rihht, Þatt Godess Sune birrde Beon att te temmple þær þær Godd Wass lofedd a?? & wurrþedd. Acc whatt forrþi ne durrste he nohht Inntill þatt ende wendenn Son summ he wisste off Arrchelaw, Þatt he þær haffde mahhte, Þatt he wass hofenn upp to king Inn all hiss faderr riche; Forr þatt he wisste wel inoh Þatt Arrchelauss munnde All all swa mirrþrenn þe??re child, ?iff þatt he mihhte himm findenn, All alls hiss faderr haffde don, ?iff þatt hét haffde fundenn; & he wass orraþ þa summ del Off-whær he mihhte biggenn. & Godess enngell comm himm to & se??de himm þa to wisse Whillc ende off Issraæless land He shollde þanne sekenn, To biggenn þær all stilleli? Wiþþ Crist & wiþþ hiss moderr. Þatt wass þe land off Galileo Þatt himm wass bedenn sekenn, Forrþi þatt Arrchelaw þe king Þær munnde cumenn seldenn; Forr ?errsalæm wass hæfedd burrh Off Issraæless riche, & tær wass þe??re king a?? mast, & seldenn owwhær elless; & Galilew wass feorr þær fra Út inn an oþerr ende, & forrþi mihhte þær þe child Full dærnelike biggenn, Swa þatt himm Arrchelaw þe king Ne munnde þær nohht sekenn. Þatt chesstre þatt te Laferrd Crist Comm till, forr þær to biggenn, Bitacneþþ uss þatt little flocc Off þatt Judisskenn þeode, Þatt little flocc þatt toc wiþþ Crist & wiþþ þe rihhte læfe, & wiþþ þe rihhte Crisstenndom, Þurrh Cristess Leorninngcnihhtess, Affterr þatt da?? þatt Crist himm sellf Wass sti?henn upp till heoffne. Þe Laferrd haffde litell rum Inn all þatt miccle riche ?ét tanne, & forrþi mihhte itt wel Þatt little flocc bitacnenn Þatt toc to lefenn uppo Crist Þurrh Cristess posstless lare, Affterr þatt tatt te Laferrd Crist Wass sti?henn upp till heoffne. Þatt Josæp barr þe Laferrd Crist Wiþþ Sannte Mar?e hiss moderr, Firrst út off Issraæless land Inntill hæþene Egippte, & tatt he barr himm efft onn?æn Inntill hiss a?henn birde, Inntill Judisskenn þeode land Út off hæþene Egippte, Þatt wass don þurrh þe Laferrd Crist Forr mikell þing to tacnenn. Josæþ himm sellf bitacneþþ her Þe Laferrd Cristess posstless, Þatt bærenn ure Laferrd Crist Wiþþ spelles & wiþþ werrkess Fra land to land, fra tun to tun, Fra wic to wic i tune. & allre firrst te?? bærenn himm Út off hiss a?henn birde, Út off Judisskenn þeode land, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Inntill hæþene follkess land Affterr Josæpess bisne. Forr affterr þatt tatt Jesu Crist Wass sti?henn upp till heoffne, Þatt laþe Judewisshe follc All masst forrwarrp to lefenn Onn ure Laferrd Jesu Crist, Þurrh heore depe sinness. & forr þatt te?? forrwurrpenn þa To lefenn uppo Criste, Þe posstless forenn sone anan Till hæþenn follc to spellenn, & bærenn swa þe Laferrd Crist Útt off hiss a?henn birde, Útt off Judisskenn follkess land Inntill hæþene þeode, Þurrh þatt te?? taldenn spell off himm & off hiss Goddcunndnesse. & he shall ?ét beon borenn efft Inntill hiss a?henn birde; Inntill Judisskenn follkess land Shall Crist ?ét wurrþenn flittedd, Þurrh þa þatt shulenn foll?henn wel Þe sloþ off Cristess posstless. Forr ?ét shall Issraæle þeod, Þurrh þatt mann shall hemm spellenn, Beon turrnedd till þe Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe. Acc a?? fra þatt te Laferrd Crist Himm sellf hemm toc to spellenn, A?? siþþenn fareþþ all þatt follc Till helle þatt tær de?eþþ. & tatt shall lasstenn a?? occ a?? Till þatt mann shall hemm turrnenn Till fulluhht & till Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe. & tatt shall beon, þatt witt tu wel, Onn Anntecristess time, Þatt mann shall spellenn to þatt follc, & turrnenn hemm to Criste. & Crist beoþ þanne borenn efft Inntill hiss a?henn birde, Þatt time þatt tatt illke follc Þatt he wass borenn offe Beoþ turrnedd till þe Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe, Þurrh þatt mann shall hemm spellenn þa Off Cristess Goddcunndnesse. & ta þatt shulenn þanne onnfon To lefenn uppo Criste, Þe?? shulenn habbenn eche lif Wiþþ alle Godess hall?henn. & ta þatt shulenn spellenn hemm & turrnenn hemm to Criste, Þa shulenn beon off heore kinn, & off þatt illke þeode, & forrþi shulenn þe?? þe bett Till þe??re lare lisstenn, & turrnenn till þe Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe. Twa gode menn, þatt wærenn her Biforenn Cristess come & ?ét abidenn i þiss lif, Hemm shulenn þanne spellenn, & turrnenn hemm till Cristenndom To lefenn uppo Criste. & off þa twa þatt an shall beon Helyas þe prophete, Þatt oþerr off þa twa shall beon E??noc þe patriarrke. E??noc wass an full hali? mann & Drihhtin swiþe cweme, & Godd himm ledde awe?? fra menn Wiþþ bodi? & wiþþ sawle, I fell & flæsh wiþþutenn dæþ, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Biforenn þatt tatt all mannkinn Þurrh Noþess flod wass drunncnedd; & he iss i þiss middellærd Whær summ itt iss onn eorþe, Þær Drihhtin Godd himm hafeþþ don To libbenn þære i blisse. Þreo hunndredd winnterr wass he ald & fife & sexti? mare, Þatt ?er þatt he wass takenn út Þurrh Drihhtin Godd fra manne; & tære shall he beon þær Godd Himm hafeþþ don i blisse, Anan till þatt tatt Anntecrist Shall borenn beon onn eorþe. & he shall þanne cumenn forþ Wiþþ Helyas hiss fere, To fihhtenn Anntecrist onn?æn All affterr Godess wille. Helyas wass an hali? mann, & an off þa prophetess Þatt cwiddedenn þurrh Hali? Gast All þatt tatt wurrþenn shollde. Twa menn he dide þurrh Drihhtin To risenn upp off dæþe, Forr he wass swiþe duhhti? mann & Drihhtin swiþe cweme. & he badd uppo Drihhtin Godd Þatt itt ne shollde re??nenn, & ta wass wel hallf feorþe ?er Þatt comm na re??n onn eorþe. & ta wass i Judisskenn land Þærþurrh full hefi? hunngerr, Forr þatt te land wass dri??edd all & scorrcnedd þurrh þe druhhþe. & ta comm, i þatt hunngerr, ald Helyas þe prophete Towarrd an mikell burr?hess tun Þatt wass Sareppta nemmnedd; & att tatt burr?hess ?ate himm comm An widewe to?æness, & he badd tatt ?ho shollde himm þa An litell waterr fecchenn, & se??de þatt he wass forrþrisst, & tatt he wollde drinnkenn. & ?ho þa wollde sone anan Himm fecchenn þatt he ?eorrnde. & he badd tatt ?ho shollde himm ec An b?te brædess brinngenn, & ?ho þa ?aff himm sware onn?æn, & se??de þuss wiþþ worde; Þin Laferrd Godd Allmahhti? wát, Þatt wel wat alle þingess, Þatt nafe icc nohht off metekinn Till me, ne till min wennchell, Wiþþutenn m?le alls itt beo rihht An hanndfull inn an fétless, & littless whatt off elesæw Inn elesæwess fétless; & her I gaddre stikkess twa Swa summ þu seost, lef laferd, Forr to min sune & forr to me To ?arrkenn þatt to fode; & siþþenn shule witt anan Off hunngerr de?enn baþe. & ta ?ét space þuss hire to Helyas þe prophete; Ga, laffdi?, forþ, & dred te nohht, Acc do swa summ þu se??desst, Acc allre firrst macc þu to me Þæroffe an litell kechell, & siþþenn shallt tu makenn ?unnc To fode þatt tær lefeþþ. Forr Drihhtin se??þ þatt te shall wel Þin little mele lasstenn, & tatt te shall þin elesæw Lasstenn, þohh itt beo litell, Anan till þatt tatt Drihhtin Godd Shall ?ifenn re??n onn eorþe. & all bilammp þatt widdwe þa Swa summ þe wite se??de; ?ho ?ede & dide þatt he badd, & brohhte himm út an kechell, & siþþenn fand ?ho mele inoh & elesæw to fode, Anan till þatt te Laferrd Godd Gaff re??n inoh onn eorþe; A?? summ ?ho mare & mare toc A?? wex itt mare & mare. & swa bilammp þatt widdwe þa Þurrh Helyasess bene; Forr he wass hali? mann & god, & Drihhtin swiþe cweme, & ?ho wass h?re sellf full wiss God widdwe, & Drihhtin cweme, Þurrh whatt ?ho wass wurrþi to beon Þurrh Godd off hunngerr lesedd. & forrþi þatt tatt hall?he mann, Helyas þe prophete, Att Drihhtin mihhte winnenn wel All whattse he wollde ?eornenn, Efft sone he badd o Drihhtin Godd Þatt itt ta shollde re??nenn, & ta comm re??n inoh anan All affterr þatt he ?eorrnde. & Drihhtin wollde himm habbenn þa Wiþþutenn dæþ fra manne, Swa þatt he shollde libbenn a Till Anntecristess come; & Drihhtin sennde an karrte himm to Þær þær he wass onn eorþe, An karrte þatt wass all off fir, & horrs off fir itt dro?henn. & Helyas forrþrihht anan Þær stah innto þatt karrte, & i þatt karrte wass he brohht Till-þær he wunenn shollde, & tære shall he libbenn a Till Anntecristess come, & tanne shall he cumenn forþ Till Issraæle þeode, Wiþþ E??noc þatt shall cumenn ec, Swa summ ?e littlær herrdenn. & baþe shulenn spellenn þa Till þatt Judisskenn þeode, Þatt te?? her i þiss middellærd Þatt time shulenn findenn, Þe?? shulenn spellenn to þatt follc, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Off ure Laferrd Jesu Crist & off hiss Goddcunndnesse, & off-þatt he wiþþutenn gillt Wass na??ledd uppo rode, All alls hiss lefe wille wass, Forr all mannkinne nede, To lesenn þurrh hiss hall?he dæþ Mannkinn off hellepine. & ta shall þatt Judisskenn follc Þurrh þe??re spell beon turrnedd Till fulluhht & till Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe. & Crist beoþ þanne borenn efft Inntill hiss a?henn birde, Inntill þatt Judewisshe follc Þatt he wass borenn offe, Þurrh-þatt te?? shulenn turrnenn hemm Till himm wiþþ fulle læfe, & lufenn himm & forþ wiþþ himm Hiss deore moderr Mar?e. All þuss shall þa beon filledd all Þatt uss wass ær bitacnedd, Þær Josæp barr þe Laferrd Crist Út off hiss a?henn birde, Út off Judisskenn follkess land Þatt he wass borenn inne, & barr himm inntill hæþenn land, Inntill hæþene Egippte, & siþþenn barr himm efft onn?æn Inntill hiss a?henn birde, Inntill Judisskenn follkess land, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd; Þatt Jesu Crist wass seofenn ?er Tosamenn inn Egippte, Þatt uss bitacneþþ mikell þing Þatt uss ma?? alle frofrenn. Itt tacneþþ þatt he frofreþþ her, Þurrh Hali? Gastess frofre, Þatt hall?he flocc þatt turrnedd wass Út off hæþene þeode Till Crisstenndom, & lufeþþ Crist, & hise la?hess haldeþþ, & tatt he wile ?ifenn hemm A butenn ende blisse. Þatt Crist sellf frofreþþ here hiss hird Þurrh Hali? Gastess frofre, & shall hemm ?ifenn eche lif Att heore lifess ende, Þiss twinne seollþe tacnedd wass Þurrh Jesu Crist himm sellfenn, Þurrh þatt tatt he wass seofenn ?er Tosamenn inn Egippte. & her icc wile shæwenn hu All þiss iss tunnderrstanndenn. Þe Laferrd Crist wass seofenn ?er Bitwenenn hæþenn þeode, Forr þatt he wollde hemm swa þurrh þatt Full opennli? bitacnenn, Þatt he þe??m wollde frofrenn her Þurrh Hali? Gast onn eorþe, ?iff þatt te?? wolldenn foll?henn himm & hise la?hess haldenn. Forr Hali? Gast iss ful iwiss Þurrh tale off seoffne tacnedd, Forr þatt he ?ifeþþ her hiss þeoww Hiss frofre o seofenn wise. He ?ifeþþ himm innsihht & witt Off heofennlike þingess; & innsihht tunnderrstanndenn all Þatt mann ma?? unnderrstanndenn; & witt to ?ifenn a?? god ræd Off all þatt Drihhtin likeþþ; & witt & mihht to berenn rihht Illc seollþe & illc unnseollþe. He ?ifeþþ himm innsihht & witt Off illc eorþlike nede, Off whatt iss soþ & whatt iss rihht I weorelldlike þingess; & rihht reowwsunnd off all þatt iss Onn eorþe to bireowwsenn; & witt & mihht to drædenn Godd & hise starrke domess, Forr to forrbu?henn þess te bett All þatt tatt Godd forrwerrpeþþ. Nu ma?? mann unnderrstanndenn her, Þurrh þise seofenn mahhtess, Wiþþ whillke ?ifess Hali? Gast beon frofredd. & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Shall ?ifenn hise þeowwess A butenn ende inn heoffness ærd To brukenn eche blisse, Þatt dide he þe??m full witerrli? To witenn þurrh himm sellfenn, Þurrh þatt tatt he wass seofenn ?er Amang hæþene þeode, Amang þatt follc þatt shollde himm ?ét Full wel tocweme þewwtenn I Crisstenndom, þurrh hali? lif & þurrh þe rihhte læfe. Forr tale off seoffne tacneþþ uss All þatt tatt æfre lassteþþ, Forrþi þatt all þiss weorrldess ald Bi seoffne da?hess eorneþþ, & forrþi ma?? itt tacnenn wel All heofennrichess blisse, Þatt a?? occ a?? shall lasstenn uss, ?iff þatt wét mu?henn winnenn. & forrþi wass he seofenn ?er Amang hæþene þeode, For þatt he wollde hemm swa þurrh þatt Full opennli? bitacnenn, Þatt he þe??m wollde ?ifenn lif A butenn ende i blisse, ?iff þatt te?? wolldenn foll?henn himm & hise la?hess haldenn. & affterr þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass cumenn off Egippte, Inntill þe land off Galileo Till Nazaræþess chesstre, Þær he bilæf wiþþ hise frend, Wiþþ Sannte Mar?e hiss moderr, & wiþþ þatt hall?he mann Josæp Þatt himm wass sett to fosstrenn. & tære he wex, & þraf, & wass Full herrsumm till hiss moderr, & till hiss fossterrfaderr ec He wass buhsumm & milde. Þurrh þatt tatt cwiddedd wass off Crist Forrlannge þurrh prophete, Þatt he þe Nazarisshe mann ?ehatenn shollde wurrþenn, Þurrh þatt wass cwiddedd wel, þatt he Onn eorþe shollde shæwenn Bitwenenn menn forr þe??re god Útnumenn hali?nesse. Forr Nazarenuss tacneþþ sannt, & hali? mann & clene, & Jesu Crist wass hali? Amæn. SECUNDUM LUCAM XV. Cum factus esset I H C annorum xii ascendentibus illis. Affterr þatt tatt te Laferrd Crist Wass cumenn off Egyppte Inntill þe land off Galileo, Till Nazaræþess chesstre, Þæraffterr se??þ þe Goddspellboc Bilæf he þær well lannge Wiþþ hise frend, tatt haffdenn himm To ?emenn & to gætenn, Wiþþ Mar?e þatt hiss moderr wass & ma??denn þwerrt út clene, & wiþþ Josæp þatt wass himm sett To fedenn & to fosstrenn. & illke Lenntenn forenn þe?? Till ?errsalæmess chesstre A?? att te Passkemesseda??, Swa summ þe boc hemm tahhte, To frellsenn þær þatt he?he tid O þatt Judisskenn wise, Forr þatt te?? wærenn gode menn, & Godess la?hess heldenn. Annd siþþenn, o þatt ?er þatt Crist Wass off twellf winnterr elde, Þe?? comenn inntill ?errsalæm Att te??re Passkemesse, & heldenn þær þatt hall?he tid O þatt Judisskenn wise. & Jesu Crist wass þær wiþþ hemm, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ. Annd affterr þatt te tid wass gan Þe?? wenndenn fra þe temmple, & ferrdenn towarrd Nazaræþ An da??ess gang till efenn, & wenndenn þatt te Laferrd Crist Wiþþ hemm þatt gate come, & he wass þa bihinndenn hemm Bilefedd att te temmple; & tatt ne wisste nohht hiss kinn Acc wennde þatt he come, & ?edenn heore we??e forþ Till þatt itt comm till efenn, & ta þe?? misstenn þe??re child, & itt hemm offerrþuhhte, & ?edenn till, & sohhtenn himm Bitwenenn sibbe & cuþe, & te?? ne fundenn nohht off himm, Forr he wass att te temmple. & te?? þa wenndenn efft onn?æn Þatt dere child to sekenn, & comenn efft till ?errsalæm, To sekenn himm þær binnenn. & te?? himm o þe þridde da?? Þær fundenn i þe temmple, Bitwenenn þatt Judisskenn flocc Þatt læredd wass o boke; & tære he satt to fra??nenn hemm Off þe??re bokess lare, & alle þatt himm herrdenn þær, Hemm þuhhte mikell wunnderr Off þatt he wass full ?æp & wis To swarenn & to fra??nenn. & Sannte Mar?e comm till himm & se??de himm þuss wiþþ worde, Whi didesst tu, lef sune, þuss Wiþþ uss, forr uss to swennkenn? Witt hafenn sohht te widewhar Icc & ti faderr baþe Wiþþ serrhfull herrte & sari? mod, Whi didesst tu þiss dede? & tanne se??de Jesu Crist Till baþe þuss wiþþ worde, Whatt wass ?uw swa to sekenn me, Whatt wass ?uw swa to serr?henn? Ne wisste ?e nohht tatt me birrþ Min faderr wille forþenn? Ne þatt me birrþ beon ho?hefull Abutenn hise þingess? & te?? ne mihhtenn nohht tatt word ?ét ta wel unnderrstanndenn; & he þa ?ede forþ wiþþ hemm & dide hemm heore wille, & comm wiþþ hemm till Nazaræþ, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, & till hemm baþe he lutte & bæh Þurrh soþfasst herrsummnesse, & wass wiþþ hemm till þatt he wass Off þritti? winnterr elde. & ure laffdi? Mar?e toc All þatt ?ho sahh & herrde Off hire sune Jesu Crist, & off hiss Goddcunndnesse, & all ?hót held inn hire þohht, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, & le??de itt all tosamenn a?? Inn hire þohhtess arrke. & hire sune wex & þraf I wissdom & inn elde, & he wass Godd & gode menn Well swiþe lef & dere; & tatt wass rihht, forr he wass Godd, & god onn alle wise. Her endeþþ nu þiss Goddspell þuss & uss birrþ itt þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt itt læreþþ uss Off ure sawle nede. Þatt Jesu Cristess kinness menn A?? forenn to þe temmple Att heore Passkemesseda??, Þatt hall?he tid to freollsenn, Þatt wass till uss god bisne inoh, Loc ?iff wét wilenn foll?henn, To sekenn kirrke bliþeli?, To biddenn uss to Criste, Onn iwhillc hali? messeda?? Þatt uss birrþ alle freollsenn, Forr þanne birrþ uss Godess hus Att allre læste sekenn, Forr, ?iff we mihhtenn, illke da?? Uss birrde itt georne sekenn, To þingenn uss wiþþ ure Godd Þurrh bedess & þurrh lakess. & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Wass fundenn i þe temmple, Bitwenenn þatt Judisskenn flocc Þatt læredd wass o boke, Þær þær he satt to fra??nenn hemm Off heore bokess lare, Þatt wass ?uw bisne god inoh, Loc ?iff ?ét wilenn foll?henn, Þatt ?uw birrþ georne stanndenn inn To fra??nenn ?ure preostess, Off all hu ?uw birrþ ledenn ?uw & lefenn uppo Criste, Hu ?uw birrþ foll?henn Cristess sloþ, & Cristess la?hess haldenn, & stanndenn ?æn þe laþe gast, & winnenn Cristess are. Forr ?uw birrþ uppo kirrkeflor Beon fundenn offte & lannge, To lisstenn whatt te preost ?uw se??þ Off ?ure sawle nede. & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Bilæf himm i þe temmple Bihinndenn hise kinness menn, & lét hemm all hemm ane Gan þe??re we??e, all swa summ he Rihht nohht off hemm ne rohhte, Þatt dide he forr to shæwenn hemm & uss & alle þeode, Þatt all þatt æfre shapenn wass Inn alle kinne shaffte Birrþ effnedd beon onn?æness Crist derr weddedd, & Cristess faderr rihht inoh Þatt wass himm sett to fosstrenn, Þohh þatt he streonedd nohht ne wass Þurrh himm, ne þurrh nan oþerr. & ?ét forr all an oþerr whatt Se??de þe laffdi? Mar?e, Þatt Josæp Cristess faderr wass, ?hót se??de wiss to soþe, Forrþi þatt ?ho ne wollde nohht Kiþenn off Crist ne shæwenn Nan þing, whatt gate he borenn wass Off Hali? Gast to manne; Acc all swa summ ?ho wisste wel Þatt all þe lede wennde, Annd all swa summ ?ho wisste wel Þatt laþe gastess wenndenn, Þatt hire sune Jesu Crist Josæpess sune wære, All swa ?ho spacc rihht alls iff he Josæpess sune wære; Forr þatt ?ho nollde nohht off Crist Þurrh h?re sellfenn shæwenn, Butt all swillc summ þe laþe gast & ec þe follc wel wennde, Swillc durrste ?ho shæwenn off Crist; & all forrþi ?ho se??de, Lef sune, icc & tin faderr þe Sohht hafenn mikell baþe; Forr þatt ?ho wollde lætenn wel Himm sellfenn off himm sellfenn All shæwenn whatt he wass, & hu He cumenn wass to manne. & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Wass herrsumm till hemm baþe, & æddmod a??, & bliþe, & fus To foll?henn heore wille, Þatt dide he forr he wollde swa Uss alle ?ifenn bisne, To cwemenn ure faderr wel & ure moderr baþe, To lutenn hemm, to lefftenn hemm, To serrfenn hemm well ?errne, To findenn hemm þatt hemm iss ned A?? affterr ure mahhte; Forr ?iff þatt tu forrwerrpesst her Þin faderr & tin moderr, Þu best forrworrpenn att te dom, Butt iff þút mu?he betenn. Off þatt tatt Sannte Mar?e toc All þatt ?ho sahh & herrde Off hire sune Jesu Crist & off hiss Goddcunndnesse, & le??de itt all tosamenn a??, To þennkenn þær abutenn, Forr þatt ?ho wisste mare off himm Þann ani? mann o life, Off þatt icc habbe shæwedd her Biforenn o þiss lare, Þær þær þe Goddspellwrihhte se??þ Onn hiss Goddspelless lare Þatt hirdess fundenn Jesu Crist I Beþþleæmess chesstre, Uppo þatt illke nahht tatt he Wass borenn her to manne; Forr þære uss se??þ þe Goddspellboc, & wel uss birrþ itt trowwenn, Þatt ure laffdi? Mar?e toc All þatt ?ho sahh & herrde Off hire sune Jesu Crist, & off þa miccle tacness Þatt comenn i þiss middellærd, Son summ he comm to manne; & tatt ?ho le??de itt samenn all To þennkenn a?? þær ummbe, Hu ?ho wiþþ childe wurrþenn wass Wiþþutenn iwhillc macche, & hu ?ho barr þatt illke child Wiþþutenn iwhillc pine, Swa þatt ?ho moderr wurrþenn wass, & wass þohh ma??denn clene; & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Wel wex & þraf onn elde, Þatt wass o þatt hallf þatt he wass Soþ mann i Goddcunndnesse; & tatt tatt he wass swiþe wis, & Godd & menn full cweme, Þatt wass forrþi þatt he wass Godd & god onn alle wise. & Godd Allmahhti? gife uss rihht To foll?henn Cristess lare, Swa þatt we motenn alle imæn Beon borr?henn þurrh hiss are. Amæn; SECUNDUM LUCAM XVI. Anno quintodecimo imperii Tyberii Cesaris. Nu cumeþþ me to tellenn forþ Off Sannt Johan Bapptisste, & tær rihht tær I lét off himm Þær wile I nu biginnenn, To tellenn & to spellenn ?uw Off himm & off hiss lare. Þiss illke were Sannt Johan Wass hali? mann wiþþ alle, Forr son summ he wass waxenn swa Þurrh hise freondess fode, Þatt he þa mihhte himm sellf wel beon Hiss a?henn hellpe & hirde, & tatt he cuþe himm ane beon, & lokenn till himm sellfenn, Forrþrihht anan he flæh awe?? Fra faderr & fra moderr, & flæh himm inntill wessteland Þær itt wass all unnbiggedd, & shadde himm all þwerrt út fra menn; Forr þatt he wollde himm ?emenn, Swa þatt he þurrh an idell word Ne shollde himm nohht forrgilltenn. & tære he ledde himm ane hiss lif Fra þatt he wass full litell Till þatt he waxenn wass, & neh Off þritti? winnterr elde. & siþþenn toc he þær þe follc To spellenn & to fullhtnenn, Forr þatt he wollde ?arrkenn hemm Onn?æness Cristess come. & here icc wile off hiss fulluhht & off hiss lare spellenn, & off þatt he wass sennd þurrh Godd Biforenn Cristess come, Rihht allse bidell birrþ beon sennd, To ?arrkenn & to gre??þenn Onn?æn hiss Laferrd þær þær he Shall cumenn skét to túne; Þe Goddspell se??þ þatt Sannt Johan Bigann off Crist to spellenn Út i þe wesste bi þe flumm, O þatt Kaseress tíme Þatt wass i Rome Kaserrking, Tiberiuss ?ehatenn. & o þatt ?er þatt Sannt Johan Bigann off Crist to spellenn, O þatt ?er wass þatt illke King Onn hiss fiftende winnterr, Fra þatt tatt he wass sett to beon Kasere i Rome riche. & ta wass Romess k?nedom Full wid & sid onn eorþe, & itt wass hæfedd kinedom Abufenn oþre unnfæwe. & ?errsalæmess kinedom Wass i þatt illke time Todæledd, þatt witt tu full wel, O fowwre feorþenn daless. & twe??enn preostess wærenn þa I ?errsalæmess chesstre, Þatt wærenn oferr Godess follc Bisskopess i þatt time; Þatt an wass nemmnedd Kayphas, & Anna wass þatt oþerr, Þatt wærenn oferr Godess follc I ?errsalæm, þatt time Þatt Cristess bidell, Sannt Johan, Bigann off Crist to spellenn. & he bigann to spellenn þa Wiþþ fulluhht off dædbote, Off þatt fulluhht tatt shollde beon Forr?ifenesse off sinness, Affterr þatt itt iss writenn þuss Onn Ysay?ess lare; Þe rowwst iss herrd off ænne mann Þatt epeþþ þuss i wesste Till illkess kinness follc, gaþ till, & ?arrkeþþ Godess we??e, Gaþ till, & rihhteþþ swiþe wel Drihhtiness narrwe sti?hess; Nu skét shall illc an d?le beon All he?hedd upp & filledd, & illc an lawe & illc an hill Shall niþþredd beon & la?hedd; & all þatt ohht iss wrang & crumb Shall effnedd beon & rihhtedd. & whærse iss all unnsmeþe gét Þurrh bannkess & þurrh græfess, & sharrp, & ruhh, & gatelæs Þurrh þorrness & þurrh breress, Þær shulenn beon ridinngess nu, & effne & smeþe we??ess. & all mannkinn shall seon full skét Crist, Godess Sune, onn eorþe, Hælennde, & hellpe, & god upphald Till þa þatt he shall chesenn. Þuss toc Johan, Cristess derrlinng, To spellenn i þe wesste, Forr he wass hali? mann & god, & Drihhtin swiþe cweme. Hiss claþ wass off ollfenntess hær, Hiss m?te wass gresshoppe, & itt wass huni? off þe feld, Giff þatt he mihhte itt findenn; Hiss drinnch wass waterr a?? occ a?? Swillc allse he fand i wesste; Hiss girrdell wass off shepess skinn Abutenn hise lendess. & forr þatt he wass þwerrt út god Onn alle kinne wise, Menn wenndenn þatt he wære Crist Þatt tanne cumenn wære; Forr Crist wass i þatt tíme ?ét All unncuþ & all dærne Wiþþ Sannte Mar?e & wiþþ Josæp, I Nazaræþess chesstre. & Sannt Johan i wessteland Wass wurrþenn cuþ þatt tíme, & menn himm sohhtenn fasste to, Forr himm to seon & herenn, All út off ?errsalæmess land, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, & ec út off Judealand, & off þa tuness alle Þatt wærenn bi þe flumm Jorrdan, & e??whær þær abutenn. & he toc þær to spellenn hemm, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd, & fele tokenn shriffte att himm Off alle þe??re sinness. & he toc þa to fullhtnenn þa Þatt tokenn wiþþ hiss lare I flumm Jorrdan, forr itt wass þær Himm onnfasst i þe wesste. & he sahh cumenn þær till himm Þær till þe flumm unnfæwe, & off Farisewisshe menn & off Saducewisshe, To wurrþenn fullhtnedd att hiss hannd, & forr to t?kenn shriffte; & he toc þa to spellenn hemm, & se??de þuss wiþþ worde; ?e neddrestreon, wha tahhte ?uw To fleon & to forrbu?henn Þatt irre þatt to cumenn iss, & Godess wraþþe & wræche? Gaþ alle, & takeþþ upponn ?uw Rihht shriffte off ?ure sinness, & lokeþþ wel þatt ?ure nan Ne segge þuss wiþþ worde; We sinndenn Habrahamess streon & Habrahamess chilldre. Icc segge ?uw to fulle soþ Þatt Drihhtin hafeþþ mihhte To re??senn, ?iff himm þinnkeþþ god, Rihht hére off þise staness Rihht aþell streon off Habraham, Rihht Habrahamess chilldre. Forr n???u iss bulaxe sett Rihht to þe treowwess rote, & illc an treo þatt i þiss lif Ne b?reþþ nohht god wasstme Shall bi þe grund beon hæwenn upp & i þe fir beon worrpenn. Þe follc þatt herrde himm spellenn þær Spacc þa till himm, & se??de; Whatt shule we nu forrþwarrd don? & he ?aff sware, & se??de; Whasumm itt iss þatt illke mann Þatt hafeþþ twe??enn kirrtless, Gife he þatt an summ oþerr mann Þatt iss wiþþutenn kirrtell. & puplicaness comenn þær, Att himm to wurrþenn fullhtnedd, & se??denn þuss till Sannt Johan, Þær þær he stod to spellenn; Lef ma??stre, se?? uss nu þin raþ & se?? uss nu þin lare, Whatt we nu forrþwarrd shulenn don To betenn ure sinness. & Sannt Johan hemm se??de þuss; Nohht elless ne nohht mare Þann þatt tatt ?uw iss sett to don Ne do ?e; þiss icc lære. & ec þær comenn to þe flumm Þe Kaserrkingess cnihhtess, To leornenn lare att Sannt Johan Off þe??re sawle nede, & tuss þe?? se??denn þær till himm; Se?? uss all swa, lef laferrd, Whatt uss iss nu forrþwarrd to don, To berr?henn ure sawless. & Sannt Johan hemm se??de þuss; ?iff þatt ?e wel ?uw lokenn Fra clake & sake, & fra þatt toþþ Þatt foll?heþþ ?iferrnesse, Þatt hóleþþ o þe la?he leod, & rippeþþ hemm & ræfeþþ, & ?iff ?e tellenn forr inoh Þatt tatt te King ?uw findeþþ, Þa mu?he ?e wiþþ clene lif Wel hellpenn ?ure sawless. Þuss fundenn alle att Sannt Johan God lare off heore nede; & tatt nass wunnderr þwerrt út nan Þatt he wass wis o lare, Forr he wass full off Hali? Gast Ær þan he borenn wære. Her endeþþ nu þiss Goddspell þuss, & uss birrþ itt þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt itt læreþþ uss Off ure sawle nede. Þatt Sannt Johan swa swiþe ?ung Bigann Drihhtin to þeowwtenn, Þatt wass god bisne ful iwiss Till ure ?unge genge, Þatt hemm birrþ affterr heore mahht Biginnenn Godd to cwemenn, Son summ þe?? w?tenn hu mann ma?? Drihhtiness wille wirrkenn. Me mineþþ þatt te Goddspell se??þ, Þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste Wass sennd to manne þurrh Drihhtin Biforenn Cristess come, To ?arrkenn follc onn?æness Crist Wiþþ fulluhht & wiþþ lare. & tatt wass ned tatt he wass sennd To spellenn & to fullhtnenn, Ær þann þe Laferrd Jesu Crist Bigann owwþerr to donne. Forr ?iff he come himm sellf þær forþ, Færlike forr to spellenn Off all hiss Goddcunndnessess mahht & off hiss deope lare, Ne munnde nohht tatt illke follc Þatt Crist comm till onn eorþe, Þatt haffdenn ledd a?? þe??re lif Affterr þe flæshess wille, Ne munndenn þe?? nohht habbenn mihht, Ne witt, ne forrþenn wille To turrnenn hemm all till hiss hannd, To foll?henn all hiss lare, & to forrwerrpenn all þatt lif & all þatt la?hess lade Þatt he wass sett þurrh Drihhtin sellf To ledenn & to foll?henn. & all forrþi comm Sannt Johan Biforenn Cristess come, To spellenn to þe follc summwhatt Off Cristess Goddcunndnesse, & off hiss heofennlike mahht, & off hiss depe lare, & forr to shæwenn hemm þatt Crist Þa shollde cumenn newenn, & forr to shæwenn hemm whillc ned Itt wære þatt he come, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe deofless walde. All swillc & swillc comm Sannt Johan To shæwenn & to kiþenn Biforenn þatt Judisskenn þeod Þatt he wass borenn offe, Forr swa to meokenn þe??re lund & te??re modess wille To takenn wiþþ þe Laferrd Crist, & wiþþ hiss deope lare, Þatt time þatt he come forþ Himm sellf forr hemm to lærenn, To turrnenn hemm till Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe. ?iff þatt tin e?he iss all unnhal Wiþþinnenn o þe séne, Itt shuneþþ, þatt tu wast te sellf, Þe sunness brihhte leome; & ?iff þatt tu mihht hælenn itt Wiþþ ani? kinness sallfe, Þa ma?? itt siþþenn þolenn wel Þe sunness brihhte leome. All swa wass off þatt illke follc Þatt Crist comm till onn eorþe, Þatt haffdenn ledd a?? þe??re lif Affterr þe flæshess wille, Ne munndenn þe?? nohht habbenn witt, Ne mahht, ne forrþenn wille, To t?kenn wiþþ þe Laferrd Crist, Ne wiþþ hiss depe lare, ?iff þatt he come himm sellf till hemm Færlike forr to kiþenn All whatt he wollde, ær þann itt ohht Þurrh oþre wære shæwedd. Rihht all forrþi comm Sannt Johan Firrst wiþþ hiss little lare & little bisne till þe follc, Forr þatt he wollde hemm strengenn, Swa þatt te?? mihhtenn habbenn mahht All þess te bettre siþþenn To berenn Cristess miccle spell & Cristess miccle bisne, Þatt time þatt he come himm sellf Bitwenenn hemm to spellenn. Rihht swa comm þanne Sannt Johan Firrst wiþþ hiss little lare Alls iff he brohhte læchedom & herrtess e?hesallfe, To sallfenn & to clennsenn firrst Þe follkess herrtess e?he, Swa þatt te?? mihhtenn seon þe bett Þe sunness brihhte leome, Off Cristess heofennlike mahht, Off Cristess Goddcunndnesse, Off Cristess laress brihhte leom, Off Cristess hall?he bisne. & forr þatt Sannt Johan wass sennd, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd, To spellenn off þe Laferrd Crist Þatt shollde cumenn newenn, To chesenn off Judisskenn follc & off hæþene þeode An follc to t?kenn Crisstenndom, To lefenn uppo Criste, Forrþi wass writenn witerrli? & se??d þurrh Goddspellwrihhte, Wha wass þatt time Kaserrking I Romess k?neriche, & whillke wærenn allderrmenn Amang Judisskenn þeode, Þatt time þatt Johan bigann To spellenn & to fullhtnenn. & forrþi þatt hæþene þeod Þa shollde wurrþenn newenn Sammnedd togeddre i Crisstenndom, To lefenn uppo Criste, To wurrþenn Cristess kinedom An follc off alle þeode, Forrþi wass an hæþene king & an hæþene riche, Þatt time þatt Johan bigann To spellenn & to fullhtnenn. & forrþi þatt Judisskenn follc Þa shollde beon toske??redd, Þurrh Jesu Cristess rihhte dom Forr heore depe sinne, Forrþi þatt te?? þurrh h?te & niþ Himm sholldenn all forrwerrpenn, Forrþi wass þe??re kinedom Todæledd & tobrittnedd Þurrh Rome richess Kaserrking O fowwre feorþenn daless, Þatt time þatt Johann bigann To spellenn & to fullhtnenn. & forrþi þatt te Laferrd Crist Iss King off alle kingess, & Preost off alle preostess ec, To berr?henn hise þeowwess, Forrþi wass writenn witerrli? & se??d þurrh Goddspellwrihhte, ?a whillke wærenn kingess þa, ?a whillke wærenn preostess, Þatt time þatt Johan bigann To spellenn & to fullhtnenn. Anna wass Bisskop o þatt ?er Amang Judisskenn þeode Þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste toc To spellenn & to fullhtnenn; & Kayfass wass o þatt ?er Þatt Crist wass don o rode; & þreo bitwenenn þise twa Þatt illke wikenn haffdenn; Wiþþinnenn þreo ?er wærenn þreo Bitwenenn þise twe??enn; & Crist wass o þa fowwre ?er Unnderr Bisshopess fowwre Bitwenenn þatt Judisskenn follc Þatt he wass borenn offe, To spellenn & to lærenn hemm Off heore sawle nede, & wrohhte wunndre miccle ma Þann icc ?uw ma?? nu tellenn, Fra þatt da?? þatt he fullhtnedd wass Till þatt he stah o rode. & ta wass Kayfasess ?er Þe fifte ?er bigunnenn, Þatt time þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass na??ledd uppo rode. Þatt tatt te Goddspellwrihhte se??þ, Þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste Bigann to spellenn to þe follc Wiþþ fulluhht off dædbote, Off þatt fulluhht þatt shollde beon Forr?ifenesse off sinness, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Wiþþ opennlike spæche, He toc to spellenn to þe follc Off Jesu Cristess come, Þatt shollde hemm gifenn hiss fulluhht, To clennsenn hemm off sinness; & badd he ?eorne clennsenn hemm Wiþþ shriffte off rihht dædbote, To gre??þenn & to ?arrkenn hemm ?æn Cristess hall?he come. & tohh þatt he ne mihhte nohht Hemm ?ifenn þurrh himm sellfenn Fulluhht tatt mihhte clennsenn hemm, & lesenn hemm off sinness, Þohh kidde he þe??m full wel þatt Crist Hemm shollde newenn clennsenn Þurrh fulluhht & þurrh Hali? Gast Off alle þe??re sinness. & forr þatt Sannt Johan wass sennd Biforenn Crist to gre??þenn, All allse bidell birrþ beon sennd To gre??þenn ?æn hiss laferrd, Forrþi toc he biforenn Crist To spellenn & to fullhtnenn. & siþþenn comm þe Laferrd Crist Himm sellf to wurrþenn fullhtnedd, & to biginnenn þatt fulluhht Þurrh hise Leorninngcnihhtess, Þatt shollde clennsenn all þe mann I bodi? & i sawle Off alle sinness, ?iff þatt he Rihht la?helike itt toke; & ec to spellenn to þatt follc Þatt he wass borenn offe, To turrnenn hemm till Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe. & siþþenn comm itt gét tærto, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste for Biforenn Crist till helle, Forrþi þatt he wass sennd þurrh Godd Biforenn Crist to ?arrkenn, All allse bidell birrþ beon sennd To ?arrkenn ?æn hiss laferrd. & ec forrþi wass se??d off himm Forrlannge þurrh prophete, Þurrh Ysay?e Godess þeoww, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ; Þe rowwst iss herrd off ænne mann Þatt epeþþ i þe wesste. Forr all swa summ þe reord gaþ a?? Biforenn i þi spæche, & siþþenn foll?heþþ a?? þe word Swa summ þe reord itt ledeþþ, Rihht all allswa comm Sannt Johan Biforenn Crist to manne, Rihht allse he wære rowwst & reord, & Crist te word tæraffterr. & tatt bilimmpeþþ wel þatt Crist Iss þurrh þe word bitacnedd, Forr Crist iss Godd & Godess word, & Godess Sune i kinde; & rihht wass þatt Johan bigann I wessteland to spellenn, Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn us, Þatt he wass sennd to spellenn Till Issraæle þeod tatt wass All wesste & all forrworrpenn Neh all togeddre att Drihhtin Godd, Forr heore deope sinness. & tatt he badd hemm alle gan & ?arrkenn Godess we??e, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Wiþþ opennlike spæche; Forrwerrpeþþ all þatt ifell iss & alle kinne sinness, & turrneþþ ?uw till hali? lif Wiþþ alle gode dedess, & ?arrkeþþ Godess we??e swa Þatt he ?uw mu?he nehh?henn. & tatt he badd hemm alle gan & rihhtenn Godess sti?hess, Þatt wass alls iff he bæde hemm gan & clennsenn heore þohhtess, Forr clene þohht iss Godess bedd, & tære he wile himm resstenn. & tatt tatt Cristess þeww Johan Þær se??de to þe leode, Nu skét shall illc an dale beon All he?hedd upp & filledd, & illc an lawe & illc an hill Shall niþþredd beon & la?hedd, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Wiþþ all full openn spæche; Nu skét shall Godess Sune Crist Himm awwnenn her onn eorþe, Forr her to niþþrenn alle þa Þatt modi?nesse foll?henn, & forr to re??senn alle þa Þatt foll?henn soþ meocnesse, Forr Drihhtin h?teþþ modi? mann, & lufeþþ alle meoke. & tiss mann unnderrstanndenn ma?? ?ét onn an oþerr wise, Þatt Issraæle þeod allmasst Þa shollde beon forrworrpenn, Forr þatt te?? sholldenn Crist forrseon Þurrh þe??re modi?nesse, Þatt follc, þatt haffde beon till þa Heh follc & rannc onn eorþe; Forr Drihhtin haffde chosenn hemm & he?hedd hemm & wurrþedd Þurrh þatt tatt he þe??m haffde sett Bisscopess, preostess, dæcness, & la?heboc, & lare inoh Off all þatt hemm wass þurrfe, & wærenn hofenn upp þurrh þatt Abufenn alle þeode, All all swa summ þe lawe iss heh Abufenn oþerr eorþe. & forrþi wærenn þe?? Her uss bitacnenn þrinne treos Þa þrinne kinne bo?hess Þatt nohht ne berenn i þiss lif Swillc wasstme summ hemm birrde, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd her Þatt wise þatt I cuþe, Affterr þatt little witt tatt me Min Drihhtin hafeþþ lenedd. & mann ma?? unnderrstanndenn þiss ?ét onn an oþerr wise, Þatt axe shollde þa beon sett Rihht att te treowwess rote, & ec þatt illc an ifell treo Þatt ifell wasstme bære, Þa shollde wurrþenn hæwenn upp & i þe fir beon worrpenn.
