Forr gredi?nesse iss hæfedd plihht, & foll?heþþ helless bisne, Forr hellepitt niss næfre full, Ne gredi?nesse nowwþerr. Forr whase itt iss þatt gredi? iss To winnenn erþlic ahhte, A?? alls he mare & mare gett A?? lisste himm affterr mare; & nohht ne ma?? he wurrþenn full To winnenn eorþlic ahhte, Na mar þann helle ma?? beon full To swoll?henn menness sawless. Þe cnihhtess wærenn wæpnedd follc, To fihhtenn forr þe leode, To werenn hemm wiþþ wiþerrþeod Þatt wollde hemm oferrganngenn, & ?iff þe?? haffdenn lefe till All affterr þe??re wille To takenn off þe la?heleod Þatt tatt te?? sholldenn nittenn, Þe?? munndenn fon att oferrdon Þurrh sinnfull gredi?nesse. & forrþi fand hemm þe??re king All þatt te?? sholldenn nittenn, Þatt te?? ne sholldenn nohht te follc Þurrh gredi?nesse rippenn; & forrþi badd hemm Sannt Johan Forrbu?henn gredi?nesse, & letenn iwhillc oþerr man Wel brukenn all hiss a?henn; Þuss fundenn alle att Sannt Johan God lare off þe??re nede. & tatt nass wunnderr þwerrt út nan Þatt he wass wis o lare, Forr he wass full off Hali? Gast Ær þann he borenn wære, Swa summ þe Goddspellwrihhte se??þ, Þatt þwerrt út nohht ne le?heþþ & Godd Allmahhti? lefe uss swa To fillenn & to foll?henn Þe lare off Sannt Johaness spell & all hiss hall?he bisne, Swa þatt we motenn borr?henn beon Att ure lifess ende. Amæn; VOL. II SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XVIII. Miserunt Judei ab Jersolimis Sacerdotes & Levitas ad Johannem. Forrþi þatt Sannt Johaness word Sprang wide & side o lande, Forr þatt he wass útnumenn mann I laress & i dedess, & forr þatt he bigann himm sellf, Þær þær he wass i wesste, To fullhtnenn baldeli? þe follc Þatt nass næfrær bigunnenn; Hiss word sprang inntill ?errsalæm & inntill all þatt ende, & all þatt follc toc niþ wiþþ himm Þatt læredd wass o boke, Off þatt he toc swa baldeli? To spellenn & to fullhtnenn, Alls iff he wære Drihhtin Crist Þatt tanne cumenn wære. & te?? þa tokenn sanderrmenn Off preostess & off dæcness & senndenn út off ?errsalæm Till himm inntill þe wesste, Forr þatt te?? sholldenn fra??nenn himm, & asskenn whatt he wære. & swa þe?? didenn, & he þe??m ?aff sware onn?æn, & se??de; Namm I nohht Godess Sune, Crist, Þatt cumenn amm to manne. & te?? onn?æn till himm; arrt tu Helyas efft o life? & he till hemm; na??, namm I nohht Helyas efft o life. & ?ét te?? se??denn þuss till himm; Se?? uss, arrt tu profete? & he þa se??de þuss till hemm; Na??, namm I nohht profete. & tatt te?? se??denn to Johan; Se?? uss, arrt tu profete, Þatt se??denn þe??, alls iff þe?? þuss Wiþþ openn spæche se??denn; Se?? us ?iff þatt iss þatt tu arrt Helysew þe profete, Þatt upp off dæþe risenn arrt To wirrkenn miccle tacness? Hemm þuhhte þatt he mihhte ben Helysew þe profete. word off þatt mann þennkeþþ. Þe Goddspellwrihhte Sannt Johan Onn hiss Goddspelless lare Uss kiþeþþ off þa sanderrmenn, Whatt kinness menn þe?? wærenn. He se??þ uss þatt te?? wærenn off Farisewisshe leode, Forr þatt he wille don uss wel To seon & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt nohht ne comm þatt laþe flocc Till Sannt Johan forr gode, Acc forrþi þatt te?? haffdenn niþ Wiþþ himm & wiþþ hiss lare, & wolldenn unnderrtakenn himm Off summwhatt, ?iff þe?? mihhtenn; Acc himm wass lihht to lokenn himm Fra þe??re laþe wiless. & te?? þa se??denn till Johan; Whi fullhtnesst tu þiss leode, ?iff þatt iss þatt tu narrt nohht Crist, Ne Helyas, ne profete? & Sannt Johan þa se??de þuss; Icc fullhtne i waterr ane. Þe?? wisstenn wel þatt Jesu Crist, To manne cumenn shollde, & tatt he shollde fullhtnenn menn Þurrh hise Leorningcnihhtess, & forrþi wenndenn þe?? full wel Off Sannt Johan Bapptisste, Þatt he wisslike wære Crist, Forr þatt he stod to fullhtnenn. & ec þe?? wisstenn full wel off Helyas þe profete, & ec full wel off Helyseow, Þatt e??þerr inn hiss time Þurrh Drihhtin ?ede upp o þe flumm Alls itt onn eorþe wære, & all comm oferr dri??efót All alls itt waterr nære. & ec þe?? wisstenn witerrli? Þurrh þe??re bokess lare Þatt fulluhht wass, ?a þurrh þe flumm, ?a þurrh hemm baþe tacnedd; & forrþi wenndenn þe?? full wel, Þatt owwþerr off þa twe??enn Off dæþe wære risenn upp To spellenn & to fullhtnenn. & Sannt Johan hemm dide wel To seon & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt he nass næfr an off þa þreo, Forr nollde he nawihht le?henn. Þatt Sannt Johan hemm se??de þuss, Icc fullhtne i waterr ane, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Wiþþ all full openn spæche, I fullhtne menn biforenn to Nohht bútt i waterr ane, Forr min fulluhht ne ma?? hemm nohht Clennsenn off þe??re sinness, Acc wel itt ma?? hemm brinngenn onn To rihhtenn þe??re dede, To ?arrkenn hemm onn?æness Crist Þatt nu shall cumenn newenn, To fullhtnenn hemm þurrh Hali? Gast To clennsenn hemm off sinness. & tatt tatt Cristess þeww Johan Þær se??de to þatt genge, To þa Judisskenn sanderrmenn, Þatt tær wass hemm bitwenenn An swillc, whamm þe?? ne cnewenn nohht, Þatt shollde himm newenn awwnenn, To fullhtnenn follc þurrh Hali? Gast To clennsenn hemm off sinness, Þatt se??de he wiss off Jesu Crist Þatt stod tær hemm bitwenenn; Forr he comm offte till Johan Ær þann he fullhtnedd wære, & Sannt Johan cnew himm full wel, & tatt iss wel to trowwenn; Forr wel biforr þatt Sannt Johan Wass borenn off hiss moderr, Cnew he full wel þe Laferrd Crist I Sannte Mar?ess wambe. & tatt tatt Cristess þeww Johan Þær se??de to þe leode, Þatt he ne wass nohht god inoh Cristess shoþwang tunnbindenn; Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Wiþþ opennlike spæche, Namm I nohht wurrþi þatt I beo Haldenn forr Crist onn eorþe, Ne nohht ne dra?he icc upponn me To beon bridgume nemmnedd Off Cristess brid, off Cristess hird, Off all þatt hall?he genge Þatt rihht shall lefenn uppo Crist & hise la?hess haldenn. Ne dra?he I þatt nohht upponn me Þatt icc þe??m mu?he lesenn Off hellepine, & ?ifenn hemm To winnenn heoffness blisse; Forr þatt ne ma?? nan shaffte don Wiþþutenn Goddcunndnesse. O þálde la?heboc wass sett, All þurrh Drihhtiness wille, Þatt, ?iff þatt tu ne kepptesst nohht To t?kenn ne to weddenn Þatt wifmann þatt te rihht bilammp To t?kenn & to weddenn, Þa shollde an oþerr cumenn forþ Off all þatt illke ma??þe, & shollde unnbindenn þin shoþwang, Swa summ þe boc himm tahhte, & shollde t?kenn þa till himm Þatt wifmann all wiþþ lefe. & forrþi se??de Sannt Johan, Swa summ ?e littlær herrdenn, Þatt he ne wass nohht god inoh Cristess shoþwang tunnbindenn, Forrþi þatt he ne mihhte nohht, Swa summ icc hafe shæwedd, Bridgume beon off Cristess brid, To lesenn hire off helle. & tiss mann unnderrstanndenn ma?? ?ét onn an oþerr wise, Þatt Johan nass nohht god inoh Cristess shoþwang tunnbindenn, Forrþi þatt he ne mihhte nohht All þwerrt út unnderrstanndenn, Hu Godess word & Godess witt & Godess a?henn kinde Toc inn an clene ma??dennmann Dæþshildi?nessess kinde, Swa þatt he warrþ soþ mann, acc all Þwerrt út wiþþutenn sinne. & tiss dæþshildi? mann þatt Crist Toc i þe laffdi? Mar?e Wass uss full wel, ?a þurrh þe sho, ?a þurrh þe þwang bitacnedd; & tatt forrþi þatt e??þerr iss Þe fell off dæde deoress. & tatt tatt Cristess þeww Johan Þær se??de to þe leode, Þatt ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Þe leode shollde fullhtnenn Þurrh Hali? Gast & ec þurrh fir, To clennsenn hemm off sinness, Þatt se??de he forr to don uss wel To seon & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt tatt iss all þurrh Hali? Gast Þatt fulluhht clennseþþ sinness. & Hali? Gast iss hali? fir, Þatt bærneþþ i þatt herrte Þatt iss þurrh ?ife off Hali? Gast Wiþþ soþfast lufe filledd. Þiss fir ma?? ec bitacnenn uss Þatt piness annxumnesse Þatt hall?he weress þolenn her All gilltelæs onn eorþe, Þatt clennseþþ hemm all þwerrt út wel Off alle þe??re sinness, Forrþi þatt te?? forr lufe off Godd Gladdlike þolenn pine. & ?ét we mu?henn, þurrh þatt fir Þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste Spacc offe to þa sanderrmenn, All full wel unnderrstanndenn Þatt fir þatt iss inn oþerr lif To clennsenn menness sawless. Forr hére uss clennseþþ Hali? Gast Þurrh fulluhht & þurrh trowwþe, & tær þatt fir, ?iff þatt we rihht Her endenn unnderr shriffte; & baþe comm uss Jesu Crist To clennsenn here & tære, Forr þatt he wollde ?ifenn uss To brukenn eche blisse. & tatt tatt Cristess þeww Johan Þær se??de to þe leode, Þatt ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Þatt time þatt he come Himm shollde brinngenn inn hiss hannd Hiss winndell forr to winndwenn, & forr to clennsenn himm hiss corn, & fra þe chaff to shædenn, & sammnenn all þe clene corn & don itt inn hiss berrne, & werrpenn all þe chaff anan, Inntill þe fír to bærnenn, Inntill þatt fír þatt bærnenn shall A butenn ende unncwennkedd; Þatt se??de he forr to don uss wel To seon & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt Jesu Crist o Domess da?? Shall shædenn & todælenn Þurrh heofennlike skill & shæd All follc o twe??enn daless, & brinngenn all þatt hall?he flocc Þatt wel himm hafeþþ cwemedd Upp inntill heoffne, & ?ifenn hemm A butenn ende blisse, & werrpenn all þatt laþe flocc Þatt deoffless hafeþþ foll?hedd Inntill þe fír off hellepitt, All affterr þe??re wrihhte, To beon wiþþutenn ende þær, To bærnenn & to wallenn, Wiþþ deofless dun inn hellegrund Forr þe??re fule s?ness. & tiss mann unnderrstanndenn ma?? ?ét onn an oþerr wise, Þatt ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Winndweþþ hiss corn & clennseþþ, & shædeþþ a?? þe chaff þær fra Whil þatt tiss weorelld lassteþþ, I þa þatt hafenn name off Crist & uppo Criste lefenn, & offte i þa þatt lifenn her, & offte i þa þatt swelltenn. I þa þatt lifenn winndweþþ Crist & clennseþþ hére hiss whæte, A?? whannse preostess mannsenn her & shædenn þa fra Criste Þatt opennlike onn?æness Crist All þe??re þannkess wiþþrenn. I þa þatt swelltenn winndweþþ Crist & clennseþþ hére hiss whæte, A?? whane itt cumeþþ to, þatt he Till hellepine demeþþ Þatt mann þatt unnderr Crisstenndom, & unnderr læfe o Criste, Wel cwemmde deofell wiþþ hiss lif & wiþþ hiss lifess ende, Þatt a?? wass lihht all allse chaff, To foll?henn alle sinness. & ta þatt ure Laferrd Crist Þurrh preost, & þurrh himm sellfenn, Þuss shædeþþ fra þatt hall?he flocc Þatt hise la?hess haldeþþ, Þe?? alle sinndenn þurrh þe chaff Full opennli? bitacnedd; Forr all allswa summ corn & chaff Uppspringenn off an rote, All swa þatt flocc off crisstnedd follc Þatt þurrh þe chaff iss tacnedd Iss crisstnedd all þurrh an fulluhht, & þurrh an læfe o Criste, Wiþþ þa þatt foll?henn Jesu Crist & hise la?hess haldenn. Þe winndell iss i Cristess hannd, Þatt iss i Cristess walde, Forr himm iss all þe Dom bitahht To demenn cwike & dæde; Þe Faderr, & te Frofre Gast Himm hafenn sett to demenn, & he shall demenn att te Dom All mannkinn cwike & dæde, Þurrh hiss goddcunnde skill & shæd Þatt hiss winndell bitacneþþ. Þe fir off helle iss endeless, & a?? occ a?? unncwennkedd, Swa þatt itt mu?he lasstenn a, To bærnenn & to pinenn A butenn ende all wiþþ rihht dom All deofle follc onn hæfedd, & forþ wiþþ hemm ec all þatt flocc, Wiþþ bodi? & wiþþ sawle, Þatt cwemmde deofell i þiss lif Wiþþ lif & ec wiþþ ende; Forr rihht iss þatt hemm lasste wa A?? whil þatt itt ma?? lasstenn, Onn?æn þatt tatt te?? ifell lif A?? leddenn whil þe?? mihhtenn. Þe Goddspellwrihhte Sannt Johan O þiss Goddspell uss kiþeþþ, Þatt ta Judisskenn sanderrmenn Till Cristess bidell comenn Út ferr inntill an tun þatt wass Beþania ?ehatenn; & tatt wass o ?onnd hallf þe flumm Þær he wass þa to fullhtnenn; & witt tu wel þatt tatt wass don Forr mikell þing to tacnenn. Twa tuness wærenn i þatt land, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, & e??þerr off þa twe??enn wass Beþania ?ehatenn. Þatt an wass o ?onnd hallf þe flumm & o þiss hallf þatt oþerr, & þurrh þe name off e??þerr tun Iss herrsummnesse tacnedd. & þurrh þe flumm iss opennli? Cristess fulluhht bitacnedd, Forrþi þatt Crist wass fullhtnedd tær Þurrh Sannt Johan Baptisste. & alle þa þatt heldenn rihht Till Drihhtin herrsummnesse Biforenn þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass fullhtnedd here onn eorþe, Þe?? alle samenn wærenn uss, Þatt se??þ þe boc, bitacnedd Þurrh þatt Beþania þatt wass Bi?onndenn flumm i wesste. & alle þa þatt haldenn rihht Till Drihhtin herrsummnesse Nu siþþenn þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass fullhtnedd her onn eorþe, Þe?? alle samenn sinndenn uss I Crisstenndom bitacnedd Þurrh þatt Beþania þatt wass O þiss hallf neh þe temmple. O ?onnd hallf flod wass Sannt Johan Bapptisste forr to fullhtnenn, Acc hiss fulluhht ne mihhte nohht Clennsenn þe follc off sinness; & tærþurrh wass bitacnedd wel Þatt all follc wass unnclennsedd Off þatt missdede þatt wass don Þurrh Adam & þurrh Eve, Anan till þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass na??ledd upp o rode, To leosenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe deofless walde. & i þatt oþerr tun þatt wass Beþania ?ehatenn, & wass bi þiss hallf flumm Jorrdan Neh ?errsalæmess chesstre, I þatt Beþania ras upp An mann þurrh Crist off dæþe Þatt wass ?ehatenn Lazaruss; Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn, Þatt fulluhht unnderr Crisstenndom & þurrh þe rihhte læfe Nu re??seþþ menn off sawless dæþ, & clennseþþ hemm off sinne, To þeowwtenn ure Laferrd Crist Þurrh soþfasst herrsummnesse, Forr swa to winnenn hellpe att himm, To cumenn þurrh hiss are Till ?errsalæm inn heoffness ærd, Till eche griþess sihhþe. & Godd Allmahhti? ?ife uss witt, & lusst, & mahht, & wille, To þeowwtenn ure Laferrd Crist Wiþþ soþfasst herrsummnesse, Swa þatt we motenn heoffness griþþ A-butenn ende brukenn. Amæn. SECUNDUM MATHEUM XIX. Venit IHC a Galilea in Jordanem ad Johannem ut baptizaretur. Unnderr þa da?hess, alls uss se??þ Maþeow þe Goddspellwrihhte, Comm Jesu Crist off Galileo Fra Nazaræþess chesstre Till flumm Jorrdan, till Sannt Johan Þær he stod follc to fullhtnenn, & Crist ta wollde fullhtnedd beon Att Sannt Johaness hande; & Sannt Johan droh himm o bacch & nollde he Crist nohht fullhtnenn, & se??de; na??, lef Laferrd, na??, Ne darr i þe nohht fullhtnenn; Me birrþ beon fullhtnedd att tin hannd, Þin blettsinng tunnderrganngenn, & tu, min Laferrd, cumesst her Att me to wurrþenn fullhtnedd? & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist ?aff himm anndswere & se??de; L?t nu, Johan, forr þuss birrþ uss Illc rihhtwisnesse fillenn; & tanne lét himm Sannt Johan Don all hiss lefe wille; & Jesu Crist wass fullhtnedd tær Att Sannt Johaness hande. & forrþrihht alls he fullhtnedd wass He stah uppo þe strande, & heoffness wærenn oppnedd ta Till Sannt Johaness ehne, & he sahh þære Godess Gast, Inn aness cullfress like, Off heoffne cumenn upponn Crist & upponn himm bilefenn; & tær wass herrd an steffne anan Off heoffne þuss wiþþ worde; Þiss iss min Sune, & me full lef & cweme onn alle wise. Her endeþþ nu þiss Goddspell þuss & uss birrþ itt þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt itt læreþþ uss Off ure sawle nede. Þe Laferrd Crist comm till þe flumm, Till Sannt Johan Bapptisste, Forr þatt he wollde fullhtnedd beon, Forr mani?whatt to tacnenn, Forr naffde he naness k?ness ned Himm sellf to wurrþenn fullhtnedd, Acc forrþi þatt he wollde swa Uss shæwenn soþ meocnesse, & fillenn rihhtwisnesse swa Þurrh soþ meocnessess bisne; Forr Latin boc uss se??þ þatt soþ Meocnesse iss þrinne kinness. An kinness iss þatt tu beo meoc & herrsumm till þin elldre, & tatt tu wiþþ þin efenninng Þe metelike lede, Swa þatt tu þe ne dra?he nohht Abufenn himm wiþþ wo?he. & ?iff þatt iss þatt tu þe willt Þurrh rihhtwisnesse berr?henn, Þa birrþ þe þiss meocnessess sloþ Att tallre læste foll?henn; Forr þu ne mahht nohht rihhtwis beon Wiþþutenn þiss meocnesse, Ne þu ne mahht nohht borr?henn beon Wiþþutenn rihhtwisnesse. ?ét iss an oþerr oferr þiss Meocnesse miccle mare, Þatt tu beo meoc to la?henn þe Unnderr þin efennméte, & tatt tu þe ne dra?he nohht Abufenn þine lah?hre. & tiss meocnesse iss oferrmett Swa þatt itt oferrfloweþþ, & itt iss mare þann inoh, ?iff icc itt durrste seggenn. ?ét iss meocnesse off mare mahht, ?ét ma?? ?ho mare forþenn, & ?ho doþ Cristess hall?he þeoww To la?henn himm ?ét mare; Forr ?ho doþ þe to settenn þe Bineþenn þine lah?hre, To lutenn hemm, to lefftenn hemm, To þeowwtenn hemm tocweme. Þiss iss þe þridde k?ne mahht Þatt soþ meocnesse shæweþþ, Þiss iss þe þridde, & itt iss mast & he?hesst off hemm alle; Forr niss nan mann þatt æfre ma?? Meocnesse mare shæwenn Þann he doþ, whase la?heþþ himm Bineþenn hise lah?hre, & luteþþ hemm, & leffteþþ hemm, & þeowwteþþ hemm tocweme, Nohht forr þe lufe off eorþli? loff Acc forr þe lufe off Criste. & ?iff icc fillenn ma?? þiss mahht Þatt mast iss off hemm alle, Þa ma?? icc fillenn þoþre twa, Forr baþe sinndenn lah?hre, Alls iff icc fede twennti? menn, Icc fede téne & fife. & ?iff þatt icc þiss þridde mahht Full fremeddlike fille, Þa fille icc, þatt witt tu full wel, All rihhtwisnessess mahhte. & forrþi se??de Jesu Crist Till Sannt Johan Bapptisste, Þatt he þær shollde fillenn swa All rihhtwisnessess mahhte, Þurrh þatt he shollde fullhtnedd beon Att himm þatt wass hiss shaffte, Þurrh þatt he shollde lah?henn himm Unnderr hiss þeowwess hande He þatt wass alle shaffte Godd, Þatt alle shaffte wrohhte. & Crist comm út off Nazaræþ, Forr þatt he wollde tacnenn, Þatt iwhillc mann þatt unnderr Crist Iss la?helike fullhtnedd Birrþ t?kenn unnderr Crisstenndom To broddenn & to blomenn, To berenn, forr to berr?henn himm, God wasstme & gode dedess; Forr Nazaræþ bitacneþþ uss Onn Ennglissh brodd & blome. & Crist comm út off Galileo, Forr þatt he wollde tacnenn, Þatt iwhillc mann þatt unnderr Crist Iss la?helike fullhtnedd Iss flittedd út þurrh Hali? Gast Off alle k?ne s?ness; Forr Galileo bitacneþþ uss Flitttinng onn Ennglissh spæche. & Crist comm inntill flumm Jorrdan Forr þatt he wollde tacnenn, Þatt iwhillc mann þatt unnderr Crist Iss la?helike fullhtnedd Birrþ sti?henn dun fra þeþennforþ Off modi?nessess lawe, & la?henn himm ?æn iwhillc mann, To shæwenn soþ meocnesse. Forr whase itt iss þatt sti?heþþ dun Þiss gate off modi?nesse, He filleþþ inn himm sellfenn þatt Þatt þurrh Jorrdan iss tacnedd. Gast o Crist Anan summ he wass fullhtnedd. & Crist wass fullhtnedd att te flumm Forr þatt he wollde shæwenn, Þatt heoffness gate iss oppnedd me Þatt da?? þatt icc amm fullhtnedd, Forr heoffne wass oppnedd anan ?æn Crist tær he wass fullhtnedd. & Crist wass fullhtnedd att te flumm Forr þatt he wollde shæwenn, Þatt iwhillc mann þatt unnderr Crist Iss la?helike fullhtnedd Birrþ wurrþenn milde, & soffte, & meoc, & æddmod allse cullfre, Forr þær comm Hali? Allmahhti? Gast comm uppo Crist Inn aness cullfress like, Forr þatt he shollde se?henn beon O sume kinne wise; Forr gast iss all unnse?hennlic ?æn eorþlic e?hess sihhþe. & nohht ne birrþ ?uw lefenn þohh Ne trowwenn þatt tatt cullfre Wass Hali? þe deofell, & enngless comenn sone anan & tokenn Crist to þeowwtenn. Her endeþþ nu þiss Goddspell þuss, & uss birrþ itt þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt itt læreþþ uss Off ure sawless nede. Þatt ure Laferrd Jesu Crist, Forrþrihht summ he wass fullhtnedd, Wass ledd út inntill wessteland Þurrh Gast, forr þatt he shollde Beon fandedd þurrh þe laþe gast Þær þær he wollde fasstenn, All þatt wass don þurrh Jesu Crist, Forr mikell þing to tacnenn; Acc ?uw birrþ witenn witerrli? & sikerrlike trowwenn, Þatt he wass ledd þurrh Hali? Crist for út inntill wessteland Forrþrihht summ he wass fullhtnedd, To tacnenn swa þatt Cristess þeoww, Forrþrihht summ he beoþ fullhtnedd, Birrþ weorelldshipess seollþe flen, & flæshess lusst forrwerrpenn, All swa summ wessteland iss all Forrworrpenn & forrlætenn. Crist comm út inntill wessteland, Forr þatt he wollde fasstenn, To shæwenn swa þatt Cristess þeoww, Affterr þatt he beoþ fullhtnedd, Birrþ stanndenn inn to þeowwtenn Crist Wiþþ fasstinng & wiþþ beness, Wiþþ wecchess, & wiþþ mett & mæþ I claþess & i fode. & Crist comm inntill wessteland To beon þurrh deofell fandedd, To shæwenn swa þatt Cristess þeoww, Affterr þatt he beoþ fullhtnedd, Shall hafenn rihht inoh to don To stanndenn ?æn þe deofell, ?iff he shall mu?henn ?emenn himm Fra deofless dæne wiless; Forr affterr þatt te mann iss shadd All þweorrt út fra þe deofell Þurrh fulluhht, & þurrh Cristenndom, & þurrh þe rihhte læfe, Þæraffterr iss þe laþe gast ?errnfull wiþþ all hiss mahhte, To winnenn efft tatt illke mann Þurrh hise laþe wiless, Þurrh þatt he shall himm brinngenn onn To don summ hæfedd sinne, All hise þannkess, all unnnedd, All att hiss flæshess wille. & tærþurrh iss þatt crisstnedd follc Iss swiþe full off swillke Þatt foll?henn efft te laþe gast, Þurrh þatt te?? deope sinness Unnderr þe name off Crisstenndom All þe??re þannkess foll?henn; Þatt cumeþþ all la fuli?wiss Off-þatt te deofell nære Ne blinneþþ off to skrennkenn þa Þatt haffdenn himm forrworrpenn, & forr þatt we ne stanndenn nohht Swa summ uss birrde stanndenn Onn?æness himm wiþþ hali? lif, Ne wiþþ þe rihhte læfe. Uss birrde all eorþli? þing forrseon To winnenn itt þurrh sinne, & a?? uss birrde beon forrlisst Affterr þe blisse off heoffne, & æfre fihhtenn ?æn þe flæsh & ?æn þe flæshess lusstess. Þa mihhte we þe laþe gast Wiþþstanndenn & wiþþseggenn, & winnenn sí?e & oferrhannd Off himm wiþþ Cristess hellpe. Crist comm út inntill wessteland, Forr þatt he wollde fasstenn Fowwerrti? da?hess all onn an Wiþþutenn iwhillc fode, Forr þatt te tale off fowwerrti? Full wel bitacnenn shollde Þatt all þiss middellærd, tatt iss O fowwre daless dæledd, Onn Æst, o Wesst, o Suþ, o Norrþ, Birrþ lefenn uppo Criste, & lufenn Crist, & drædenn Crist, & foll?henn Cristess lare Þatt all þwerrt út bilokenn iss I tene bodewordess, Swa þatt te manness bodi? beo Buhsumm forþ wiþþ þe sawle, To cwemenn wel Allmahhti? Godd Onn alle kinne wise. Forr manness bodi? fe?edd iss Off fowwre kinne shaffte, Off heoffness fir, & off þe lifft, Off waterr, & off eorþe. & sawle iss shapenn all off nohht, & hafeþþ þrinne mahhtess; Forr sawle onnfoþ att Drihhtin Godd Innsihht & minndi?nesse, & wille iss hire þridde mahht Þurrh whatt menn immess ?eornenn, Forr sume ?eornenn eorþli? þing, & sume itt all forrwerrpenn, & ?eornenn heofennlike þing To winnenn & to brukenn. & ure Godd, Allmahhti? Godd, Iss an Godd & þreo hadess, Faderr, & Sune, & Hali? Gast, An Godd all unntodæledd. Her uss bitacnenn fowwre & þreo Þe bodi? & te sawle. & Godd iss her tacnedd þurrh þreo, Forr Godd iss i þreo hadess. & ?iff þu fe?esst þreo wiþþ þreo, Þa findesst tu þær sexe, & ?iff þu fowwre dost tærto, Þa findesst tu þær tene, & fowwre & þreo wiþþ oþre þreo Full opennli? bitacnenn Þe bodi?, & te sawle, & Godd, & tene bodewordess, Forrþi þtt manness bodi? birrþ Forrþi wiþþ þe manness sawle Rihht lufenn Godd, rihht drædenn Godd, Rihht foll?henn Godess lare Þatt all þweorrt út bilokenn iss I tene bodewordess. Þatt ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Himm droh fra mete i wesste, Þatt tíme þatt himm ?ét wass ned To metess & to drinnchess, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Till all mannkinn onn eorþe; Whatt mann se wile cwemenn me, To winnenn eche blisse, Þatt illke mann birrþ dra?henn himm Fra gluterrnessess esstess, & t?kenn forr þe lufe off me Unnorne fode & litell. & tatt he siþþenn ét & drannc Wiþþ hise Leorningcnihhtess, Affterr þatt he wass dæd forr uss & risenn upp off dæþe, Þatt tíme þatt himm nass nan ned To metess, ne to drinnchess, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Till hise deore þeowwess; Icc shall beon a?? occ a?? wiþþ ?uw Whil þatt tiss weorelld lassteþþ, To fedenn ?uw, to frofrenn ?uw, To wissenn ?uw, to gætenn Þurrh Hali? Gastess hellpe & hald Onn?æness laþe gastess. & I shall t?kenn ?uw till me Att ?ure lifess ende, & ?ifenn ?uw inn heoffness ærd Þe fode off eche blisse. Þatt Jesu Crist forrhunngredd wass, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Affterr þatt all hiss fasste wass Forþedd & brohht till ende, Þatt hunngerr wass þatt hall?he lusst Þatt wass i Crisstess herrte, Þatt mannkinn shollde lesedd beon Út off þe deoffless walde, & turrnedd till þe Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe, To winnenn lott þurrh hali? lif Off heofennrichess blisse. & he wass ec forrhunngredd ta, Forr þatt he wollde shæwenn Þatt he wass mann o moderr hallf Þatt haffde ned to fode. & he wass ec forrhunngredd ta, Forr þatt te deofell shollde Wel wenenn þatt he wære mann, Swa þatt he Godd ne wære. & forrþi toc þe laþe gast To fandenn Crist i wesste, Forr þatt he warrþ orrtrowwe off Crist Þurrh niþfull modi?nesse, Forr þatt he sahh himm usell wihht Inn ure mennisscnesse, Forr whatt he lét full hæþeli? To lefenn & to trowwenn, Þatt swillc an shollde mu?henn beon Shippennd off alle shaffte; & forrþi wollde he fandenn himm, To cunnenn ?iff he mihhte Onn ani? wise wurrþenn wis To witenn whatt he wære. & he comm þa biforenn Crist Inn aness weress heowe, & lét himm staness seon anan, & se??de þuss wiþþ worde; ?iff þatt tu Godess Sune arrt wiss, Macc bræd off þise staness. Þurrh þatt te laþe gast badd Crist Þær makenn bræd off staness, ?iff þatt he wære witerrli? Crist Godess Sune, off heoffne, Þærþurrh he wollde wurrþenn wis Off Crist-whatt wihht he wære. Forr ?iff he wrohhte bræd off stan, Þa munnde he seon þatt mahhte, & munnde trowwenn wel þatt he Crist Godess Sune wære. & ?iff he wollde makenn bræd, & makenn itt ne mihhte, Þa wære he þurrh þe lusst off bræd I gluterrnesse fallenn, & wære þa bikahht & lahht Þurrh fanding off þe deofell Þatt illke wise þatt Adam Wass lahht þurrh gluterrnesse. & ?iff þe Laferrd haffde þær Þatt wise makedd lafess Þatt himm þurrh deofell beodenn wass, Þa wære he þær bikæchedd. Þe deofell badd himm makenn bræd, Forr þatt he wass forrhunngredd, Swa þatt he shollde þurrh þe bræd Fallenn i gluterrnesse. & ?iff þe Laferrd haffde wrohht Himm fode onn?æn hiss hunngerr, Þa wære he þurrh þe deofless croc I gluterrnesse fallenn, & nohht ne wære he þanne Godd, Forr Godd ne gillteþþ næfre. All swa summ Adam allre firrst Biswikenn wass þurrh æte, All swa bigann þe deofell firrst To fandenn Crist þurrh æte. & forrþi wass þe Laferrd tær To fasstenn-forr to shæwenn Þatt tu ne mahht nohht cwennkenn rihht Nan oþerr hæfedd sinne, ?iff þu ne mahht nohht habbenn mahht To cwennkenn gluterrnesse. & forrþi birrþ uss allre firrst Offtredenn gluterrnesse, Swa þatt we mu?henn habbenn mahht To cwennkenn oþre sinness; Forr gluterrnesse waccneþþ all Galnessess laþe strenncþe, & all þe flæshess kaggerrle??c & alle fule lusstess Biginnenn þære & springenn út Off gluterrnessess rote, & forrþi birrþ mann allre firrst Offtredenn gluterrnesse, Swa þatt mann mu?he þess te bett Offtredenn oþre sinness; Forr son se gluterrnesse iss dæd, Sone iss þe bodi? bridledd, & siþþenn iss itt lasse swinnc To cwennkenn oþre sinness. & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist ?aff sware onn?æn & se??de, Boc se??þ þatt nohht ne ma?? þe mann Bi bræd all ane libbenn, Acc bi þatt word tatt cumeþþ út Off Godess muþess lare, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Wiþþ all full openn spæche; Þin egginng iss off flæshess lusst, & nohht off sawless fode, Þurrh whatt icc unnderrstanndenn ma?? Þatt tu me willt biswikenn. Nu, laferrdinngess, nimeþþ gom Off þiss þatt here iss trahhtnedd. Þe deofell spacc off eorþli? bræd Off eorþli? lifess fode, Forr deofell eggeþþ a?? þe mann To foll?henn gluterrnesse. & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Spacc off þe sawless fode; & ?uw birrþ witenn witerrli? Þatt ?ure sawles fode Iss i þe lare off hali? boc Þatt ?uw iss sett to foll?henn, & ?ure sawless fode iss ec, ?iff þatt ?e Drihhtin cwemenn, I Cristess flæsh & inn hiss blod Þatt ?ure preostess hall?henn; Þe?? hall?henn Cristess flæsh off bræd, & Cristess blod te?? hall?henn Off win, þurrh Cristess a?henn word Þatt hafeþþ mahhte & strenncþe To turrnenn baþe bræd & win All út off þe??re kinde, & inntill Cristess flæsh & blod, Inntill þe sawless fode, Off alle þa þatt lufenn Crist & hise la?hess haldenn. & whase itt iss þatt nohht niss off To takenn wiþþ þiss fode Swa summ himm takenn birrþ þærwiþþ, Wiþþ clene lif & læfe, Þatt mann iss þwerrt út shadd fra Crist, & dæd inn all hiss sawle. & whase itt iss þatt nohht niss off To t?kenn wiþþ þatt lare Þatt cumeþþ út off Godess muþ, Þatt Godess þeowwess spellenn Þatt sinndenn nemmnedd Godess muþ, Forr þatt te?? Godess lare O Godess hallfe, i Godess hus Till Godess leode spellenn, Nu-whase itt iss þatt nohht niss off To t?kenn wiþþ þatt lare, Þatt mann iss all swa shadd fra Godd, & dæd inn all hiss sawle. Forr ?uw birrþ herrcnenn Godess word & haldenn itt & foll?henn, & ?arrkenn ?uw & clennsenn ?uw Well ?eorne onn alle wise, Swa þatt ?e Cristess flæsh & blod Swa motenn unnderrfanngenn, Þatt itt ?uw mu?he berr?henn her Þe lif & ec þe sawle. & forrþi þatt te Laferrd Crist Swillc sware ?aff þe deofell, Þatt he ne wisste nohht te bett Ne nohht te mare off Criste, Þe deofell brohhte himm, alls uss se??þ Maþþew þe Goddspellwrihhte, Inntill þe burrh off ?errsalæm, & brohhte himm o þe temmple, & sette himm he?he uppo þe rof Wiþþutenn bi þe wa?he, Forr þatt he wollde himm fandenn þær, To w?tenn whatt he wære. Acc ?uw birrþ w?tenn, alls uss se??þ Lucas þe Goddspellwrihhte, Þatt ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Wass brohht uppo þe lawe Þær i þe wesste þær he wass Himm ane & haffde fasstedd, Ær þann he þurrh þe laþe gast Wass brohht uppo þe temmple. Forr affterr þatt te laþe gast Himm haffde twi??ess fandedd Þære i þe wesste þær he wass Himm ane & haffde fasstedd, Þæraffterr comm þe Laferrd Crist Till ?errsalæmess chesstre, & tær wass efft te laþe gast Rædi? forr himm to fandenn, & brohhte himm o þe temmple þær, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, To cunnenn ?iff he mihhte þær Ohht w?tenn whatt he wære. Acc affterr þatt, uss Goddspell wrát Maþþew þe Goddspellwrihhte, Þe Laferrd Crist wass allre lattst Uppo þe lawe fandedd; & tatt forrþi forr þatt Maþþew Onn hiss Goddspelless lare Uss writeþþ, þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass fandedd þurrh þe deofell Þatt illke wise þatt Adam I Paradys wass fandedd, & brohht to grund & unnderrfót & i þe deofless walde. Forr allre firrst wass Adam þær Þurrh gluterrnesse wundedd, & affterr þatt þurrh idell ?ellp Þatt iss þurrh modi?nesse, & allre lattst he wundedd wass Þurrh gredi?nessess wæpenn. & all þatt illke wise wass Crist Godess Sune fandedd, Affterr þatt tatt itt writeþþ uss Maþþew þe Goddspellwrihhte. Forr allre firrst he fandedd wass Þurrh fodess gluterrnesse, Þurrh þatt te laþe gast himm badd Off staness makenn lafess. & siþþenn affterr þatt he wass Þurrh modi?nesse fandedd, Þurrh þatt te laþe gast himm badd Dun læpenn off þe temmple. Forr he doþ hise þeowwess a?? To climbenn upp full he?he, Forr þatt he wile scrennkenn hemm, Full hefi? fall to fallenn. & Crist doþ hise þeowwess a?? He mihhte þære shæwenn Crist Þa fowwre daless alle Þatt Æst, & Wesst, & Suþ, & Norrþ Þiss middellærd bilukenn, & swa þurrh þatt he mihhte Crist Þær o þatt lawe shæwenn Off all þiss wide middellærd Þe kinedomess alle; Forr niss nan eorþli? kinedom Here upponn eorþeriche, Þatt owwhar elless mu?he beon Butt i þa fowwre daless. Þiss wollde he brinngenn Crist i þohht To willnenn & to geornenn, Acc þatt wass all forr nohht tatt he Swa wollde Crist biswikenn, Forr Cristess þohht wass sperrd swa wel Wiþþinnenn & wiþþutenn, Þatt naness kinness sinnfull lusst Ne mihhte itt næfre unnsperrenn, Forr sinne naffde næfre mahht To cumenn þær wiþþinnenn, Forr Crist wass wiss Allmahhti? Godd, & Godd ne gillteþþ næfre. Lucas þe Goddspellwrihhte se??þ Onn hiss Goddspelless lare, Þatt deofell lét te Laferrd seon Whattlike inn an hanndwhile Off all þiss wide middellærd Þe kinedomess alle. Þær læh þe deofell witerrli?, Forr naffþ he rihht nan mahhte Nowwþerr, noff Cristess hall?he þeod, Noff Cristess þeodess ahhte, Bútt iff þatt Crist himm ?ife mahht To swennchenn Cristess þeowwess; & ?iff Crist ?ifeþþ himm þatt mahht Oþþr itt iss, þatt witt tu full wel, Þiss lifess modi?nesse. Þe flæshess fule lufe & lusst Her tacneþþ gluterrnesse, Forr all þe flæshess fule lusst Waccneþþ þurrh gluterrnesse. & ehne laþe lufe & lusst Her tacneþþ gredi?nesse, Forr all þatt æfre iss i þin fe, Þatt liþ inn hord all stille, Swa þatt tu nohht ne notesst itt Att naness kinness nede, All þatt tu sammness i þin hord Þurrh sinnfull gredi?nesse, & doþ itt te nan oþerr god Bútan þatt tatt tu gowesst Þæronne þa þu gast tærto, Forr þatt te lisste itt shæwenn. & witt tu þatt tút hafesst all Sett i þe deofless walde, ?iff þatt tu nillt nohht wannsenn itt Forr naness manness nede, & addlesst þurrh þin hord att Godd To dre?henn hellepine, Þurrh þatt tút hafesst sammnedd swa & hidd fra manne nede. Acc ?iff þu wære rædi? till To nittenn itt att nede Onn alle þa þatt haffdenn ned & þarrfe to þin hellpe, Þa mihhtesst tu swa þurrh þin hord Þe winnenn heoffness blisse. & lifess modi?nesse iss all Off eorþli? þingess seollþe, Off laferrddom, off ahhtess sped, Off hæle, off fa??errnesse, Off strenncþe, off eorþli? witt & skill, Off eorþli? crafftess seollþe. & forrþi se??de swiþe soþ Lucas þe Goddspellwrihhte, Þatt deofell wennde awe?? fra Crist Son summ he filledd haffde All þatt fandinnge towarrd Crist Þatt æfre cuþe he findenn, Forr all þe deofless fandinng iss O þise þrinne wise, Þurrh gluterrnessess laþe lasst, & ec þurrh gredi?nesse, & þurrh þatt laþe modi?le??c Þatt comm all off himm sellfenn. & a?? he fandeþþ Cristess hird O þise þrinne wise, Forr ?iff þatt he þe nohht ne ma?? Þurrh gluterrnesse swennchenn, Þurrh þatt tu lufesst mett & mæþ I claþess & i fode, & i þin herrtess lufe & lusst To winnenn eorþlic ahhte, He cunneþþ þa to fandenn þe O gredi?nessess hallfe, He cunneþþ þa to lærenn þe To nittenn swiþe litell, & gredi?li? to sammnenn all & hordenn þatt tu winnesst, & l?tenn þatt tu cwemesst Godd Útnumennli? wiþþ alle, Þurrh þatt tatt tu forrwerrpesst all To foll?henn gluterrnesse. & ?iff he brinngeþþ i þin lusst Hiss wille swa to foll?henn, Þanne arrt tu swa bikahht þurrh himm Þohh þatt tu swa ne wene; Forr allse unncweme iss Godd tatt tu Þurrh gredi?nesse gillte, Alls himm iss, ?iff þu gilltesst her ?æn himm þurrh gluterrnesse. & ?iff þatt tu þe ?emesst wel Þurrh þin Drihhtiness hellpe Fra gluterrnessess laþe lasst & ec fra gredi?nesse, Þa cunneþþ he to swennchenn þe Þurrh sinnfull modi?nesse, He fandeþþ þa to lacchenn þe Þurrh trapp off modi?nesse, Off þatt tatt tu þe ?emesst wel Þurrh þin Drihhtiness hellpe Fra gluterrnessess laþe lasst & ec fra gredi?nesse. Þuss fandeþþ deofell Godess follc O þise þrinne wise, Þuss cunneþþ he to wundenn uss Þurrh þise þrinne wæpenn, & tuss he wile winnenn uss Till himm wiþþ swillke wæpenn, All alls he wann Eve & Adam I Paradisess riche; & all swa wollde winnenn Crist Þurrh þise þrinne wæpenn, All alls he wann Eve & Adam, ?iff þatt he mihhte spedenn. & her icc wile shæwenn ?uw Whatt gate he wann hemm baþe, Whatt gate he wann Eve & Adam Þurrh þise þrinne wæpenn, & ec hu Crist himm oferrcomm Wiþþ all þatt illke wæpenn. Þurrh gluterrnesse wass Adam I Paradys þurrhwundedd, Þær he þatt appell toc & ét Þatt Godd forrbodenn haffde. Þurrh gluterrnesse himm oferrcomm Þe laþe gast inn æte, Þurrh þatt he dide himm etenn þær Þat Godd forrbodenn haffde. Þurrh gredi?nesse wass Adam I Paradys þurrhwundedd, I þatt tatt he wass þær forrlisst To winnenn awihht mare Innsihht, & witt, & shæd, & skill Þann himm hiss Drihhtin uþe. I witt & skill himm oferrcomm Deofell þurrh gredi?nesse, Þurrh þatt he þære brohhte himm onn To ?eornenn affterr mare Innsihht, & witt, & shæd, & skill Þann himm hiss Drihhtin uþe, Forr þuss he se??de till Adam; Ett off þiss treowwess wasstme, & tu shallt habbenn witt & skill Inn alle kinne þinge Wel mare & bettre þann itt iss Þe sett þurrh Godess wille. & þurrh þatt Adam toc & ét Swa summ þe deofell ?errnde, Forr þatt he wollde winnenn witt Onn?æn Drihhtiness wille, Þærþurrh himm oferrcomm þe fend Wiþþ gredi?nessess wæpenn. Þurrh modi?nesse wass Adam I Paradys þurrhwundedd, I þatt he toc wel wiþþ þatt word Þatt himm þe deofell se??de, Þær þær þe deofell se??de þuss Till himm & till hiss macche; ?iff þatt ?itt etenn off þatt tre Þatt Drihhtin ?unnc forrbedeþþ, ?itt shulenn ben forrþrihht anan Wiþþ enngless efennméte. & forrþi þatt te?? ?eorrndenn þa Þurrh sinnfull modi?nesse To winnenn þurrh þe laþe gast Wurrþminnt ?æn Godess wille, Þe?? didenn þatt te defell badd, & fellenn inn hiss walde. Forr þurrh þatt tatt te?? wolldenn ba ?æn Godd wurrshipe winnenn, Þærþurrh hemm oferrcomm þe fend Wiþþ modi?nessess wæpenn. Þuss oferrcomm þe laþe gast Adam & Eve baþe, Þurrh gluterrnessess laþe lasst, & ec þurrh gredi?nesse, & þurrh þatt laþe modi?le??c Þatt all comm off himm sellfenn. Forr þurrh þatt þatt te?? tokenn wel Wiþþ hiss unnfæle lare, & didenn gladdli? þatt he badd Onn?æn Drihhtiness wille, Þærþurrh hemm oferrcomm þe fend & brohhte hemm unnderr sinne, Swa þatt te?? wiþþ all þe??re offspring Wiþþ himm till helle sholldenn. Nu wennde wel þe laþe gast Þatt Jesu Crist ne wære Nohht elles bútt all swillc an mann Alls Adam haffde strenedd, & tatt he wære streonedd her Þurrh faderr unnderr sinne Þatt wise þatt all mannkinn iss Inn hise walde streonedd. Acc itt nass nohht, tatt witt tu wel, Swa summ þe deofell wennde, Nass nohht te Laferrd Jesu Crist I deofless walde streonedd. Forr Godess Sune, Allmahhti? Godd, Crist toc i Sannte Mar?e, Swa summ hiss lefe wille wass, Þatt wise manness kinde Þatt he þær toc Adamess flæsh & nohht Adamess sinne. & forrþi nass nohht Jesu Crist Unnderr þe deofless walde, Forr þatt he nass nohht borenn her Unnderr Adamess sinne. & all þiss wass þe laþe gast Off Crist unncuþ ?ét tanne. Forr nisste he nohht tatt Crist wass mann All clene off alle sinness, & tohh sahh he þe Laferrd Crist Don miccle mare dede Þann ani? mann ma?? forþenn her Þurrh eorþli? kindess mahhte. He sahh Crist út i wessteland Fowwerrti? da?hess fasstenn, Swa þatt he þwerrt út nohht ne bát Off mete inn all þatt fasste, & tatt ne ma?? nan eorþli? mann Þurrh eorþli? kinde forþenn. & affterr þatt te Laferrd Crist All haffde hiss sasste forþedd, Þa wisste wel þe laþe gast Þatt Crist wass þa forrhunngredd; Acc nisste he nohht tatt Crist wass þa Forrhunngredd affterr sawless, Acc wennde þatt he wære þa Forrhunngredd affterr fode. & he warrþ all forrwunndredd ta Off Cristess dærne kinde. He sahh himm fasstenn mare inoh Þann ani? mann ma?? fasstenn, & þohhte þatt he wære Godd Þatt doþ all þatt himm þinnkeþþ. & son se hiss fasste forþedd wass He sahh himm ben forrhunngredd, & þohhte þatt he nære Godd, Acc mann i sinne strenedd. & forrþi wass þe laþe gast Orraþ off Cristess kinde, Forr þatt he sahh himm fasstenn þær Swa summ he mann ne wære, & sahh himm ben forrhunngredd tær Swa summ he Godd ne wære; & nisste nohht te laþe gast Þatt Jesu Crist wass baþe, Soþ Godd i mennisscnesse, & ec Soþ mann i Goddcunndnesse, & himm wass swiþe wa forrþi, & þohhte þatt he wollde Þa fandenn Crist wiþþ deofless crafft, To witenn whatt he wære. & Crist ta lét himm fandenn himm, Swa summ ?e littlær herrdenn, Þurrh whatt he toc to wenenn þa Þatt Crist wass Godd onn eorþe, Þurrh þatt he sahh þatt Crist wiþþstod ?æn all hiss laþe wille, Swa þatt he nohht off all hiss ræd Ne mihhte himm don to foll?henn. & tærþurrh ure Laferrd Crist All oferrcomm þe deofell, Þurrh þatt he þweorrt út all forrsoc To don ohht off hiss wille. & all allswa ma?? Cristess þeoww Wel oferrcumenn deofell, ?iff þatt he þwerrt út all forrseoþ To don ohht off hiss wille. Þe deofell comm to fandenn Crist, Swa summ ?e littlær herrdenn, To cunnenn to biswikenn himm All o þatt illke wise Þatt he biswac þa firrste twa Þatt Drihhtin shop off eorþe. Acc Jesu Crist himm oferrcomm All o þatt illke wise, Þurrh þatt he stod onn?æness himm, & all forrwarrp hiss lare. Þe deofell comm to wundenn Crist Þurrh gluterrnessess wæpenn, I þatt he wollde himm brinngenn onn To makenn bræd off staness; & þurrh þatt tatt te Laferrd Crist Wiþþstod onn?æn hiss wille, Swa þatt he nollde makenn bræd, Swa summ he badd-off staness, Þærþurrh þe Laferrd oferrcomm & oferrtradd te deofell, Rihht swa summ he þe forrme mann Ær oferrcumenn haffde. Þe deofell comm to wundenn Crist Þurrh gredi?nessess wæpenn, I þatt he wollde himm brinngenn onn To ?eornenn affterr ahhte; & þurrh þatt tatt te Laferrd Crist Wiþþstod onn?æn hiss wille, Swa þatt he nollde don hiss ræd, Ne ?eornenn affterr ahhte, Þærþurrh þe Laferrd oferrcomm & oferrtradd te deofell, Rihht swa summ he þe forrme mann Ær oferrcumenn haffde. Þe deofell comm to wundenn Crist Þurrh modi?nessess wæpenn, I þatt he badd himm shæwenn himm Hiss Goddcunndnessess mahhte, Þurrh þatt he shollde læpenn dun Wiþþutenn off þe temmple Onn idell & wiþþutenn ned, & alls he wollde le??kenn. & þurrh þatt tatt te Laferrd Crist Wiþþstod onn?æn hiss wille, Swa þatt he nollde don hiss ræd, Ne læpenn dun onn idell, Þærþurrh þe Laferrd oferrcomm & oferrtradd te deofell, Rihht swa summ he þe firrste mann Ær oferrcumenn haffde. & affterr þatt te Laferrd Crist All oferrcumenn haffde Þe laþe gast wiþþ skill, & nohht Wiþþ nan unnride strenncþe, Þe deofell wennde awe?? anan Forrshamedd off himm sellfenn, Off þatt he wass all strenncþelæs Onn?æn þatt newe kemmpe, & þohhte þatt itt wass soþ Godd Þatt cumenn wass to manne, Þatt mihhte stanndenn æþeli? ?æn himm & ?æn hiss lare. Þatt Godess enngless nærenn nohht Abutenn ure Laferrd In all þatt time þatt he wass Inn orresst ?æn þe deofell, Þatt wass, all alls hiss wille wass, Forr þatt he wollde shæwenn, Þatt himm nass rihht nan ned till hemm To fihhtenn ?æn þe deofell, Forr þatt he mihhte himm sellf inoh Wiþþutenn enngless hellpe All þwerrt út oferrcumenn himm, To brinngenn himm to grunde, & bindenn himm, & lesenn út Mannkinn off hise bandess. & tatt te?? comenn siþþenn forþ To þeowtenn Crist & lutenn, Þatt wass, all alls hiss wille wass, Forr þatt he wollde shæwenn, Þatt he wass enngleþeode Godd & enngleþeode Laferrd, Þatt haffde shapenn hemm off nohht, To brukenn eche blisse, Þatt Godd þatt all þiss weorelld shop, & all þiss weorelld stereþþ, Þatt Godd þat all follc drædenn birrþ, & lufenn himm & þeowwtenn. & Godd Allmahhti? ?ife uss swa To þeowwtenn Crist tocweme, Swa þatt we motenn wurrþi ben To winnenn eche blisse. SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXI. Altera die vidit Johannes Ihm venientem ad se, & ait, Ecce agnus Dei. Affterr þatt Jesuss fandedd wass Þurrh defell i þe wesste, Þæraffterr comm he sone anan Till Sannt Johan Bapptisste, & Sannt Johan Bapptisste sahh Þe Laferrd Crist himm neh?henn, & se??de to þe leode þuss, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ; Loc, here cumeþþ Godess Lamb, Þatt shall forr menn ben offredd; Loc, here iss he þatt clennsenn shall Þiss middellærd off sinne. Þiss iss þatt illke, off whamm I spacc ?ét niss nohht lannge siþþenn, Þær þær I se??de þatt an mann Affterr me cumenn shollde, Þatt shollde wurrþenn oferr me Wurrþfull & heh i mahhte. & icc ne cneow himm nohht ?ét ta; Acc forrþi þatt he shollde Beon awwnedd Issraæle þeod, Forrþi comm I to fullhtnenn I waterr himm onn?æn þatt ?uw Þurrh Hali? Gast shall fullhtnenn. & here I bere himm wittness nu Till all mannkinn onn eorþe, Þatt I me sellf sahh Godess Gast, Þær þær þiss mann wass fullhtnedd, Off heoffne cumenn upponn himm Inn aness cullfress like, & tatt itt upponn himm bilæf, Þatt sahh I wel to soþe. & I ne cneow nohht ?ét tiss mann Þatt da?? þatt he wass fullhtnedd; Acc he þatt haffde sennd me forþ I waterr forr to fullhtnenn, He tahhte me summ del off himm, & se??de þuss wiþþ worde; Whamm se þu seost tatt Godess Gast Inn aness cullfress heowe Off heoffne cumeþþ upponn himm & upponn himm bilefeþþ, He fullhtneþþ all þatt fullhtnedd iss, & clennsedd all off sinne. & I sahh cumenn Godess Gast Inn aness cullfress like, & I sahh uppo whamm he comm & upponn himm bilefenn, I sahh þatt illke gode Gast, & I barr to þe leode Wittness off himm, þatt he wass wiss Crist Godess Sune, off heoffne. Her endeþþ nu þiss Goddspell þuss & uss birrþ itt þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt itt tæcheþþ uss Off ure sawle nede; Þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste cneow Crist Godess Lamb i wesste, Affterr þatt ure Laferrd Crist Wass fandedd þurrh þe deofell, Þatt comm þurrh Godd, tatt witt tu wel, Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn, Þatt Cristess follc i Crisstenndom Wel cunnenn shollde & cnawenn Þatt hall?he Lamb, þatt haffde hemm bohht Út off þe deofless walde, Affterr þatt he þurrh deofell wass Wiþþ rode pine fandedd. Forr all all swa summ Sannt Johan Þa se??de to þe leode; Loc here iss he þatt clennsenn shall Þiss middellærd off sinne, All all swa se??þ nu Cristess hird Wiþþ lufe & ec wiþþ trowwþe; Uss birrþ well ?erne stanndenn inn, Whil þatt tiss lif uss lassteþþ, To þeowwtenn ure Laferrd Crist Þatt bohhte uss út off helle, Þurrh þatt he till hiss Faderr wass Offredd forr uss o rode, All alls he wære an lamb to ben Offredd Drihhtin to lake. & tatt wass mikell skill þatt Crist Wass Godess Lamb ?ehatenn; Forr Crist uss ?ifeþþ millkess drinnch Off hiss Goddspelless lare; & Crist uss ?ifeþþ wulle & claþ Off he?he & hall?he mahhtess, To shridenn uss þærwiþþ onn?æn Þe frosst off fakenn trowwþe; & Crist uss ?ifeþþ here hiss flæsh & ec hiss blod to fode, Forr uss to ?ifenn strenncþe [&] mahht To stanndenn ?æn þe deofell, All swa summ we þurrh shepess lamb Onnfanngenn þa þreo þingess. Forr shepess lamb uss ?ifeþþ millc, & flæsh & blod, & wulle, Forr þurrh þe lamb uss cumeþþ millc Út off þe lambess moder, & wulle uss ?ifeþþ lamb till claþ, & flæsh & blod till fode. Þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste sahh Þe Laferrd Crist himm nehh?henn, Þatt sihhþe tunnderrstanndenn iss O twinne kinne wise. Forr he sahh, þatt witt tu full wel, Þe Laferrd Crist himm neh?henn, Þurrh witt off hiss herrtess innsihht, & þurrh hiss bodi? sihhþe. Forrwhi wass þatt tatt Sannt Johan Amang þe leode se??de Off Crist, tatt he ne cneow himm nohht Biforr þatt he wass fullhtnedd, Ær þann þe Laferrd fullhtnedd wass Ær wass he wunedd offte To cumenn till þe flumm till himm, & Sannt Johan Bapptisste Itt wisste wel, & cneow himm wel, & se??de to þe leode; Her stannt swillc an bitwenenn ?uw Þatt ?ure nan ne cnaweþþ, Till whamm icc namm nohht god inoh Hiss shoþwang forr tunnbindenn, & he shall newenn cumenn forþ, & he shall newenn fullhtnenn, Þurrh Hali? Gast & hali? fir To clennsenn ?uw off sinness. Þiss se??de he till þe follc off Crist Biforr þatt Crist wass fullhtnedd, & herþurrh ma?? mann sen full wel Þatt he cneow Crist tatt time. Acc uss birrþ w?tenn þatt he cneow Þe Laferrd i þatt time Off summ whatt ohht, off summ whatt nohht, Biforr þatt he wass fullhtnedd. He cneow þatt tíme Crist off þatt, Þatt he wass Godd off heoffne, & mann onn eorþe o moderrhallf, Acc all wiþþutenn sinne. SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXII. Altera autem die stabat Johannes & ex discipulis ejus duo. Þæraffterr onn an oþerr da?? Symoness broþerr, Sannt Anndrew, He wass an off þa twe??enn Þatt comenn till þe Laferrd Crist Þær he bi gate ?ede. & Sannt Anndrew fand allre firrst Symon hiss a?henn broþerr, & cwaþþ till himm; we fundenn nu Messyamm, þatt bitacneþþ Soþ Crist, soþ Godess Sune Godd, Þatt cumenn iss to manne, & toc & ledde himm sone forþ Anan till ure Laferrd. & Crist warrp e?he upponn Symon, & se??de himm þiss wiþþ worde; Þu nemmnedd arrt Symon, & tu Þurrh Johanna wass strenedd; Nu shallt tu ben nemmnedd Cefás, Þatt ?uw bitacneþþ Peterr. & siþþenn o þatt oþerr da?? Þiss hát tatt wass Natanaæl Bihatenn & Filippe Wass filledd affterr þatt tatt Crist Wass risenn upp off dæþe; Forr þurrh þe Laferrd Cristess dæþ Wass heffness ?ate all oppnedd ?æn alle þa þatt lufenn Crist, & hise la?hess haldenn. & mann ma?? unnderrstanndenn þiss ?ét onn an oþerr wise, Þatt heffness sholldenn oppnedd ben Biforenn follkess sihhþe; Forr heffness her bitacnenn uss Þe Laferrd Cristess posstless, Þatt ?æfenn uss þurrh þe??re spell, & ec þurrh þe??re bisne, Soþ lihht her i þiss middellærd, To sen & tunnderrstanndenn All hu mann birrþ þatt we??e gan Þatt ledeþþ upp till heffne, All swa summ heffne uss ?ifeþþ lihht Þurrh sunne & mone & sterrness. & ec þe þosstless ?æfenn uss Þurrh lare & ec þurrh bisne Soþ rewwsinng off all ure woh, Off sakess & off sinness, To wattrenn & to dæwwenn swa Þurrh be??ske & sallte tæress Þatt herrte, þatt wiþþinnenn uss Iss hefi?li? forrclungenn Þurrh fakenn trowwþe towarrd Godd & towarrd mann onn eorþe. & forr þatt itt bidæledd iss Off all soþ lufess hæte, All iss itt uss bifrorenn swa Þurrh h?te & niþ & irre, Þatt all itt liþ uss wasstmelæs Off alle gode dedess. Þuss sinndenn Cristess posstless wel Þurrh heffness her bitacnedd, & te??re muþ þurrh Hali? Gast Wass oppnedd, uss to spellenn, Affterr þatt ure Laferrd Crist Wass sti?henn upp till heffne. & Cristess posstless sinndenn ec Þurrh Godess enngless tacnedd, & forþ wiþþ hemm ec alle þa Þatt spellenn uss off Criste. Forr whase brinngeþþ word, tatt mann Iss enngell inn hiss wikenn, & ta þatt brinngenn word off Crist, Þa sinndenn Cristess enngless, Þatt sinndenn þa þatt spellenn uss Off Crist & off hiss lare. & siþþenn þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass sti?henn upp till heffne, Nu siþþenn seþ Crisstene follc Wel offte Godess enngless Uppwarrd & dunnwarrd baþe upponn Þe manness Sune sti?henn. Þe manness Sune iss Jesu Crist Þurrh Sannte Mar?e hiss moderr, Forr mann iss were, & mann iss wis, & mann iss ma??denn nemmnedd. & enngless sinndenn alle þa Þatt spellenn uss off Criste. & ?iff þe?? spellenn uss off Crist & off hiss Goddcunndnesse, Þa sti?henn þe?? uppwarrd o Crist Upponn hiss he?he kinde. & ?iff þe?? spellenn uss off Crist & off hiss mennisscnesse, Þa sti?henn þe?? dunnwarrd o Crist Dun onn hiss la?he kinde. & miccle bettre iss þiss till uss To sen & tunnderrstanndenn Off ure Laferrd Jesu Crist, & off hiss twinne kinde, Þann þatt wass till Natanaæl Þatt ure Laferrd se??de, Þatt he sahh himm þær þær he wass Unnderr fictre forrlannge Biforenn þatt Filippe toc To clepenn himm to spæche. Forr þatt tatt Godd sahh all mannkinn Unnderr Adamess sinne, Ær þann he toc to turrnenn follc Till himm þurrh hise posstless, Þatt munnde don uss litell god, ?iff þatt he þurrh hiss are Ne come forr to lesenn uss Út off þatt illke sinne, & forr to turrnenn uss till himm Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess; All swa summ till Natanaæl Full litell ga?henn wære, Þatt Crist himm haffde se?henn þær Þær he fictre wass unnderr, ?iff þatt he nære siþþenn brohht Till Criste þurrh Filippe. & forrþi þatt Natanaæl Wass swiþe wis off lare, Ne chæs himm nohht te Laferrd Crist Till nan off hise posstless; Forr nollde he chesenn nan off þa Þatt cuþenn mikell lare. & wel he wisste himm sellf forr whatt He nollde swillke chesenn, & hise þewwess wisstenn itt, & settenn itt o boke; & forrþi ma?? icc nu till ?uw Summwhatt tæroffe shæwenn. ?iff Cristess þosstless wærenn þa Þatt cuþenn mikell lare, Ne munnde nan mann ben off hemm, Noff þe??re spell forrwunndredd, Ne nohht ne munnde þa þe follc Till þe??re lare bu?henn. & tanne wære uss ga?hennlæs Þatt Crist wass dæd o rode, & all forr nohht uss haffde Crist Útlesedd fra þe defell, ?iff þatt we nolldenn mekenn uss To foll?henn Cristess lare. & forrþi chæs þe Laferrd Crist Læwede menn to posstless, & ?aff hemm witt þurrh Hali? Gast Deplike off Godd to spellenn, & ?aff hemm mahht þurrh Hali? Gast To wirrkenn miccle tacness, Þatt mannkinn shollde þess te bett Till þe??re lare bu?henn, Till fulluhht, & till Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe, To winnenn her þurrh hali? lif To brukenn eche blisse. Whi wollde Godess Sune Crist, Soþ Godd, himm sellfenn la?henn, & niþþrenn himm to nemmnenn himm Þe manness Sune onn erþe? Forr þatt he wollde don uss swa To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt uss birrþ alle la?henn uss & niþþrenn uss onn erþe, Forr swa to winnenn uss att himm Þurrh himm to wurrþenn he?henn; & ec forr þatt he wollde uss don To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt uss birrþ a?? occ a?? onnan Hiss gode dede himm þannkenn, Off þatt he wass an usell mann Forr ure nede wurrþenn, He þatt iss alle shaffte Godd, Þatt alle shaffte wrohhte. & þurrh þatt tatt Natanaæl Till Crist wiþþ trowwþe se??de, Þatt he wass Godess Sune wiss Þatt cumenn wass to manne, Þærþurrh bigatt he þær att Crist Þurrh himm to wurrþenn borr?henn, Forrþi þatt he wass hali? mann I þohht, i word, i dede. & ?iff þatt tu þatt wise mahht Onn ure Laferrd lefenn, & lufenn himm, & cwemenn himm Wiþþ þohht, & word, & dede, Þa shallt tu ben wurrþi þurrh himm All swa to wurrþenn borr?henn. & Godd Allmahhti? ?ife uss swa To cwemenn Crist o life, Þatt heffness ?ate uss oppnedd be Att ure lifess ende. Amæn; SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXIII. Nuptie quidem facte sunt in Chana Galilee. Uppo þe þridde da?? bilammp, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Þatt i þe land off Galile Wass an bridale ?arrkedd, & itt wass ?arrkedd in an tun Þatt wass Caná ?ehatenn. & Cristess moderr Mar?e wass Att tatt bridaless sæte, & Crist wass clepedd till þatt hus Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess. & te??re win wass drunnkenn swa Þatt tær nass þa na mare; & Crisstess moderr comm till Crist & se??de himm þuss wiþþ worde; Þiss win iss drunnkenn to þe grund, & niss her nu na mare. & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Þuss se??de till hiss moderr; Whatt falleþþ þiss till me wiþþ þe, Wifmann, þiss þatt tu mælesst? Abid, abid, wifmann, abid, Ne comm nohht ?ét min time. & Sannte Mar?e ?ede anan, & se??de to þe birrless; Doþ þatt tatt he shall biddenn ?uw, Ne be ?e nohht tær?æness. Þe?? haffdenn sexe fétless þær Att tatt bridaless sæte, Þatt wærenn, summ þe Goddspell se??þ, Sexe stanene fétless, Swillke summ þatt Judisskenn follc Wass wunedd i þatt time To wasshenn offe þe??re lic, To clennsenn hemm þatt wise; & twafald oþerr þrefald mett Þa fétless alle tokenn. & Crist badd tatt te?? sholldenn gan & fillenn þe??re fétless Wiþþ waterr; & te?? ?edenn till, & didenn þatt he se??de, & filledenn upp till þe brerd Wiþþ waterr þe??re fétless. & Crist ta se??de þuss till hemm, Gaþ till wiþþ ?ure cuppess, & ladeþþ upp & bereþþ itt Till þallderrmann onn hæfedd. & te?? þa didenn þatt he badd, & bærenn þa to drinnkenn Þatt hæfedd mann þatt he?hesst wass Att tatt bridale settledd. & he toc sone & drannc þatt win Þatt wass off waterr wurrþenn, & nisste he nohht whæroffe itt wass; Acc wel þe birrless wisstenn, Þatt haffdenn rihht ta l?denn upp Þe waterr off þa fétless. & he badd clepenn þa till himm, Son summ he drunnkenn haffde, Þatt mann þatt tær bridgume wass Att tatt bridaless sæte. & son se þatt bridgume comm, Þatt allderrmann himm se??de; Illc mann firrst brinngeþþ forþ god win, & siþþenn he biginneþþ To brinngenn forþ summ werrse win, Son summ þe follc iss drunnkenn; & tu þe gode win till nu A?? hafesst hidd & haldenn. Þiss tákenn wrohhte Jesu Crist Þe firrste off hise tacness, I Galile rihht i þatt tun Þatt wass Cana ?ehatenn; & tuss he toc to shæwenn þær Hiss Goddcunndnessess mahhte, & hise Lerninngcnihhtess þær Tókenn onn himm to lefenn, Þurrh þatt te?? sæ?henn þære inn himm Allmahhti? Godess mahhte. Her endeþþ nu þiss Goddspell þuss, & uss birrþ itt þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt itt læreþþ uss Off ure sawle nede. Crist comm till þatt bridale himm sellf Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess; Acc he ne comm nohht to þatt hus, Ne nan off hise feress, Forr þatt he wollde sittenn þær, To drinnkenn þære o bennche; Acc ure Laferrd Crist comm þær To shæwenn þær hiss mahhte, Forr þatt te?? sholldenn þess te bett Hemm turrnenn till hiss lare, & trowwenn þatt he wass soþ Godd Þatt cumenn wass to manne, & turrnenn till þe Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe, To winnenn hemm þurrh hali? lif To brukenn eche blisse. & ure Laferrd Crist comm þær Forr þatt he wollde shæwenn, Þurrh þatt he wollde cumenn þær, Þatt weddlac iss himm cweme, & tatt ?e mu?henn i weddlac, ?iff þatt ?e rihht itt haldenn, Þurrh gode dedess cwemenn Godd, & addlenn eche blisse. & ure Laferrd Crist comm þær, Forr þatt he wollde shæwenn All mannkinn þurrh hiss firrste mahht Forr whatt he comm to manne. He turrnde waterr inntill win Att tatt bridaless sæte, Forr all mannkinn to shæwenn swa Forr whatt he comm onn erþe. Þe waterr tacneþþ uss mannkinn Þatt erneþþ till hiss ende, Swa summ þe waterr erneþþ forþ, ?iff þatt itt nohht ne letteþþ. & Hali? Gastess lare iss uss Þurrh winess drinnch bitacnedd; Forr rihht all swa se winess drinnch Þe wharrfeþþ all þin herrte, & all þin þohht, & all þin lusst, ?iff þatt tút lannge drinnkesst, Rihht all swa wharrfeþþ Hali? Gast Þe gode manness herrte All fra þiss werrldess lufe & lusst Þurrh swillc an drunnkennesse, Þatt all he fleþ & all forrseþ Þe werrldess gredi?nesse, & foll?heþþ a?? anwherrfeddle??c To winnenn heffness blisse. & all forrþi comm Jesu Crist To wurrþenn mann onn erþe, Forr þatt he wollde þurrh hiss spell, & þurrh hiss hall?he bisne, & þurrh þe ?ife off Hali? Gast Uss wharrfenn all fra sinne, & fra þe werrldess lufe & lusst, & fra þatt gredi?nesse Þatt doþ þe mann to wedenn rihht To winnenn erþlic ahhte, & all onn?æn hiss Crisstenndom, & all þurrh hefi? sinne. Forrþi comm Crist to wurrþenn mann, Forr þatt he wollde uss wharrfenn Fra swillc unnfæle lufe & lusst To winnenn fe wiþþ sinne, & forr to turrnenn ure lusst All towarrd heffness blisse, To ?ernenn a?? þæraffterr her To winnenn itt to brukenn. & ure Laferrd Crist comm ec Till þatt bridaless sæte, Forr þatt he wollde tacnenn swa Þatt he wass cumenn þanne Off heffne inntill þiss middellærd, All rihht alls iff he wollde Bridale settenn, forr þatt he An brid himm wollde chesenn Off all mannkinn, an hali? follc Þatt shollde hiss wille foll?henn, Þatt shollde ben himm þwerrt út lef & þwerrt út dere & cweme, All all swa summ þe gode mann Iss cweme hiss gode macche. & Cristess moderr Mar?e wass Att tatt bridaless sæte, Forr hire clene wambe wass Till þatt bridgume bure Þatt he comm offe inntill þiss lif, An brid himm forr to chesenn. & Crist comm o þe þridde da?? Till þatt bridaless sæte, Forr þatt he wollde shæwenn swa Þatt he comm her to manne Rihht i þe þridde lott off all Þiss werelld, tatt iss dæledd & brittnedd inntill daless þre, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe. Forr all biforenn Moysæn Wass all þe firrste dale; & unnderr Moysæsess æ Wass all þatt oderr dale; & unnderr Crist i Crisstenndom Iss all þe þridde dale. & all þiss þridde dale wass Þurrh þatt bridale tacnedd Þatt o þe þridde da?? wass sett, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ. & ure Laferrd Crist comm ec Till þatt bridaless sæte Þatt wass i Cana Galile, To don uss tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt all hiss a?henn hall?he brid Inn all þiss þridde time Wiþþ wallhát herrtess lufe & lusst Himm shollde lefli? þewwtenn, & ferrsenn a?? all hire lif Frawarrd te defless wille & towarrd hire Laferrd Crist, To foll?henn all hiss lare Wiþþ clene þohht, wiþþ clene word, Wiþþ clene læfe & dede. Forr ?iff þu Cana Galile Till Ennglissh spæche turrnesst, Þa tacneþþ itt hát herrtess lusst, To ferrsenn & to flittenn Fra woh till rihht, fra læs till soþ, Fra sinne till dædbote. & ure Laferrd clepedd wass Till þatt bridaless sæte, Þurrh þatt tatt f?le gode menn Affterr hiss come ?errndenn, Biforenn þatt he borenn wass Off ure laffdi? Mar?e. & tatt te Laferrd Crist comm þær Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess, Þatt dide he forr to shæwenn uss Þatt he þurrh hise posstless Her wollde settenn Crisstenndom, Alls itt bridale wære, & chesenn himm an brid þurrh hemm, An follc off alle þede, Þatt shollde himm unnderr Crisstenndom Onn alle wise cwemenn. & þurrh þatt te??re win wass gan, Swa þatt tær nass na mare, Þatt time þatt te Laferrd comm Till þatt bridaless sæte, Þærþurrh wass uss bitacnedd wel Þatt gastli? witt wass cwennkedd Off Moysæsess la?heboc, & off profetess lare, Þurrh þatt Farisewwisshe follc Þatt læredd wass o boke, Þurrh þatt te?? didenn all þe follc Flæshlike tunnderrstanndenn All þe??re la?he, & ec all þatt Profetess haffdenn cwiddedd, Forr swa to turrnenn all þe boc Till þe??re gredi?nesse, Swa þatt te?? mihhtenn spedenn wel To winnenn erþlic ahhte. & swa wass all þe gastli? witt Off Godess lare cwennkedd Þatt time þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass cumenn her to manne, Till þiss bridale off Crisstenndom Þatt he comm her to settenn, All swa summ þe??re win wass gan Att tatt bridaless sæte, Þatt tíme þatt Crist comm þærto Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess. & þurrh þatt tatt te Laferrd Crist Att tatt bridaless sæte Hemm turrnde waterr inntill win Þurrh hiss goddcunnde mahhte, Þærþurrh wass uss bitacnedd ta Þatt Crist wass cumenn þanne, To don mannkinn þatt hall?he boc Gastlike tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt ær forrlannge writenn pass Off himm & off hiss come. Forr all biforenn þatt Crist wass Her borenn uss to manne All wass he dærne, & hidd, & all Bilokenn & bilappedd Inn all þatt boc, þatt Moysæs & tatt profetess wrohhtenn. & tær wass i þe waterr win Bilokenn & bilappedd, Forrþi þatt gastli? witt wass þa Inn all þe lare cwennkedd, Þurrh þatt te boc wass turrnedd all Inntill flæshlike lare Þurrh þatt Farisewwisshe follc Þatt læredd wass o boke. & affterr þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass cumenn her to manne, He ?aff hiss follc þurrh Hali? Gast Gastlike tunnderrstanndenn Þe boc, whatt ?ate itt writenn wass Off himm & off hiss come. & swa wass waterr inntill win Þurrh Cristess come turrnedd, Þurrh þatt te bokess flæshli? witt Till gastli? witt wass wharrfedd. Þa bokess þatt te Laferrd Crist ?aff gastli? tunnderrstanndenn, Þe?? wærenn Moysæsess boc, & Sallmsang, & Profetess, Þatt wærenn a?? till Cristess da?? Swa summ þe?? waterr wærenn, Off wikke smacc þurrh flæsli? witt Unnderr stafflike lare. & þurrh þatt ure Laferrd Crist ?aff hise Lerninngcnihhtess Gastlike witt þurrh Hali? Gast I þa þre kinne bokess, Þær wass god win off waterr wrohht To Cristess Lerninngcnihhtess, Þatt shollde don hemm all forrsen Þurrh gastli? drunnkennesse All middellærdess sellþe & sel, & alle flæshess lusstess, & ?ernenn a?? occ a?? onnan To winnenn eche blisse. Gastess frofre, Forr þatt itt þurrh þe defell wass Bididdredd & forrblendedd, Swa þatt itt nohht ne cnew soþ Godd, Ne nohht off himm ne rohhte. & forr þatt Drihhtin ræw off mann Þatt swa wass þa forrblendedd, He sennde hiss a?henn Sune dun, To wurrþenn mann onn erþe, To ?ifenn mannkinn gastli? lihht & gastli? wittess leme, & gastli? laress winess drinnch & gastli? drunnkennesse, To foll?henn a?? anwherrfeddle??c To winnenn heffness blisse. Þatt ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Þær se??de till hiss moderr; Whatt falleþþ þiss till me wiþþ þe, Wifmann, þiss þatt tu mælesst? Þatt lede þatt tær satt & drannc Att tatt bridaless sæte, Biforenn þatt te Laferrd Crist Comm þær wiþþ hise feress, Þatt lede tacneþþ all þatt follc Þatt haffde off Drihhtin lare, Biforenn þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass borenn her to manne, Þatt lede þatt þurrh Moysæn & þurrh hall?he profetess Onnfengenn hali? lare inoh, ?iff þe?? itt unnderrstodenn, Acc hemm wass wannt gastlic innsihht I þe??re gode lare, All swa summ win wass wannt tatt follc Att tatt bridaless sæte. & ta þatt drunnkenn off þatt win Þatt Crist off waterr wrohhte, Þe?? tacnenn Cristess hall?he brid Þatt here iss ?ét onn erþe, Þatt drinnkeþþ gastli? wittess win Off hali? bokess lare, To foll?henn a?? andrunnkennle??c To winnenn Godess are. Þiss middellærdess ald iss all O sexe daless dæledd. Noe & hise suness þre & te??re fowwre wifess Wærenn rihhtwise & gode menn Biforenn Godess ehne, & all mannkinn wiþþutenn hemm Wass full off alle sinness, & all forrrahht ?æn Godd, & wurrþ To wurrþenn all forrdill?hedd. & Drihhtin badd Noe gan till & wirrkenn himm an arrke, Þatt he wiþþ hise suness þre & te??re fowwre wifess Þærinne mihhtenn berr?henn hemm Fra drunncninng uppo flode. & Noe dide þatt himm badd Drihhtin, & wrohhte an arrke & ?ede himm sellf þa þiderr inn, Swa summ himm Drihhtin tahhte. & hise suness alle þre & te??re fowwre wifess Þe?? alle samenn ?edenn inn Wiþþ himm inntill þatt arrke, & tokenn þiderr inn wiþþ hemm, Swa summ hemm Drihhtin tahhte, Off alle kinne cwike der Off clene & off unnclene, Þatt erþli? shaffte mihhte ben Þurrh hemm efftsone stoffnedd. & itt bigann to re??nenn þa All affterr Godess wille Fowwerrti? da?hess all onnan, Ne blann itt nohht to re??nenn; & ta wass waterr wid & sid All oferr erþe flowedd, & wude, & feld, & dale, & dun, All wass i waterr sunnkenn, & all mannkinn wass drunncnedd ta & alle cwike shaffte, Wiþþutenn þa þatt Drihhtin barrh Wiþþ Noþ i Noþess arrke, & ec wiþþutenn all þatt ma?? I waterr ben & libbenn. & ?iff þatt tu willt nimenn gom Off þiss, whillc gate itt ?ede, Hu Drihhtin barrh þa fowwre menn & te??re fowwre wifess Þatt wærenn gode & clene menn, & Drihhtin lefe & cweme, & lét forrfarenn all mannkinn Þatt all wass full off sinne & all forrgarrt ?æn Godd, & all Wel wurrþ to wurrþenn cwennkenn; & ?iff þu takesst bisne att ta Þatt wærenn Drihhtin cweme, To foll?henn Noþess hall?he sloþ Off all hiss rihhtwisnesse, & to forrwerrpenn all þe sloþ, & all þe laþe bisne Off alle þa þatt waterr swallh Forr þe??re depe sinness, Þa takesst tu, þatt witt tu wel, Út off þatt oþerr time Stafflike drinnch god till þe lif & till þe sawle baþe, Þatt mikell ma?? þe gengenn her To winnenn Cristess are, Alls iff þu drunnke waterrdrinnch Út off þatt oþerr fétless Þatt ma?? þe slekkenn wel þin þirrst, ?iff þatt iss þatt te þirrsteþþ. & ?iff þu þiss þurrh Hali?
