Off Abraham wrát Moysæs Þatt he wass Drihhtin cweme, & haffde an sune þatt himm wass Útnumennlike dere, & he wass hatenn Ysaac, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe. & i þatt time þatt itt wass ?ét swiþe ?ung onn elde Godd se??de þuss till Abraham; Tacc Ysaac þin wennchell, & sniþ itt, alls itt wære an shep, & le?? itt upponn allterr, & brenn itt all till asskess þær & offre itt me to lake. & Abraham wass forrþrihht bun To don Drihhtiness wille, & toc hiss sune sone anan & band itt fét & hande, & le??de itt upponn allterr swa, & droh hiss swerd off shæþe, & hoff þe swerd upp wiþþ hiss hannd To smitenn itt to dæde, Forr þatt he wollde ben till Godd Herrsumm onn alle wise. & Godd sahh þatt he wollde slæn Þe child wiþþ swerdess egge, & se??de þuss till Habraham, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Hald, Abraham, hald upp þin hand, Ne sla þu nohht tin wennchell; Nu wát I þatt tu drædesst Godd & lufesst Godd wiþþ herrte; Tacc þær an shep bafftenn þin bacc, & offre itt forr þe wennchell. & Abraham þa snaþ þatt shep, & lét hiss sune libbenn, Forr þatt he wollde ben till Godd Herrsumm onn alle wise. & ?iff þu nimesst mikell gom Till Abrahamess dede, & ?iff þu takesst bisne att himm, To foll?henn herrsummnesse, To wurrþenn herrsumm till Drihhtin, To þewwtenn himm tocweme, To lakenn himm wiþþ þatt tatt himm Iss lefesst off þin ahhte, To wurrþenn herrsumm to þin prest & till þin tuness laferrd, Till alle þa þatt hafenn þe To ?emenn & to sterenn, To ben herrsumm till alle þa Inn alle gode þinge, Forr niss nan herrsummnesse sett To forþenn ifell dede, ?iff þatt tu foll?hesst tuss þe sloþ Off Abrahamess bisne, Þa takesst tu, þatt witt tu wel, Út off þe þridde time Stafflike drinnch god to þin lif & to þin sawle baþe, Þatt ma?? þe mikell gengenn her To winnenn Cristess are, Alls iff þu drunnke waterrdrinnch Út off þe þridde fétless Þatt ma?? þe slekkenn wel þin þirrst, ?iff þatt iss þatt te þirrsteþþ. & ?iff þu þiss þurrh Hali? Gast Deplikerr unnderrstanndesst, Þatt Abraham onn hæfedd iss Þe Faderr upp off heffne, & tatt hiss wennchell Ysaac Iss Cristess Goddcunndnesse, & tatt hiss shep þatt offredd wass Iss Cristess mennisscnesse, Þatt offredd wass forr all mannkinn To þolenn dæþ o rode, Swa þatt hiss Goddcunndnesse wass All cwicc & all unnpinedd, All swa summ Ysaac attbrasst Unnwundedd & unnwemmedd, Þa takesst tu gastlike witt Off staffli? wite?hunnge, & drinnkesst ta þatt win þatt iss Út off þe waterr wharrfedd, Þatt win þatt turrnenn ma?? þin þohht Þurrh gastli? drunnkennesse All fra þe werrldess lufe & lusst & fra þe flæshess wille, To foll?henn a?? anwherrfeddle??c To winnenn heffness blisse. Fra Moysæn till Daviþ king Wass all þe ferþe time Off all þiss werrldess ald tatt iss O sexe daless brittnedd. & all þiss ferþe timess fresst Wass uss all swa bitacnedd I Cana Galile þurrh an Off þa stanene fétless. & all þiss ferþe time wass Þurrh hall?he witess filledd Off staffli? wite?hunngess drinnch Þurrh writess & þurrh werrkess, Rihht swa summ all þatt timess fresst Off waterr filledd wære, & itt wass turrnedd inntill win Þurrh Jesu Cristess come, Þurrh þatt hét ?aff hiss hall?he follc Gastlike tunnderrstanndenn. & her iss o þiss boc off þatt Stafflike wite?hunnge, Þatt all þatt ferþe time wass Þurrh w?tess filledd offe, Swa summ þe ferþe fetless wass Brerdfull off waterr filledd. & her I se summ del off þatt Stafflike wite?hunnge, & icc itt wile shæwenn ?uw All forr ure allre nede. Drihhtin bitahhte Moysæn An wikenn, þatt he shollde Útledenn off Egippte land Hiss follc þatt wass þærinne, Forr þatt he wollde lesenn hemm Út off pewwdomess bandess, Þatt Faraon, Egippte king, Hemm haffde worrpenn inne. & Moysæs ræw off þatt follc Þatt swa wass haldenn harrde, Forr þatt itt wass hiss a?henn kinn Þatt he wass borenn offe. & onn an nahht he toc þatt follc All samenn, alde & ?unge, & were & wif, & cherl & child, & ledde hemm út off lande, Forr þatt he wollde hemm brinngenn út Off Faraoness hæse. & Faraon wiþþ all hiss ferd Comm affterrwarrd wiþþ wraþþe, & wollde cwellenn Moysæn & alle þatt he ledde. & sæ wass þær biforenn hemm Swa þatt te?? flen ne mihhtenn; & Drihhtin þær toclæf þe sæ Alls iff itt waterr nære, & sett itt upp onn e??þerr hallf All allse twe??enn walless, & tær bitwenenn wass þe sand All harrd to ganngenn onne. & Godess follc strac inn anan Uppo þe dri??e sandess, To flen fra Faraon þe king Þatt wollde hemm alle cwellenn. & he comm neh att te??re bacc Wiþþ all hiss laþe genge, & strac inn affterr Godess follc Forr þatt he wollde hemm cwellenn. & alls he comm swa forrþerrli? Þatt all hiss follc wass inne, Þa læc þe waterr oferr hemm All affterr Godess wille, Swa þatt te king wiþþ all hiss ferd Wass drunncnedd unnderr flodess, & Godess follc all hal & sund Comm wel þurrh Godd to lande. & ?iff þu nimesst mikell gom Till Moysæsess dede, & ?iff þu nimesst bisne att himm To gengenn att te nede Whammse þu sest tatt wanntsumm iss & wiþþ wanndraþ biþrungenn, & ?iff þu takesst bisne att himm To foll?henn Godess wille, To wurrþenn herrsumm till þin Godd Inn harrd, i nesshe, & æfre, Þa takesst tu, þatt witt tu wel, Út off þe ferþe time Stafflike drinnch god till þin lif & till þin sawle baþe, Þatt mikell ma?? þe gengenn her To winnenn Cristess are, Alls iff þu drunnke waterrdrinnch Út off þe ferþe fétless, Þatt ma?? þe slekkenn wel þin þirrst ?iff þatt iss þatt te þirrsteþþ. & ?iff þu þiss þurrh Hali? Gast Deplikerr unnderrstanndesst, Þatt Moysæs iss Jesu Crist Þatt ledde þurrh himm sellfenn Mannkinn út off Egippte land, Off sinness þessterrnesse, Út off Faraoness þewwdom, Út off þe defless walde, & þurrh þe waterr off þe funnt Þær alle sinness drunncnenn Þe defless ferd, tatt tacnedd wass Þurrh Faraoness genge, Þatt wass offdrunncnedd i þe sæ Forr here depe sinness, & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Oppnede þurrh hiss come Off all þe Judewisshe boc Þe depe di?hellnesse, & dide itt hise þewwess all To sen & tunnderrstanndenn All all swa summ þe sæ wass þær Dun till þe grund toworrpenn, Swa þatt te?? o þe dri??e grund Wel sæ?henn openn we??e, Þa takesst tu gastlike witt Off staffli? wite?hunnge, & drinnkesst ta þatt win þatt iss Út off þe waterr wharrfedd, Þatt win þatt turrnenn ma?? þin þohht Þurrh gastli? drunnkennesse All fra þe werrldess lufe & lusst & fra þe flæshess wille, To foll?henn a?? anwherrfeddle??c To winnenn heffness blisse. Fra Daviþ king till Jesu Crist Wass all þe fifte time Off all þiss werrldess ald tatt iss O sexe daless dæledd. & all þiss fifte timess fresst Wass uss all swa bitacnedd I Cana Galile þurrh an Off þa stanene fetless. & all þiss fifte time wass Þurrh hall?he witess filledd Off staffli? wite?hunngess drinnch Þurrh wr?tess & þurrh werrkess, Rihht swa summ all þatt timess fresst Off waterr filledd wære, & itt wass turrnedd inntill win Þurrh Jesu Cristess come, Þurrh þatt hét ?aff hiss hall?he follc Gastlike tunnderrstanndenn. & her iss o þiss boc off þatt Stafflike wite?hunnge Þatt all þatt fifte time wass Þurrh witess filledd offe, Swa summ þatt fifte fétless wass Brerdfull off waterr filledd. & her I se summ del off þatt Stafflike wite?hunn?e, & icc itt wile shæwenn ?uw All forr ure allre nede. Saul wass hofenn upp to king Amang Judisskenn lede, & he warrþ swiþe modi? mann & ifell mann i dede. & Drihhtin Godd himm all forrwarrp Forr hise depe sinness, & toc þe kinedom off himm & off hiss sune baþe, & ?aff itt an off hise menn Þatt wass Daviþ ?ehatenn. Forr Daviþ wass full hali? mann & soffte, & mec, & milde; & he wass hofenn upp to king Off all Judisskenn þede, Forr Drihhtin he?heþþ alle þa Þatt soþ mecnesse foll?henn. & ?iff þu nimesst mikell gom Off þise twe??enn kingess, & takesst bisne att Daviþ king To foll?henn soþ mecnesse, & all forrwerrpesst Saul king & all hiss modi?nesse, Þa takesst tu, þatt witt tu wel, Út off þe fifte time Stafflike drinnch, god to þin lif & to þin sawle baþe, Þatt mikell ma?? þe gengen her To winnenn Cristess are, Alls iff þu drunnke waterrdrinnch Út off þe fifte fétless, Þatt ma?? þe slekkenn wel þin þirrst, ?iff þatt iss þatt te þirrsteþþ. & ?iff þu þiss þurrh Hali? Gast Deplikerr unnderrstanndesst, Þatt Satanas þe laþe gast Iss þurrh Saul bitacnedd, Patt worrpenn wass off heffness ærd Dun inntill hellepine, Forr þatt he wollde ben wiþþ Godd Effninng þurrh modi?nesse, & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Iss þurrh Daviþ bitacnedd, Þatt ?aff þe bisne himm sellfenn off Unnse??enndli? mecnesse, Þurrh þatt tatt he warrþ mann forr þe, To þolenn dæþ o rode, He-þatt wass king off heffness ærd & king off erþe riche, Off all þe werelld King & Godd Þatt alle shaffte wrohhte, & tatt te defell all forrlæs Hiss kinedom onn erþe Þær ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Wass hofenn upp o rode, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe defless walde, & tatt te Laferrd Jesu Crist Toc kinedom onn erþe Þær þær he chæs off all mannkinn An follc þatt shollde himm foll?henn, Þatt shollde ben hiss kinedom To foll?henn all hiss wille, Þa takesst tu gastlike witt Off staffli? wite?hunnge, & drinnkesst ta þatt win þatt iss Út off þe waterr wharrfedd, Þatt win þatt turrnenn ma?? þi þohht Þurrh gastli? drunnkennesse All fra þe werlldess lufe & lusst & fra þe flæshess wille, To foll?henn a?? anwherrfeddle??c To winnenn heffness blisse. Fra Jesu Crist till Domess da?? Iss all þe sexte time Off all þiss werrldess ald tatt iss O sexe daless brittnedd. & all þiss sexte timess fresst Wass uss all swa bitacnedd I Cana Galile þurrh an Off þa stanene fétless. & all þiss sexte time wass All swa þurrh witess filledd Off staffli? wite?hunngess drinnch Þurrh writess & þurrh werrkess, Rihht swa summ all þatt timess fresst Off waterr filledd wære, & itt wass turrnedd inntill win Þurrh Jesu Cristess come, Þurrh þatt hét ?aff hiss hall?he follc Gastlike tunnderrstanndenn. & her iss o þiss boc off þatt Stafflike wite?hunnge Þatt all þatt sexte time wass Þurrh w?tess filledd offe, Swa summ þatt sexte fétless wass Brerdfull off waterr filledd. & her I se summ del off þatt Stafflike wite?hunnge, & icc itt wile shæwenn ?uw All forr ure allre nede. Þe Laferrd Jesu Crist tatt wass All clene off alle sinness, He toc upponn hiss hall?he flæsh, Forr uss to ?ifenn bisne, Þatt clennsinng þatt Godd haffde sett Onn?æn Adamess sinne; Forr he lét hise kinness menn Hiss shapp himm ummbeclippenn, Rihht o þatt da?? þatt he wass her Off ehhte da?hess elde, Alls iff he wære an sinnfull mann Þatt wære himm ned to clennsenn. & ?iff þu takesst mikell gom To foll?henn Cristess bisne, To foll?henn & to fillenn her Gladdli? wiþþ all þin mahhte All þatt tatt Drihhtin hafeþþ sett Cristene mann to foll?henn, Þa takesst tu, þatt witt tu wel, Út off þe sexte time Stafflike drinnch god to þin lif & to þin sawle baþe, Þatt ma?? þe mikell gengenn her To winnenn Cristess are, Alls iff þu drunnke waterrdrinnch Út off þe sexte fétless, Þatt ma?? þe slekkenn wel þin þirrst, ?iff þatt iss þatt te þirrsteþþ. & ?iff þu þiss þurrh Hali? Gast Deplikerr unnderrstanndesst, Þatt Cristess hird o Domess da?? Shall ummbeshorenn wurrþenn Þurrh Cristess are & þurrh ærist Swa þwerrt [út] wel wiþþ alle, & clennsedd all þwerrt út swa wel Off iwhillc unnclænnesse, Þatt næfre ma ne shall itt ben O nane wise filedd Fra þeþennforþ, fra Domess da??, Fra þatt itt wurrþeþþ clennsedd & ummbeshorenn þurrh Drihhtin I bodi? & i sawle, Uppo þe lattste da?? þatt uss Þehhtennde da?? bitacneþþ, Forr all þiss middellærdess ald Bi seffne da?hess erneþþ, Þehhtennde da?? iss Domess da?? Þa Cristess hird shall wurrþenn Þurrh Cristess are & þurrh ærist Off alle sinness clennsedd, ?iff þatt tu þurrh gastlike witt Sest tiss & unnderrstanndesst, Þa takesst tu gastlike witt Off staffli? wite?hunnge, & drinnkesst ta þatt win þatt iss Út off þe waterr wharrfedd, Þatt win þatt turrnenn ma?? þi þohht Þurrh gastli? drunnkennesse All fra þe werrldess lufe & lusst & fra þe flæshess wille, To foll?henn a?? anwherrfeddle??c To winnenn heffness blisse. Þa fétless wærenn alle off stan Forr þatt te?? sholldenn tacnenn, Þatt illc an time filledd wass Off hali? wite?hunnge Off ure Laferrd Jesu Crist & off hiss hall?he come. Forr Jesu Crist iss wiss þurrh stan O fele bokess tacnedd, Forr Crist iss strang, & stedefasst, & findi?, & unnsakenn, Till alle þa þatt lufenn himm & hise la?hess haldenn. Þa fétless tokenn, se??þ Goddspell, Twinne mett, oþerr þrinne, Forr þatt te?? sholldenn tacnenn uss Þærþurrh-þatt illc an time Off hali? wite?hunnge wass All filledd þurrh profetess, Þatt off þe Faderr heffness king & off hiss Sune spækenn, & tokenn þærwiþþ twinne mett I þe??re wite?hunnge. & e??whær þær þe?? writenn uss I þe??re w?te?hunnge Ohht off þe Faderr heffness king, & off hiss Sune baþe, & off þatt Hall?he Frofre Gast Þatt cumeþþ off hemm be??enn, Þær tokenn þe?? wiþþ þrinne mett I þe??re wite?hunnge. & e??whær þær þe?? spækenn ohht Off þatt te Laferrd shollde Himm chesenn an Crisstene follc Off twinne kinne þede, Þatt iss off Judewisshe þed & off hæþene lede, Þær tokenn þe?? wiþþ twinne mett I þe??re wite?hunnge. & e??whær þær þe?? spækenn ohht Off þatt te Laferrd shollde Forrwerrpenn all Judisskenn follc Full neh forr þe??re sinne, & takenn wiþþ hæþene led Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess, Wiþþ þatt hæþene þed tatt wass All strenedd her to manne Þurrh Sæm, & Kam, & þurrh Jafæþ, Þatt Noþess suness wærenn, Þær tokenn þe?? wiþþ þrinne mett I þe??re wite?hunnge. Þa sexe fetless, alls uss se??þ Þe Goddspellwrihhte, wærenn Swillke summ þatt Judisskenn follc Wass wunedd i þatt time To wasshenn offe þe??re lic, To clennsenn hemm þatt wise. Boc se??þ þatt tatt Judisskenn follc Wass wunedd i þatt time To wasshenn offte þe??re lic Wiþþ waterr all wiþþutenn, To clennsenn þe??re bodi? swa Off all þe bodi? sinne. Acc þatt wass all, þatt witt tu wel, Unnnitt & idell dede, Forr þohh þe?? wesshenn þe??re lic Wiþþ waterr all wiþþutenn, Ne mihhtenn þe?? nohht clennsenn swa Þe flæsh off hire sinne. Forr whase wile clennsenn ohht Hiss flæsh off ani? sinne, Himm birrþ himm clennsenn [witt tu wel] Wiþþ shriffte & wiþþ dædbote, & innwarrdli? biwepenn itt Off þatt itt ohht wass filedd, & blinnenn itt fra þeþennforþ To filenn hise þannkess. & witt tu wel þatt nollde nohht Þe Goddspellwrihhte mælenn, Off þatt te Judewisshe follc Hemm wesshenn swa wiþþutenn Off swillke fétless, ?iff þatt he Ne wisste whatt itt shollde Bitacnenn e??þerr hemm & uss To sen & tunnderrstanndenn. Itt tacneþþ till Judisskenn follc, Þatt all þatt wite?hunnge Þatt hall?he witess wr?tenn hemm Inn alle þe??re timess Wass hemm bitahht þurrh Godd, forr hemm To clennsenn & to bæwenn Off all þatt te?? missdidenn þa Wiþþ bodi? & wiþþ sawle. & uss itt tacneþþ, þatt uss ma?? Full wel inn ure time All Godess lare off e??þerr boc, Off þalde & off þe newe, Clennsenn off all þatt ifell iss, ?iff þatt wét wilenn foll?henn, & innwarrdlike & illke da?? Annd?ætenn ure sinness, & lofenn Godd, & wurrþenn Godd, & lufenn Godd & þewwtenn. Forr baþe tacneþþ uss Judew Þatt word onn Ennglissh spæche, Þatt uss birrþ lofenn Godd, & rihht Annd?ætenn ure sinness. Crist badd ta birrless ganngenn till, & fillenn here fétless Off waterr, forr he wollde uss don To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt all þatt wite?hunnge wass Þurrh himm onn erþe cwiddedd Þatt witess haffdenn writenn ær Off himm & off hiss come. & nollde nohht te Laferrd Crist Att tatt bridaless sæte Hemm wirrkenn win inoh off nohht, Þatt wære himm lihht to forþenn, Acc wollde off waterr wirrkenn win, Forr þatt he wollde tacnenn, Þatt he ne wass nohht wurrþenn mann Bitwenenn menn onn erþe Forr to forrwerrpenn ani? lott Off Moysæsess lare, Noff all þatt wite?hunngeboc Þatt witess haffdenn cwiddedd, Acc forrþi þatt he wollde itt all Don hise Lerninngcnihhtess Þurrh Hali? Gastess hall?he witt Gastlike tunnderrstanndenn, & siþþenn all to fillenn itt Gastlike þurrh hiss hellpe. & tatt fulluhht, þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste ?aff þe lede I waterr ane, ma?? full wel Ben þurrh þatt waterr tacnedd, Þatt warrþ i Cana Galile Till win þurrh Cristess mahhte, Forr þatt fulluhht wass turrnedd all Þurrh Jesu Cristess come All fra þe waterr inntill win, Inntill þrowwinnge & pine Þatt wel ma?? tacnedd ben þurrh win, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Forr pine iss sur & biteþþ wiþþ & cwennkeþþ erþli? kinde, ?iff þatt te pine iss lang & strang, & swillc iss winess kinde, ?iff þatt iss þatt mann drinnkeþþ itt Att oferrdon, itt cwennkeþþ. All þuss wass Johaness fulluhht Wel þurrh þatt waterr tacnedd Þatt warrþ i Cana Galile Till win þurrh Cristess mahhte. Forr þatt birrþ foll?henn sone anan, Son summ þe mann iss fullhtnedd, Þatt he be bun forrþrihht anan To þolenn dæþess pine, All forr þe lufe off Jesu Crist & forr þe rihhte læfe. & all forrþi wass dæþess drinnch Allræresst brohht & birrledd Till þatt Johan off alle þa Þatt turrndenn hemm till Criste, Till fulluhht & till Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe. & tatt bridaless hus wass all Wiþþ þrinne bennkess bennkedd; Forr þær wass an bennkinnge lah & itt wass ferr fra wa?he, & oþerr wass abufenn þatt & summ del ner þe wa?he, & þridde wass abufenn þatt & itt wass bi þe wa?he. & þurrh þa þre bennkinngess iss All Cristess hird bitacnedd, Þatt iss i Crisstenndom alls itt Inn an bridale wære. & itt iss dæledd all o þre, O þrinne kinne lede, & niss nan off þa þrinne þed Wiþþ oþerr efennmete, Forr an iss heh, & oþerr lah, & þridde iss allre la?hesst. Þe maste lott tatt he?hesst iss Iss þatt lærede genge, Þatt iss ?uw sett abusenn ?uw To ?emenn & to lærenn, To spellenn ?uw off Crisstenndom, To shrifenn ?uw & huslenn, To birr?enn ?uw i kirrkegærd, To biddenn forr þe sawle. Þiss lott off all Crisstene follc Iss he?hesst unnderr Criste, Forr itt iss sett her att te ster To sterenn baþe þoþre. Þatt oþerr lott iss all þatt follc Þatt lifeþþ i clænnesse, I ma??þhad & i widdwesshad I minnstress & i tuness. Þiss lott iss heh biforenn Godd, Forr þatt itt here onn erþe Stannt inn to foll?henn enngleþed Þurrh soþ clænnessess bisne. Þatt forrme, þatt iss att te ster To ?emenn baþe þoþre, Þatt lott iss he?hesst, forr þatt itt Her foll?heþþ soþ clænnesse, & iss þær tekenn att te ster To ?emenn baþe þoþre. Amæn; SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXIIII. Prope erat Pasca Judeorum & ascendit Ihc Jerosolimam & invenit in templo vendentes oves & boves & columbas. Affterr þatt tatt te Laferrd Crist Þe waterr haffde wharrfedd Till win i Cana Galile Þurrh hiss goddcunnde mahhte, Þæraffterr, alls uss se??þ Goddspell, Fór he wiþþ hise posstless Inntill an oþerr tun þatt wass Cafarrnaum ?ehatenn. & Sannte Mar?e hiss moderr comm Wiþþ himm inntill þatt chesstre, & hise breþre comenn ec Wiþþ himm & wiþþ hiss moderr. & tær bilæf þe Laferrd ta Wiþþ hemm acc nawihht lannge, Forr þatt Judisskenn Passkeda?? Þa shollde cumenn newenn. & Crist fór þa till ?errsalæm, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, & he fand i þe temmple þær Well fele menn þatt saldenn Þærinne baþe nowwt & shep, & ta þatt saldenn cullfress; & menn att bordess sætenn þær Wiþþ sillferr forr to lenenn. & Crist himm wrohhte an swepe þær All alls itt wære off wiþþess, & draf hemm alle samenn út, & nowwt & sowwþess alle; & all he warrp út i þe flor Þe bordess & te sillferr. & affterr þatt he se??de þuss Till þa þatt saldenn cullfress; Gaþ till, & bereþþ heþenn út Whattlike þise þingess; Ne birrþ ?uw nohht mi Faderr hus Till chepinngboþe turrnenn. & hise Lerninngcnihhtess þær Þohhtenn & unnderrstodenn, Þatt tær wass filledd þa þurrh himm & inn hiss hall?he dede Þatt, tatt te Sallmewrihhte se??þ Upponn hiss hall?he sallme; Hát lufe towarrd Godess hus Me biteþþ i min herrte. & sume off þa Judisskenn menn, Þatt herrdenn whatt he se??de & sæ?henn whatt he dide þær, Himm ?æfenn sware, & se??denn; Whatt tákenn shæwesst tu till uss Þatt dost tuss þise dedess? & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Hemm ?aff anndswere, & se??de; Unnbindeþþ all þiss temmple, & icc Itt i þre da?hess re??se. & ta Juþewess ?æfenn himm Anndswere onn?æn, & se??denn; Fowwerrti? winnterr ?edenn forþ & ?ét tær tekenn sexe, Ær þann þiss temmple mihhte ben Fullwrohht & all fullforþedd, & tu darrst ?ellpenn þatt tu mihht Itt i þre da?hess re??senn? & Jesu Crist ne se??de nohht Þatt word off þe??re temmple, Acc off hiss bodi? temmple he spacc, & te?? itt nohht ne wisstenn. & affterr þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass risenn upp off dæþe, Þe posstless þohhtenn off þiss word, & ta þe?? unnderrstodenn, Þatt te??re Laferrd haffde se??d Þatt word all off himm sellfenn, Off þatt he wollde þolenn dæþ Forr all mannkinne nede, & tatt he wollde risenn upp Þe þridde da?? off dæþe. & Crist wass o þe Passkeda?? I ?errsalæmess chesstre, & wrohhte þær biforr þe follc Well f?le miccle tacness. & f?le off þa þatt sæ?henn þær Þa tacness þatt he wrohhte Bigunnenn sone anan onn himm To lefenn & to trowwenn. Acc Jesu Crist ne lét himm nohht Þohhwheþþre i þe??re walde, Forr þatt he cnew hemm alle wel & alle þe??re þohhtess, & forr þatt himm nass rihht nan ned Þatt ani? mann himm shollde Ohht shæwenn off all þatt, tatt wass All dærne i manness herrte; Forr all þatt wass inn iwhillc mann He sahh, & cnew, & cuþe. Her endeþþ nu þiss Goddspell þuss & uss birrþ itt þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt itt læreþþ uss Off ure sawle nede. Þatt Jesu Crist stah dun inntill Cafarrnaumess chesstre, & út off Cana Galile Wiþþ moderr & wiþþ breþre, & ec wiþþ posstless, þatt wass don Forr mikell þing to tacnenn. Itt tacneþþ, alls uss se??þ soþ boc, & wel itt birrþ uss trowwenn, Þatt Godess Sune off heffne stah Þurrh wunnderrli? mecnesse, & þurrh hát herrtess lufe & lusst Þatt he till mannkinn haffde, To flittenn menn till heffness ærd Út off þe defless walde. Forr ?iff þu Cana Galile Till Ennglissh spæche turrnesst, Þa tacneþþ itt hát herrtess lusst To ferrsenn & to flittenn. & þurrh hát herrtess lufe & lusst Wass Godess Sune flittedd Inntill þiss middellærdess burrh, To wurrþenn mann onn erþe. & he comm till Cafarrnaum Whanne he comm dun till erþe, Forr affterr þatt soþ boc uss se??þ Cafarrnaum bitacneþþ Golike tun, & scone tun & fa??err to bihaldenn, & swillc iss all þiss middellærd Golike, & scone, & fa??err Till alle þa þatt lufenn itt; Forr hemm itt þinnkeþþ scone, Forrþi þatt te?? ne þennkenn nohht Off heffness ærdess blisse, & forrþi þinnkeþþ hemm full god & luffsumm her to libbenn, To foll?henn þe??re flæshess lusst I mani? kinne sinne. & Crist comm till Cafarrnaum Wiþþ moderr & wiþþ breþre, & ec wiþþ Lerninngcnihhteflocc; & tatt wass forr to tacnenn, Þatt he wass cumenn hiderr dun To takenn here onn erþe Moderr, & oþre kinness menn Upponn hiss moderr hallfe, & posstless forr to foll?henn himm, & oþre Lerninngcnihhtess. Þe Goddspellwrihhte Sannt Johan Her nemmneþþ Cristess breþre Þatt lott off menn, þatt wass himm sibb I mennisscnessess kinde, Þatt wass till Crist ?ét ner bitahht Þan hise posstless wærenn; Forr þatt te?? wærenn off hiss kinn & tærþurrh nerre breþre. & tohh swa þehh þe Laferrd Crist, Þurrh sellcuþ æddmodnesse, Inn oþre stokess nemmneþþ wel Þa posstless hise breþre, Þatt nohht ne wærenn off hiss kinn I mennisscnessess kinde. & he þe??m nemmneþþ swa þurrh hiss Unnse??enndli? godnesse; Forr þatt he þe??m i Crisstenndom To breþre chosenn haffde. & alle þa þatt foll?henn rihht Þe Crisstenndom onn erþe, Þurrh clene þohht, þurrh clene word, Þurrh clene læfe & dede, Þe?? alle samenn, se??þ soþ boc, Weppmenn & wifmenn baþe Sinndenn till ure Laferrd Crist Full dere breþre & susstress, Forr þatt te?? hafenn forþ wiþþ himm An Faderr upp inn heffne, Þurrh þatt he chæs hemm i þiss lif To wurrþenn hise chilldre, Þurrh fulluhht, & þurrh Crisstenndom, & þurrh þe rihhte læfe, ?iff þatt te?? æfre stanndenn inn To foll?henn all hiss wille. Acc Crist iss Godess Sune, all an Wiþþ Godd i Goddcunndnesse, & wiþþ hiss Faderr efennheh & efennmete i mahhte, & all an kinde Allmahhti? Godd, Þatt alle shaffte wrohhte. & swa ne ma?? nan oþerr ben, Ne Jesu Cristess broþerr, Ne Godess Sune all an wiþþ Godd I Goddcunndnessess kinde; Acc þa þatt ?erne stanndenn inn To foll?henn Godess wille, Þe?? sinndenn till þe Laferrd Crist Full dere breþre & susstress, & Godess chilldre i þatt tatt te?? Wel foll?henn Godess wille. Forr þa þatt foll?henn Cristess sloþ Þe?? sinndenn Godess chilldre, & ta þatt foll?henn defless raþ Þe?? sinndenn defless chilldre. Þatt Crist fór inntill ?errsalæm Þe Passkeda?? to frellsenn, Þatt dide he þa la fuliwis Forr uss to ?ifenn bisne, Þatt uss birrþ alle stanndenn inn To frellsenn & to wurrþenn Þa messeda??ess, þatt te prest Uss bédeþþ wel to frellsenn. & ec he fór till ?errsalæm, Forr þatt he full wel wisste Þatt tær wass sammnedd mikell follc Þatt he?he da?? to frellsenn, & forrþi þatt he wollde þær Hiss Goddcunndnesse shæwenn, Þurrh þatt he wollde wirrkenn þær Summ hefennlike takenn Biforenn all þatt miccle follc Þatt tær wass þanne sammnedd, To turrnenn hemm till Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe. & Crist fór ec till ?errsalæm To don uss tunnderrstanndenn Þatt uss iss swiþe mikell god To swinnkenn ferr till hall?henn, ?iff þatt we don itt all þwerrt út Forr lufe off Godess hall?henn, & forr to swennchenn ure lif To betenn ure sinness, & ?iff we ledenn hali? lif & clene inn all þatt we??e, & siþþenn a?? fra þeþennforþ All þess te bettre uss ?emenn Fra werelldshipess oferrgarrt, & fra þe depe sinness. Twa s?þe fór þe Laferrd Crist Till ?errsalæmess chesstre Onn?æn þe Passkemesseda?? To shæwenn hise tacness, Ann siþe uppo þe firrste ?er Þatt he bigann to spellenn, & efft upponn hiss lattste ?er Whanne he comm þær to tune, To þolenn dæþ o rodetre Forr all mannkinne nede & út off Godess temmple he draf Chappmenn att e??þerr time. Menn saldenn þære nowwt & shep & cullfress i þe temmple, & illkess kinness oþerr þing Þatt menn þær sholldenn offrenn; & tatt wass þurrh þe prestess don Þurrh þe??re gredi?nesse, Forr þatt menn sholldenn cumenn forþ & offrenn þess te mare, Þurrh þatt menn sholldenn findenn itt All rædi? þær to biggenn. & menn wiþþ sillferr sætenn þær To lenenn itt te lede, Þatt sillferr wære rædi? þær Till þa þatt wolldenn offrenn, & ec till þa þatt wolldenn ohht Biggenn till þe??re lakess; & þurrh þe prestess wære þe?? Sette to lenenn sillferr. Þatt Crist himm wrohhte an swepe þær All alls itt wære off wiþþess, & draf hemm alle samenn út & nowwt & sowwþess alle, & tatt he warrp út i þe flor Þe bordess & te sillferr, Þatt dide he forr to don hemm swa To sen & tunnderrstanndenn Whatt læn þe?? sholldenn unnderrfon Att Godd forr swillke dedess. Þe Laferrd wrohhte an swepe þær All alls itt wære off wiþþess, To tacnenn þatt hemm ?arrkedd wass Stranng pine i defless wiþþess, Forr þatt te?? turrndenn Godess hus Inntill huccsteress boþe. Draf menn & menness ahhte Út off þatt temmple þatt wass wrohht Off trewwess & off staness, Inoh he wraþþeþþ himm wiþþ menn, ?iff þatt he depe sinness & all þatt ifell iss & woh Findeþþ i menness herrtess, Þatt sholldenn ben hiss a?henn hus To resstenn himm þærinne. Crisstene follc iss Cristess hus & Cristess hall?he temmple, & ?iff þatt iss þatt Cristess follc Hemm flitteþþ frawarrd sinness, & towarrd alle gode þæw & alle gode dedess, Þa frellsenn þe??, þatt witt tu wel, Gastlike Passkemesse, Forr Passke,—?iff þu turrnenn willt Þatt word till Ennglissh spæche, Þa tacneþþ itt tatt uss birrþ a?? Þa shep þatt Jesu Crist draf út Off Godess hall?he temmple Tacnedenn uss þatt follc þatt her Unnshaþinesse foll?heþþ, & ledeþþ her full hali? lif Affterr þatt tatt menn wenenn; Acc itt niss nohht biforenn Godd Licwurrþi? lif, ne cweme. Gast comm uppo Crist Inn aness cullfress hewe, Þær he wass fullhtnedd att te flumm Þurrh Sannt Johan Bapptisste; & forrþi ma?? wel Hali? Gast Þurrh cullfre ben bitacnedd, Forr Hali? Gast comm uppo Crist Inn aness cullfress like, & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Draf út off Godess temmple Þa menn þatt saldenn cullfress þær, & ec þa þatt hemm bohhtenn. & all swa doþ he ?ét to da??, All þwerrt út he forrwerrpeþþ Þa menn þatt sellenn Hali? Gast forr fe & biggeþþ hellepine. & wha sitt iss þatt ?ifeþþ her Forr hadinng ani? mede, He biggeþþ Hali? Gast wiþþ fe, & biggeþþ hellepine. & swillke drifeþþ Jesu Crist Út off hiss hall?he temmple, Þatt iss,—út off þatt hall?he flocc Þatt hise la?hess haldeþþ, Forr þatt te?? Hali? Gastess mahht Effnenn wiþþ erþlic ahhte, Þatt mahhte þatt te Laferrd Crist ?aff hise Lerninngcnihhtess, & all forrbæd itt all mannkinn To biggenn & to sellenn. Þiss illke mahht off Hali? Her foll?heþþ gredi?nesse, Þatt all iss turrnedd to þatt an, To winnenn affterr ahhte Onn alle wise þatt he ma??, & bliþeli? wiþþ sinne, & all forrlæteþþ Godd tærþurrh & all hiss wrecche sawle. & swillke drifeþþ Jesu Crist Út off hiss hall?he temmple, Þatt iss, út off þatt hall?he flocc Þatt hise la?hess haldeþþ; Forrþi þatt gredi?nesse iss an Full hefi? hæfedd sinne, & Crist forrwerrpeþþ alle þa Þatt gredi?nesse foll?henn, Swa þatt hemm þinnkeþþ lef & god To winnenn fe wiþþ sinne. & Crist hemm drifeþþ off hiss hird, Þurrh þatt tatt te??re sinness Hemm shædenn all fra Cristess hird, & dra?henn hemm till helle, Bút iff þe?? mu?henn turrnenn hemm To betenn þe??re gilltess. Þurrh þatt he warrp út i þe flor Þe sillferr & te bordess, Þærþurrh wass uss bitacnedd wel & don wel tunnderrstanndenn Þatt, ?iff þe mann iss Drihhtin laþ Forr hise depe sinness, Drihhtin forrwerrpeþþ ec hiss fe & hise lakess alle. & tiss wass don uss well to sen Þurrh Peterr, Cristess posstell, Þatt se??de till an defless þeww Symon Dri?mann ?ehatenn, Forr þatt he þurrh þe laþe gast Drí?crafftess haffde lernedd, & wollde biggenn wiþþ hiss fe Att Peterr, Crisstess posstell, God witt & mahht to spekenn wel Wiþþ alle þede spæchess, & se??de till þe posstell þuss Þurrh currsedd gredi?nesse; Sell me, Peterr, forr erþli? fe Off Hali? Gast swillc mahhte, Þurrh whatt icc mu?he spekenn wel Wiþþ alle þede spæchess, & I þe ?ife forr þiss mahht Fe mikell & unnlitell. & Sannte Peterr ?aff himm þuss Anndswere onn?æn & se??de; Þin ahhte be þe laþe gast Bitahht forþ wiþþ þe sellfenn. Loc her, forrþi þatt he wass Godd Anndsæte & all unncweme, Forrþi forrwarrp þe posstell all Hiss fe forþ wiþþ himm sellfenn, & all bitahhte itt forþ wiþþ himm Inntill þe defless walde. & forrþi warrp Crist i þe flor Þe sillferr & te bordess Off þa chappmenn, þatt he forrwarrp Forr þe??re depe sinness. & mann ma?? unnderrstanndenn þiss ?ét onn an oþerr wise, Þatt Crist warrp all út i þe flor Þe sillferr & te bordess; Forr þatt wass don þurrh Jesu Crist To don uss tunnderrstanndenn, Patt erþli? þing o Domess da?? Beþ all þwerrt út forrworrpenn Þatt time, þatt all erþli? lif Beþ cumenn all till ende. & þurrh þatt tatt he se??de þuss Till þa þatt saldenn cullfress; Gaþ till, & bereþþ heþenn út Whattlike þise þingess, Ne birrþ ?uw nohht mi Faderr hus Till chepinngboþe turrnenn, Þærþurrh he dide uss opennli? Acc uss birrþ witenn witerrli? & sikerrlike trowwenn, Þatt Cristess Goddcunndnessess lem Shan upponn all þatt lede Off hiss onndlétt, þurrh whatt te?? himm Ne durrstenn nohht wiþþstanndenn. & tatt wass, þatt witt tu full wel, An off þa miccle tacness Þatt Godess Sune Jesu Crist I mennisscnesse wrohhte, Þatt he swa swiþe mikell follc Draf all út off þe temmple, All att hiss wille wiþþ an wand, Alls itt summ wunnderr wære; & tatt swa mikell follc himm flæh Forr þatt he toc an ?errde, Swa þatt te?? alle þrenngdenn út Off all þatt miccle temmple, All alls itt wære all oferr hemm O lo?he & all tofelle. Þatt forrme temmple, þatt wass wrohht O Salomoness time, Þatt temmple wass i sexe ?er All timmbredd & fullforþedd, & tatt wass all þurrh hæþenn follc Toworrpenn & toske??redd; & siþþenn wass itt timmbredd efft Acc nohht i swa shorrt while, Forr hefi? & forr sware unngriþþ Þatt hæþenn follc þær wrohhte. & swa þe?? stodenn oþerr stund To wirrkenn o þe temmple, Þatt dra?henn swerd wass inn an hannd, & lim & stan inn oþerr. & forrþi wass þær lannge to Ær þann itt wass all forþedd, Forr itt wass all till ende brohht Unnæþe & all wiþþ ange, Wiþþinnenn ?eress fowwerrti? & ?ét wiþþinnenn sexe. & tale off sexe & fowwerrti? Bilimmpeþþ wel wiþþ alle Till Cristess hall?he bodi?lich, Swa summ soþ boc uss kiþeþþ. Forr, swa summ Latin boc uss se??þ, Þe child i moderr wambe Iss shapenn all att fowwerrti? & sexe da?hess ende; & i þatt fresst wass Cristess lich I Sannte Mar?e wambe Fullike shapenn all þwerrt út Inn hise limess alle. & Cristess bodi? wass forrþi Þurrh Godess hus bitacnedd, Forr Cristess lich wass hali? hus Till Cristess hall?he sawle, Þatt lich þatt þwerrt út shapenn wass Inn hise limess alle, I moderr wambe att fowwerrti? & sexe da?hess ende; All swa summ Godess temmple wass All timmbredd & fullforþedd Wiþþinnenn ?eress fowwerrti? & ?ét wiþþinnenn sexe. & forr þatt Cristess bodi? comm Þurrh Sannte Mar?e hiss moderr Off Adam, acc all þwerrt út fre Off all Adamess sinne, Forrþi wass Cristess bodi? ec Þurrh Godess temmple tacnedd Þatt wass i sexe ?eress all & fowwerrti? fulltimmbredd; All all swa summ þu findenn mahht, ?iff þatt tu willt itt sekenn, Þe tale off sexe & fowwerrti? Þurrh Adam all bitacnedd. Nu, Laferrdinngess, þiss iss se??d, & tiss iss tunnderrstanndenn, Alls iff þe Laferrd se??de þuss Till hemm þær att te temmple; Mi bodi? ma?? ben rihht full wel Þurrh ?ure temmple tacnedd, Forr ?ure temmple timmbredd wass, & all fullbrohht till ende, Wiþþinnenn ?eress fowwerrti? & ?ét wiþþinnenn sexe. & tale off sexe & fowwerrti? Iss þurrh Adam bitacnedd, Off whamm I toc mi bodi?lich Acc all wiþþutenn sinne. Nu wile I, breþre, shæwenn ?uw Hu mann birrþ unnderrstanndenn Þe tale off sexe & fowwerrti? Þurrh Adam all bitacnedd. Adamess name Adam iss all Wiþþ fowwre stafess spelldredd. Þe firrste staff bitacneþþ an, Þatt oþerr tacneþþ fowwre, Þe þridde staff bitacneþþ an, & fowwerrti? þe ferþe. & ?iff þu takesst twi??ess an & ekesst itt till fowwre, Þu finndesst, butt a wunnderr be, Þe fulle tale off sexe; & tacc þu fra þe ferþe staff Þe fowwerrti? togeddre, & tacc þu þe þe fowwerrti?, & sett hemm bi þe sexe, & tacc þe sexe & fowwerrti?, Off fowwre stafess sammnedd, & þurrh þa fowwre stafess iss Adamess name spelldredd. & tacc þe sexe & fowwerrti? All þuss þurrh Adam tacnedd, & tacc þe Crist, & tacc Adam All an i bodi? kinde, & tacc hemm baþe samenn forþ, & sett hemm bi þe temmple Þurrh tale off sexe & fowwerrti? Þatt falleþþ till hemm alle. Forr Jesu Cristess bodi? wass Inn wiþþ hiss moderr wambe All shapenn rihht att fowwerrti? & sexe da?hess ende; & Godess temmple timmbredd wass, & all fullbrohht till ende, Wiþþinnenn ?eress fowwerrti? & ?ét wiþþinnenn sexe; & tale off sexe & fowwerrti? Wass þurrh Adam bitacnedd, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd her, Loc ?iff þút unnderrstanndesst. & forr þatt Drihhtin wisste wel Þatt Adam shollde gilltenn, & shollde wurrþenn worrpenn út Off Paradysess riche Inntill þiss middellærd, tatt iss O fowwre daless dæledd, Forrþi namm Godd, tatt witt tu wel, Þe firrste stafess alle Út off þa namess þatt he fand Uppo þa fowwre daless, & sette uppo þe firrste mann Hiss name off alle fowwre; Forr þatt hiss stren all shollde ben Todrifenn & toske??redd, Inn all þiss middellærd tatt iss O fowwre daless dæledd. Æstdale off all þiss werelld iss Anatole ?ehatenn, & off þatt name toc Drihhtin An staff Allfa ?ehatenn, To timmbrenn till þe firrste mann Hiss name off stafess fowwre. Wesstdale off all þiss werelld iss Dysiss bi name nemmnedd, & off þatt name toc Drihhtin An staff Dellta ?ehatenn, To timmbrenn till þe firrste mann Hiss name off stafess fowwre. Norrþdale off all þiss werelld iss Arrctoss bi name nemmnedd, & off þatt name toc Drihhtin An staff Allfa ?ehatenn, To timmbrenn till þe firrste mann Hiss name off stafess fowwre. Suþdale off all þiss werelld iss Mysimmbrión ?ehatenn, & off þatt name toc Drihhtin, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, An staff þatt iss ?ehatenn MY Affterr Gricclandess spæche, To timmbrenn till þe firrste mann Hiss name off stafess fowwre. Her hafe I nu biforenn ?uw Þa fowwre stafess nemmnedd Þatt Drihhtin þurrh himm sellfenn toc, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd, Út off þa namess þatt he fand Uppo þa fowwre daless, Þatt lukenn all þiss middellærd Wiþþinnenn þe??re wengess. Þe firrste staff iss nemmnedd A Onn ure Latin spæche; Þatt oþerr staff iss nemmnedd DE; Þe þridde iss A ?ehatenn; Þe ferþe staff iss nemmnedd EMM Onn ure Latin spæche. & ?iff þatt tu cannst spelldrenn hemm, Adám þu findesst spelldredd, Þe name off þallre firrste mann Þatt shapenn wass off erþe, Þatt name þatt himm ?ifenn wass Þurrh Drihhtin, forr to tacnenn, Þatt all hiss offspring shollde ben Todrifenn & toske??redd Inn all þiss middellærd tatt iss O fowwre daless dæledd. & forr þatt all Adamess stren Todrifenn wass & ske??redd Inntill þiss wide middellærd & inntill alle landess, & e??whær unnderr hæþenndom & e??whær unnderr sinness, & i þe laþe gastess hannd & all inn hise walde, Forrþi comm Crist to wurrþenn mann Off Adam & off Eve, Forr þatt he wollde Adamess kinn Útlesenn fra þe defell, & gaddrenn himm an hali? follc Off alle kinne lede, & turrnenn hemm till Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe, To winnenn þurrh hiss hellpe & hald To brukenn heffness blisse. Þe Goddspellwrihhte Sannt Johan Her se??þ þatt Cristess posstless, Affterr þatt Crist wass risenn upp Þe þridde da?? off dæþe, Wel unnderrstodenn þa þatt word Þatt Crist himm sellf her se??de, Þatt he þe temmple mihhte wel Binnenn þre da?hess re??senn, ?iff þatt te Judewisske follc Itt haffden all unnbundenn. Þiss hall?he Goddspellwrihhte se??þ Þatt Cristess hall?he posstless, Affterr þatt Crist wass risenn upp Þe þridde da?? off dæþe, Wel unnderrstodenn þa þatt word, Þatt Crist itt off himm sellfenn All haffde se??d, off þatt he dæþ Forr mannkinn þolenn wollde, & off þatt he þe þridde da?? Off dæþe wollde risenn. Forr, affterr þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass risenn upp off dæþe, Þe posstless tokenn innwarrdli? To lefenn & to trowwenn All þatt, tatt cwiddedd wass off Crist & off hiss dæþ o rode, Þurrh þatt itt ?aff hemm Hali? Gast To sen & tunnderrstanndenn. & Crist wass o þe Passkeda?? I ?errsalæmess chesstre, & wrohhte þær biforr þe follc Wel f?le miccle tacness, Forr þatt he wollde turrnenn hemm Inntill þe rihhte we??e, Till fulluhht & till Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe. & f?le off þa þatt sæ?henn þær Þa tacness þatt he wrohhte Bigunnenn sone anan onn himm To lefenn & to trowwenn, Acc nohht wiþþ innwarrd herrte ?ét, Ne nohht wiþþ fulle trowwþe, Acc útterrlike, & swa þatt te?? Himm mihhtenn wel forrwerrpenn, ?iff þatt te?? sæ?henn ohht onn himm To fri??enn & to tælenn. & Jesu Crist wel unnderrstod All þe??re wicke trowwþe, & droh himm frawarrd hemm forrþi, & lét lihhtli? þæroffe, All swa summ itt wass litell wurrþ Till þe??re sawle nede. Forr Godd himm shæweþþ towarrd te A?? o þatt illke wise, Þatt tu þe shæwesst towarrd himm I þohht, i word, i dede. ?iff þu wiþþ herrte lufesst Godd, Godd lufeþþ þe wiþþ herrte; & ?iff þu litell lufesst Godd, Þa lufeþþ þe Godd litell; & ?iff þu litell dost forr Godd, Godd ah þe litell mede. & nollde nohht te Laferrd Crist Himm don i þe??re walde, Ne lætenn kiþþeli? wiþþ hemm Forr þe??re wake trowwþe, Forr þatt he cnew hemm alle wel, & alle þe??re þohhtess, & forr þatt himm nass rihht na ned Þatt ani? mann himm shollde Ohht awwnenn off all þatt, tatt wass All dærne i manness herrte; Forr all þatt wass inn iwhillc mann He sahh, & cnew, & cuþe. Þiss hall?he Goddspellwrihhte se??þ O þiss Goddspelless lare, Þatt Jesu Crist ne wollde nohht Himm don i þe??re walde, & nohht forrþi þatt Crist wass ohht Forrdredd off þe??re strenncþe, He þatt wass allre shaffte Godd Þatt all þe werelld weldeþþ, Acc forr þatt te??re trowwþe wass Swa-þatt itt shollde tacnenn Þatt follkess Crisstenndom, þatt iss Primmse??denn & nohht fullhtnedd. Forr þurrh þatt Crist ne wollde nohht Himm don i þe??re walde, Þærþurrh wass tacnedd hemm & uss & all Crisstene lede, Þatt tu ne mahht nohht husledd ben Wiþþ Godess wille & lefe Þohh þatt tu be primmse??nedd rihht, ?iff þatt tu narrt nohht fullhtnedd. & swa summ Crist ne wollde nohht Himm don i þe??re walde, All swa ne wile he nohht himm don ?ét i þatt manness walde, Þatt iss primmse??nedd & nohht ?ét Upponn hiss name fullhtnedd. Ne doþ himm nohht te Laferrd Crist ?ét i þatt manness walde, Forr he ne mót nohht Cristess flæsh Ne Cristess blod onnfanngenn, Bút iff þatt he be la?heli? O Cristess name fullhtnedd. Off swillke þatt hemm turrndenn swa Hallflinngess to þe Laferrd, Off swillke wærenn alle þa Þatt himm lihhtli? forrwurrpenn Þær þær he se??de þuss till hemm; Ne ma?? nan mann ben borr?henn Þatt off mi flæsh, & off mi blod Ner eteþþ ne, ne drinnkeþþ; Forr sone anan summ þe?? þatt word Herrdenn off Cristess tunge, Þe?? se??denn þuss bitwenenn hemm, Harrd iss þiss word to fillenn, Niss nan mann þatt ma?? foll?henn himm Ne don affterr hiss lare. & ta þe?? wenndenn hemm awe?? Fra Crist well fele off swillke, & all forrsokenn forr þatt word Hiss lare, & himm to foll?henn, Forr þatt te?? nærenn nohht off þa Þatt shollden winnenn heffne. Þe Goddspellwrihhte Sannt Johan Her se??þ þatt ure Laferrd All wisste whatt wass i þe mann, & doþ uss tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt Crist wass wiss Allmahhti? Godd Þatt alle þinge wisste, & wát all whatt iss i þe mann & i þe manness herrte, Bett tann þe mann himm sellf watt whatt Iss inn hiss a?henn herrte. & Godd Allmahhti? gife uss swa To clennsenn uss o life, Þatt Crist ne finde nohht inn uss Off all þatt he forrbedeþþ. Amæn; SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXV. Erat homo ex Phariseis Nichodemus nomine princeps Judeorum. An mann amang Judisskenn þed Wass Nicodem ?ehatenn, Off þatt Farisewisshe follc Þatt læredd wass o boke, An allderrmann, an hæfedd mann Inn Issraæle þede, To lærenn & to spellenn hemm, To wissenn & to ?emenn. & he comm onn an nahht till Crist, Forr þatt he wollde lernenn All stilleli? summwhatt att himm Off hiss goddcunnde lare. & tuss he toc forrþrihht anan To mælenn wiþþ þe Laferrd; Ma??stre,—we witenn sikerrli? Þatt tu þurrh Godess wille & all o Godess hallfe arrt sennd Larfaderr her to manne; Forr niss nan mann þatt wirrkenn ma?? Þa tacness þatt tu wirrkesst, Butt iff þatt Drihhtin be wiþþ himm All opennlike onn erþe. & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Himm ?aff anndswere & se??de; To fulle soþ I segge þe, Þatt niss nan mann onn erþe Þatt mu?he Godess riche sen Butt he be borenn twi?ess. & Nicodem ?aff sone þuss Anndswere till þe Laferrd; Hu ma?? ald mann ben borenn efft Onn elde off moderr wambe? Ma?? ani? ald mann cumenn efft Inntill hiss moderr wambe, To wurrþenn borenn to þiss lif Efftsoness off hiss moderr? & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Himm ?aff annswere & se??de; To fulle soþ I segge þe, Loc ?iff þu willt itt trowwenn, Þatt niss nan mann þatt cumenn ma?? Upp inntill Godess riche, Butt iff he be rihht la?heli? Efft borenn her onn erþe, Off waterr & off Hali? Gast Wiþþ all þe rihhte læfe. All þatt tatt borenn iss off flæsh Iss flæsh & flæshess kinde, & all þatt borenn iss off Gast Iss gast & gastess kinde. Ne þinnke þe na wunnderr nu Off-þatt I þe nu se??de, Þatt ?uw iss alle mikell ned To wurrþenn borenn twi?ess; Gast ?ifeþþ herrte, & wille, & mahht, Þær þær himm sellfenn likeþþ, & tu mahht herenn gastess rerd Wiþþ erþli? flæshess ære, Acc þu ne mahht nohht witenn her Þohhwheþþre o flæshli? wise, Fra wheþennwarrd gast cumeþþ forþ Ne whiderrwarrd he wendeþþ. & o þatt wise iss illc an mann Weppmann & wimmann baþe, Þatt borenn iss off Hali? Gast, Loc ?iff þút unnderrstanndesst. & Nicodem ?aff sone þuss Anndswere till þe Laferrd; Hu shall mann unnderrstanndenn þiss, Whatt gate ma?? þiss wurrþenn? & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Himm ?aff anndswere, & se??de; Whatt gate arrt tu forr ma??stre tald Inn Issraæle þede, ?iff þatt tu nohht ne cannst off þiss Þatt icc her habbe shæwedd? To fulle soþ I segge þe, We spellenn þatt we cunnenn, & tatt we sæ?henn opennli? Þærto we wittness sinndenn, & tohh swa þehh niss ?uw nohht off To t?kenn ne to trowwenn Þatt wittness, þatt we berenn forþ Off þatt we wissli? sæhenn. ?iff þatt I spacc off erþli? þing, & ?ét rihht nohht ne trowwenn, Hu shule ?e me trowwenn wel, ?iff þatt iss þatt I mæle Till ?uw off hefennlike þing, Þatt all iss dep & dærne? & niss nan mann þatt sti?heþþ upp Inntill þe burrh off heffne, Wiþþutenn himm þatt stah forr menn Off heffne dun till erþe, Þe manness Sune fuliwiss Þatt wuneþþ upp inn heffne. & all all swa se Moysæs Hof upp þe neddre i wesste, All swa bihofeþþ fuliwiss Þe manness Sune onn erþe, To wurrþenn hofenn upp mang menn Forr all mannkinne nede, Þatt wha se trowwenn shall onn himm Wel mu?he wurrþenn borr?enn. Swa lufede þe Laferrd Godd Þe werelld, tatt he sennde Hiss a?henn Sune, Allmahhti? Godd, To wurrþenn mann onn erþe, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe defless walde, Þatt wha se trowwenn shall onn himm Wel mu?he wurrþenn borr?henn; For Drihhtin Godd ne sennde nohht Hiss Sune forr to demenn Þiss werelld, acc to lesenn itt Út off þe defless walde. & wha se lefeþþ upponn himm, Þatt mann iss all unndemedd; & wha se onn himm ne trowweþþ nohht, Þatt mann iss nu??u demedd, Forrþi þatt he ne trowweþþ nohht, Swa summ himm birrde trowwenn, Uppo þatt name, þatt iss sett O Godess Sune onn erþe, Onn himm,—þatt iss off Drihhtin Godd Ankennedd Sune strenedd. Þatt iss þe dom, þatt lihht & lem Iss cumenn upponn erþe, & menn ne lufenn nohht te lihht Acc lufenn þessterrnesse, Forrþi þatt te??re dede iss all Unngod & all unnclene. Forr wha sítt iss þatt ifell doþ, He shuneþþ lihht & leme, & fleþ to cumenn to þe lihht, Þatt he ne wurrþe tæledd Þurrh þa þatt sen hiss fule lasst & hiss unnclene dede. & wha se foll?heþþ soþ & rihht Inn alle gode dedess, He cumeþþ gladdli? to þe lihht To shæwenn þatt hiss dede Iss all i Godd, & all þurrh Godd & þurrh hiss hellpe forþedd. Her endenn twa Goddspelless þuss, & uss birrþ hemm þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt te?? lærenn uss Off ure sawle nede. Þiss Nicodem þatt onn anahht Wass cumenn till þe Laferrd, Att himm to lernenn stilleli? Summwhatt off hali? lare, He wass off þa þatt turrndenn hemm To lefenn uppo Criste Son summ þe?? haffdenn herrd hiss spell & se?henn hise tacness, Þær i þe burrh off ?errsalæm Att te??re Passkemesse, Off þa þatt tokenn hemm till Crist Hallflinngess, nohht wiþþ alle, Acc swa þatt wel þe?? mihhtenn himm Efftsoness all forrwerrpenn, ?iff þatt te?? munndenn upponn himm Ohht findenn forr to tælenn; Off swillke wass þiss Nicodem Þatt comm till ure Laferrd O þessterr nahht, forr þatt wass don, Forr þatt itt shollde tacnenn, Þatt he nass nohht ?ét tanne full Off all þe rihhte trowwþe, Noff Godess laress brihhte lem, Noff rihhtwisnessess sunne; Forr whatt he nass nohht derrf inoh All opennli? to sekenn Þe Laferrd Crist biforr þe follc, To lofenn himm & wurrþenn. Forr þurrh þatt tatt he se??de þuss Allræresst till þe Laferrd, Ma??stre, we w?tenn sikerrli? Þatt tu þurrh Godess wille & all o Godess hallfe arrt sennd Larfaderr her to manne, Þærþurrh he dide uss opennli? To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt he ne wisste nohht ?ét ta Þatt Crist wass Godd off heffne, Acc wennde þatt he wære an mann All full off Godess hellpe, & full off hefennlike mahht To wirrkenn miccle tacness, & full off hefennlike witt To lærenn alle þede, Alls iff he wære cumenn forþ Summ hali? patriarrke All full off hefennlike mahht, Oþþr án off þa profetess, Þatt haffdenn witt þurrh Hali? Gast Off all þatt cumenn shollde, & mahht, & hellpe, & hald off Godd To wirrkenn miccle tacness, & swa to lefenn uppo Crist Wass rihht unnorne læfe, Alls off þatt mann þatt wass ?ét blind Off hefennlike leme, Forrþi þatt he ne wass nohht ?ét O Cristess name fullhtnedd, & forrþi nisste he nohht ?ét ta Þatt Crist wass baþe onn erþe Soþ Godd off heffne, & ec soþ mann I bodi? & i sawle, Acc all þwerrt út off sinne fre, Forr Godd ne ma?? nohht gilltenn. Þiss Nicodem wass, alls uss se??þ Johan þe Goddspellwrihhte, Off þatt Farisewisshe follc Þatt læredd wass o boke. Off þa Farisewisshe menn Þatt we nu mælenn ummbe, We findenn uppo Latin boc Þatt te?? wisslike wærenn An lott off þatt Judisskenn follc Þatt læredd wass o boke. Acc þe?? þurrh modi?nesse, & ec Þurrh sinnfull gredi?nesse, Dro?henn wel mikell Godess follc Út off þe rihhte we??e. Forr all þe?? dro?henn þe??re spell Towarrd erþli? bi?æte, & Godess la?he & Godess rihht & hiss hall?he settnesse Þe?? didenn mikell fallenn dun Þurrh þe??re gredi?nesse, & hofenn þurrh hemm sellfenn upp All affterr þe??re wille Settnessess, hu mann birrde Godd & Godess la?he foll?henn, & ?edenn þuss onn?æn Drihhtin Þurrh þe??re modi?nesse. & þurrh þatt tatt te?? dro?henn a?? Affterr erþli? bi?æte, & leddenn ec well sinnfull lif O f?le kinne wise, & dro?henn mikell Godess follc Út off þe rihhte we??e, Þurrh þatt te?? settenn i þe follc Settnessess bi þe??m sellfenn. & tohh wass all þatt illke follc Farisewisshe nemmnedd, Forr þatt tatt follc a?? drohh himm upp Abufenn all þe lede, Forr all þatt follc lét tatt he wass Unnlic all oþerr lede, & skiledd út all fra þe follc Þurrh hali? lif & lare. Forr Farisew bitacneþþ uss Shædinng onn Ennglissh spæche, & forrþi wass þatt name hemm sett, Forr þatt te?? wærenn shadde, Swa summ hemm þuhhte, fra þe follc Þurrh hali? lif & lare. & off þatt follc wass Nicodem, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Acc he wass cumenn þa till Crist To betenn hise sinness, Þurrh þatt he lernenn wollde att Crist Þe lare off rihhtwisnesse, & off þe rihhte Crisstenndom, & off þe rihhte læfe. & þurrh þatt tatt he wisste wel, Swa summ himm sellf itt se??de, Þatt Crist wass cumenn all þurrh Godd Larfaderr her to manne, Þæþurrh wass séne, þatt he þa Summwhatt bigunnenn haffde To lefenn o þe Laferrd Crist Þatt wise þatt himm birrde. Forr þatt wass soþ þatt Crist wass sennd Þurrh Drihhtin Godd off heffne, To wurrþenn mann o moderr hallf Forr all mannkinne nede; & Crist wass wiss Larfaderr god & Ma??stre off all ma??stress. Þær se??de Nicodem full soþ Off Crist & off hiss come. Þiss Nicodem bitacnenn ma??, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe. Þatt lede þatt primmse??nedd iss & iss ?ét all unnfullhtnedd, & iss all, alls itt wære, ?ét I nahhtess þessterrnesse, Whil þatt itt nunnderrstanndeþþ nohht All þwerrt út wel wiþþ alle Þe depe lare off Godess boc Wiþþ all þe rihhte læfe. & forr þatt he trowwede wel, Swa summ himm sellf itt se??de, Þatt Crist wass cumenn all þurrh Godd & all o Godess hallfe, & comm þohhwheþþre o nahht till Crist Stilli? wiþþ himm to mælenn, Forrþi bitacneþþ he þatt follc Þatt lefeþþ wel o Criste, & ledeþþ þohh flæshlike lif I þæwwess & i dedess, & nohht ne darr ?ét sti?henn upp To foll?henn he?he mahhtess I gastli? lifess brihhte da??, Forr hiss flæshess unnstrenncþe, Acc foll?heþþ flæshli? lifess nahht I þæwess & i dedess, & mæleþþ wiþþ þe Laferrd Crist & herrcneþþ whatt he mæleþþ, Þurrh þatt te?? lefenn rihht o Crist & herrcnenn Cristess lare. Acc þatt niss nohht inoh till hemm To berr?henn lif & sawle, Þatt te?? hemm turrnenn towarrd Crist Wiþþ all þe rihhte læfe, ?iff þatt te?? ledenn sinnfull lif Wiþþ all þe flæshess wille. Forr þohh þu trowwe rihht o Crist, Ne mahht tu nohht ben borr?henn, ?iff þatt tu nohht ne nimesst gom To wirrkenn allmess dedess. Forr whase lefeþþ rihht o Crist & foll?heþþ alle sinness, He foll?heþþ wel þe defless sloþ, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe; Forr defell trowweþþ wel & wát Þatt Crist iss Godd off heffne, & tohh ne doþ he næfre god Þatt himm to frame turrneþþ, Forr defless wille & defless lusst Iss ifell all & æfre. Þe nahht ma?? ec bitacnenn uss All þatt stafflike lare Off Moysæsess la?heboc, & off hall?he Profetess, & off Sallmsang, þatt Nicodem Wass depe læredd onne, Þatt lare þatt wass all bisett Wiþþ nahhtess þessterrnesse Till þa, þatt ta ne sæ?henn nan Gastlike witt tæronne. Ben borr?henn att hiss ende, Butt iff he twi??ess borenn be, Firrst off hiss kinn, & siþþenn Att hall?hedd funnt off Hali? Gast Wiþþ all þe rihhte læfe; & off-þatt all þatt borenn iss Off flæsh iss flæshess kinde; & off-þatt all þatt borenn iss Off Gast iss gastess kinde; Off-hu þe mann iss wharrfedd her Fra flæsh till gastli? kinde, Þurrh þatt he takeþþ Crisstenndom Wiþþ fulluhht & wiþþ trowwþe; & off, þatt he wass sennd þurrh Godd To kiþenn Godess wille; & off, þatt menn ne tokenn nohht Wiþþ himm, ne wiþþ hiss lare; & off-þatt nan ne sti?heþþ upp Off all mannkinn till heffne Wiþþutenn himm áne þatt stah Off heffne dun till erþe; & off þatt, tatt te manness stren Forr manne nede shollde Ben hofenn upp o rodetre Wiþþutenn hise gillte, All rihht all swa se Moysæs Hof upp þe neddre i wesste; & ec off-þatt Allmahhti? Off swillc & swillc wass Nicodem Wel wurrþ to wurrþenn læredd, Forr þatt he comm wiþþ mikell lusst Summ god att Crist to lernenn. & forr þatt Crist ne wollde nohht Þatt Nicodem ne wisste, Þatt he ne shollde mu?henn nohht Ben borr?henn, þohh he mihhte Lefenn & trowwenn rihht o Crist Þurrh Cristess miccle tacness, Butt iff he wære att hali? funnt Efft borenn her onn erþe, Off waterr & off Hali? O Godess name fullhtnedd. & tatt te Laferrd se??de þuss Till Nicodem wiþþ worde; To fulle soþ I segge þe, Þatt niss nan mann onn erþe Þatt mu?he Godess riche sen Butt he be borenn twi?ess; Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Till himm wiþþ oþre wordess, Þatt mann þatt niss nohht borenn ?ét Gastlike off gastli? moderr, & all þurrh Godd off Hali? Her mahht tu sen þatt all iss an To sen Drihhtiness riche, & to ben wurrþ to cumenn upp Inntill Drihhtiness riche. & baþe fallenn inntill Crist, Forr Crist iss Godess riche Inn all þatt follc þatt foll?heþþ himm, & inn himm sellfenn baþe. Forr Crist iss wiþþ hiss hall?he follc All án inn alle gode, & wiþþ hiss follc iss Crist himm sellf Þatt hall?he kineriche, Þatt Cristess Faderr, Heffness King, Hehlike rixleþþ inne. Þatt waterr þatt iss att te funnt Blettcedd wiþþ Godess wordess, & ec wiþþ hall?hedd elesæw Þatt prestess don þærinne, Þatt clennseþþ all þe bodi? þær Off alle kinne sinness; & Godess lare off Crisstenndom & off þe rihhte læfe, Þatt clennseþþ all þe manness gast & all þe manness sawle, Þurrh þatt he takeþþ innwarrdli? Forr all þatt ani? mann iss god & cwemeþþ Godd onn erþe, All cumeþþ off þatt,—tatt hiss gast Iss clennsedd & rihht læchedd Þurrh larspell & þurrh hali? funnt, & þurrh þe rihhte læfe, & þurrh þatt he forrwerrpeþþ all Hiss flæshess fule wille, & takeþþ till wiþþ all hiss mahht Gastlike lif to foll?henn, All affterr Godess bodeword & affterr Godess lare, Þatt clennseþþ all þe sawless lusst & all þe sawless wille, To ledenn á þe bodi? rihht All affterr Godess lare. & tær iss þa þatt illke mann Unnse?hennlike wharrfedd Fra flæsh till gast, þurrh þatt tatt he Forrsakeþþ inn hiss herrte To ledenn himm fra þeþennforþ Affterr þe flæshess wille, & takeþþ till wiþþ bliþe mod Gastlike lif to ledenn. Forr whase ledeþþ flæshli? lif, Þatt mann iss flæsh onn erþe, & whase ledeþþ gastli? lif, Þatt mann iss gast onn heffne. & off þiss se??de Jesu Crist O þiss Goddspelless lare, Þatt all þatt borenn iss off flæsh Iss flæsh & flæshess kinde, & all þatt borenn iss off Gast Iss gast & gastess kinde. Forr gast iss all unnse?hennlic Biforenn flæshlic e?he, & o þatt wise iss illc an mann Þatt her iss borenn twi?ess, Þatt borenn iss off Hali? Gast, Þurrh fulluhht & þurrh læfe. Allswa ne mahht tu rihht nohht sen Þurrh flæshess e?he sihhþe, O whillke wise he wharrfedd iss Wiþþinnenn inn hiss herrte Fra flæsh till gast, þurrh þatt tatt he Forrsakeþþ & forrwerrpeþþ To ledenn himm fra þeþennforþ Affterr þe flæshess wille, & takeþþ till wiþþ bliþe mod Gastlike lif to ledenn, & ec þurrh þatt he takeþþ wel Wiþþ all þe rihhte læfe, & all forrwerrpeþþ hæþenndom & all þe defless lare. Ne nohht ne mahht tu sen onn himm Þurrh flæshess e?he sihhþe Þurrh whatt himm comm swa selili? To findenn Godess are, To cumenn till þe Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe. Amæn; SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXVI. Sic Deus dilexit mundum, et filium suum unigenitum daret. Þurrh þatt te Laferrd se??de þuss Till Nicodem wiþþ worde, Swa lufede þe Laferrd Godd Þe werelld, tatt he sennde Hiss a?henn Sune Allmahhti? Godd To wurrþenn mann onn erþe, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe deffless walde, Þatt whase trowwenn shall onn himm Wel mu?he wurrþenn borr?henn, Þærþurrh he dide Nicodem To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt he wass Godd himm sellf, off Godd, & Godess Sune ankennedd, & wurrþenn mann o moderr hallf Þurrh soþfasst herrsummnesse, Þurrh-þatt hiss Faderr haffde himm sennd & gifenn himm to manne, To þolenn dæþ o rodetre Forr all mannkinne nede, All þurrh þatt lufe & þurrh þatt lusst Þatt te?? till mannkinn haffdenn Forþ wiþþ þatt Hall?he Frofre Gast, Þatt cumeþþ off hemm baþe, All þurrh þatt lufe & þurrh þatt lusst Þatt te?? till mannkinn haffdenn, To lesenn menn off defless band & út off helle pine, Þatt whase trowwenn shollde o Crist Wel shollde wurrþenn borr?henn. Whi se??de Crist till Nicodem, Þatt Drihhtin Godd off heffne Swa lufede þiss middellærd, Þiss werelld, tatt he sennde Hiss a?henn Sune Allmahhti? Godd, To þolenn dæþ o rode, Alls iff he shollde lesenn út Þe middellærd off helle? Þurrh whatt wass heffness whel forrgarrt To dre?henn helle pine? & lifft, & land, & waterrflod, Hu wærenn þe?? forrwrohhte To dre?henn wa wiþþ mikell rihht Inn helle wiþþ þe defell? Off þise fowwre shaffte iss all Þiss middell werelld timmbredd, Off heffness whel, & off þe lifft, Off waterr, & off erþe; & i þa fowwre shafftess niss Nowwþerr,—ne lif ne sawle, Þatt mihhte gilltenn ani? gillt & addlenn helle pine. Nu birrþ uss w?tenn þatt uss iss Her þurrh þe werelld tacnedd Summ shaffte, þatt wass all forrwrohht To dre?henn helle pine. Þe werelld iss uss here sett To tacnenn mannkinn ane. & forr þatt manness bodi? iss Off all þe werelld fe?edd, Off heffness fir, & off þe lifft, Off waterr, & off erþe; & forr þatt manness sawle iss her Wel þurrh þe werelld tacnedd, Forr baþe fallenn inntill an Affterr Grickisshe spæche, Forr werelld iss nemmnedd Cossmós, Swa summ þe Grickess kiþenn, Forr þatt itt iss wurrþlike shridd Wiþþ sunne & mone & sterrness, Onn heffness whel all ummbetrin, Þurrh Godd tatt swillc itt wrohhte; & ec itt iss wurrþlike shridd, Þatt wasst tu wel to soþe, O lifft, o land, o waterrflod, Wiþþ fele kinne shaffte, & sawle iss ec wurrþlike shridd Þurrh Godd inn hire kinde, Wiþþ unndæþshildi?nesse, & ec Wiþþ witt, & wille, & minde, & forrþi nemmneþþ Drihhtin Godd Þe sawle hiss onnlicnesse, Forr þatt te?? baþe, sawle & Godd Sinndenn wiþþutenn ende, & hasenn minde, & wille, & witt, Acc nohht onn ane wise, Forr Godd itt hafeþþ a?? inn himm, & æfre & æfre itt haffde, & sawle onnfoþ att Godess hand All hire duhhti?nesse, Þær þær he shapeþþ sawle off nohht, All alls himm sellfenn likeþþ; & forrþi shall þe werelld her Bitacnenn mannkinn ane, Forr baþe fallenn inntill an, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd. Forr e??þerr iss wurrþlike shridd Acc nohht onn ane wise, & tohh iss þe??re baþre shrud Þurrh Cossmós wel bitacnedd. & forrþi mahht tu nemmnenn mann Affterr Grikkishe spæche Mycrocossmós, þatt nemmnedd iss Affterr Ennglisshe spæche Þe little werelld, all forrþi Forr þatt te manness sawle Iss shridd þurrh Godd wurrþlike & wel Wiþþ god & wurrþfull kinde, All all swa summ þiss werelld iss Wel shridd wiþþ scone shafftess. & ec þe werelld tacnenn ma?? Mannkinn all þess te bettre Þatt manness bodi? fe?edd iss & wrohht off fowwre shafftess, Off heffness fir, & off þe lifft, Off waterr, & off erþe. & forrþi shall þe werelld her Bitacnenn mannkinn ane Þatt Godess word wass sennd þurrh Godd To lesenn út off helle. & off þe manness Sune, & ec Off Godess Sune, off baþe Her se??de Crist till Nicodem All an i þise wordess, Þatt whase trowwenn shall onn himm Wel mu?he wurrþenn borr?henn. & tatt wass se??d alls iff he þuss Wiþþ openn spæche se??de, To þann comm icc off heffne dun To wurrþenn mann onn erþe, Þatt whase trowwenn shall onn me, & mine la?hess haldenn, Wel mu?he ben wurrþi wiþþ me To brukenn eche blisse. Þiss se??de Crist till Nicodem To don himm tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt he wass baþe Godd & mann, An had, tatt shollde lesenn Mannkinn off helle, & ?ifenn menn To winnenn heffness blisse. & tatt te Laferrd se??de þær Till Nicodem wiþþ worde, Þatt Drihhtin Godd ne sennde nohht Hiss Sune forr to demenn Þiss werelld, acc to lesenn itt Út off þe defless walde, Þatt se??de he forr to don himm swa To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt he wass sennd to wurrþenn mann To lesenn menn off helle, Þurrh lufe off himm sellfenn, & ec Þurrh off hiss Faderr baþe, & off þatt Hall?he Frofre Gast Þatt cumeþþ off hemm baþe, Þurrh þatt he nass nohht cumenn þa To demenn alle þede, Acc forr to berr?henn æddmodli? Þe werelld þurrh hiss are. & tatt he þær till Nicodem ?ét spacc þuss off himm sellfenn, & whase lefeþþ upponn himm Þatt mann iss all unndemedd, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Till himm wiþþ openn spæche, Þatt mann þatt trowwenn shall onn me & mine la?hess haldenn, Þatt illke mann ne beþ nohht demmd To dre?henn helle pine. & tatt he þær till Nicodem ?ét spacc þuss off himm sellfenn, & whase nile nohht onn himm Wiþþ fulle trowwþe lesenn, Þatt mann iss nu??u demmd þurrh Godd To dre?henn helle pine, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Till himm wiþþ openn spæche, Þatt mann þatt nohht ne shall onn me Wiþþ fulle trowwþe lesenn, Acc shall þurrh modi?nesse & niþ Forrwerrpenn all min lare, Þatt mann iss nu??u demmd þurrh me, To dre?henn helle pine, Forr, þurrh þatt tatt icc amm soþ Godd, I ma?? full æþe cnawenn All whillke shulenn cwemenn me & addlenn heffness blisse, & whillke shulenn me forrsen & addlenn helle pine, Off all þatt follc þatt fra þiss da?? Till Domess da?? shall wurrþenn, Forr all þatt follc þatt æfre wass & all þatt ?ét shall wurrþenn, All iss itt nu??u demmd, & sett O boc, & tald, & rimedd, Þurrh Godd, & all he seþ nu??u Whatt illc an mann shall findenn, Whatt mede illc an shall unnderrson Att Godd forr hise dedess. Forr Drihhtin hu þe dom shall gan All wát & æfre wisste, Forr Godess e?he & Godess witt All seþ, all wat, all cnaweþþ, ?a þatt tatt wass, ?a þatt tatt iss, ?a þatt tatt ?ét shall wurrþenn; & ?iff þu borr?henn best, tatt beþ All þurrh Drihhtiness are, & þurrh þatt tu þæraffterr swannc Wel wiþþ Drihhtiness hellpe. & ?iff þu borr?henn nohht ne best, Þatt beþ all þurrh þi sinne, & þurrh rihht dom þu best ta demmd To dre?henn helle pine, All affterr þatt tin addlinng iss Na lasse, ne na mare. & tatt he þær till Nicodem ?ét spacc þuss off himm sellfenn, & he, þatt nohht ne shall onn himm Trowwenn, iss nu??u demedd, Forrþi þatt he ne trowweþþ nohht, Swa summ himm birrde trowwenn, Uppo þatt name þatt iss sett O Godess Sune onn erþe, Onn himm þatt iss off Drihhtin Godd Ankennedd Sune strenedd, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Till himm wiþþ openn spæche, Whatt mann se shall forrwerrpenn all To lesenn & to trowwenn, Þatt icc amm þurrh mi Faderr sennd & sett Hælennde onn erþe, & whase shall, þurrh hete & niþ & þurrh hiss modi?nesse, Mi name þwerrt út all forrsen Þatt nemmnedd iss Hælennde, Þatt name þatt shall hælenn all Þatt æfre shall ben hæledd, Þatt name þatt shall berr?henn all Þatt æfre shall ben borr?henn Þurrh me, þatt amm off Drihhtin Godd Ankennedd Sune strenedd, Þatt amm swa strenedd, tatt icc amm All an i Goddcunndnesse Wiþþ Faderr & wiþþ Hali? Gast Wiþþutenn ord & ende, Þatt cumenn amm to chesenn me Well f?le breþre onn erþe, Þatt shulenn ?erne stanndenn inn To don mi Faderr wille, Swa þatt he shall hemm alle imæn Haldenn forr hise chilldre, & ?ifenn hemm to ben wiþþ me Arrfname off heffness riche, Þatt amm ankennedd Sune off himm All an wiþþ himm i kinde, Whatt mann se shall forrwerrpenn þiss To lesenn & to trowwenn, Þatt mann iss nu??u demmd & sett To dre?henn helle pine, Bút iff he mu?he cumenn forþ, Ær þann he ?ife hiss ende, To lesenn þatt icc amm soþ Godd & soþ Hælennde onn erþe. & tatt he þær till Nicodem ?ét spacc þuss off himm sellfenn, Þatt iss þe dom, þatt lihht & lem Iss cumenn upponn erþe, & menn ne lufenn nohht te lihht Acc lufenn þessterrnesse, Forrþi þatt te??re dede iss all Unngod & all unnclene, Þatt wass alls iff he se??de þuss Till himm wiþþ oþre wordess, All þatt tatt ani? mann shall ben Demmd inntill helle pine, All þatt shall ben, forr þatt he shall Forrho?henn & forrwerrpenn To cumenn till þe Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe, To cnawenn & to foll?henn me & upponn me to lesenn, Þatt amm soþ lihht off soþ & rihht, & off þe rihhte læfe. & forrþi shulen alle þa Þatt sinndenn menn ?ehatenn, Forr þatt te?? foll?henn þe??re flæsh Inn alle fule lusstess, & all forrwerrpenn & forrsen To don þe sawless wille, & hatenn all þatt Godd iss lef & lusenn alle unnþæwess, & lin i depe sinness a?? O fele kinne wise, Þatt sinndenn opennlike inoh Þurrh þessterrnesse tacnedd, Forrþi þatt sinness dra?henn a?? Till helless þessterrnesse, & frawarrd heffness lihht & lem Þa sawless þatt hemm foll?henn, All swa summ he þatt ifell doþ A?? fleþ fra da??ess leme, Forr himm iss laþ þatt mann himm se Inn hise fule dedess, Forrþi shall all þatt laþe flocc Ben demmd till helle pine, Forrþi þatt te??re lif iss all Bisett wiþþ þessterrnesse, Inn all þatt ifell þatt mann doþ Þurrh hæþenndom & dwilde. Biforenn þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass cumenn her to manne, Wass all þiss middell werelld full Off sinness þessterrnesse, Forrþi þatt Crist, þe werrldess lihht, Nass nohht ?ét cumenn þanne Forr to bigripenn all mannkinn Off hæþenndom & dwilde, & forr to shæwenn whatt wass god & whatt wass ifell dede, & hu mann mihhte cwemenn Godd & addlenn heffness blisse, & stanndenn ?æn þe laþe gast, & all forrbu?henn helle. & affterr þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass cumenn her to manne, Þæraffterr wass þiss middellærd Off heffness leme filledd, Þurrh þatt te Laferrd Crist himm sellf & hise Lerninngcnihhtess All whatt wass rihht, & whatt wass woh, Till alle þede kiddenn, & hu mann mihhte cwemenn Godd & addlenn heffness blisse. & fele þede modili? Wiþþstodenn, & wiþþse??denn, & all forrwurrpenn heffness lihht & hefennlike lare, Forrþi þatt hemm wass lef to ben I þe??re þessterrnesse, To foll?henn þe??re flæshess lust Inn alle kinne sinne, & forr þatt hemm wass laþ þatt lihht Þatt hemm bigrap off sinne. & sume þede tokenn wel Wiþþ hefennlike lare, & turrndenn till þe Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe, Þatt iss þatt soþe lihht & lem Þatt ledeþþ menn till heffne, & tokenn till full innwarrdli? Þurrh shriffte & þurrh dædbote To wre?henn all here a?henn woh, To wrekenn onn hemm sellfenn, Þatt te?? swa lannge inn hæþenndom Soþ Drihhtin haffdenn wraþþedd, Annd swa þe?? comenn till þe lihht, Till all þe rihhte læfe Off ure Laferrd Jesu Crist, Þatt Soþfasstnesse iss nemmnedd, Forr all þatt æfre iss soþ & rihht & god & Drihhtin cweme, & berrhless till hiss handewerrc, All-comm off Cristess are. & swa þe?? comenn till þe lihht, To shæwenn & to kiþenn Þatt te??re dede ?ede rihht, All affterr Cristess bisne, Forr alle samenn didenn an Crist sellf & te?? hemm sellfenn, Crist hemm bigrap off þe??re woh Þurrh rihhtwisnessess lare, & te?? bigr?penn þe??re woh Þurrh shriffte & þurrh dædbote, Swa þatt te?? alle didenn an Crist sellf & te?? hemm sellfenn. & swa þurrh þatt wass sene inoh Þatt te??re gode dede Wass all i Godd, & all þurrh Godd, & þurrh hiss hellpe forþedd, & swa wass filledd ta þurrh hemm I þe??re gode dede Þatt tatt te Laferrd se??de þuss Till Nicodem wiþþ worde; & whase foll?heþþ soþ & rihht Inn alle gode dedess, He cumeþþ gladdli? to þe lihht, To shæwenn þatt hiss dede Iss all i Godd, & all þurrh Godd, & þurrh hiss hellpe forþedd. & Godd Allmahhti? gife uss her, To cwemenn Crist o life Wiþþ clene þohht, wiþþ clene word, Wiþþ clene þæw & dede, Swa þatt we motenn wurrþi ben To winnenn Cristess are. Amæn; Affterr þe Pasche messeda??, For sone anan þe Laverrd Inntill þe land off Galile Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess, & whær o lande summ he comm He wrohhte miccle tacness, & talde spell amang þe follc Off þe??re sawle nede, & off þatt miccle sellþe & sel, Þatt enngleþed inn heffne Wiþþ Godd, all þurrh þe ?ife off Godd, A butenn ende brukenn. & all hiss lare & all hiss lif & all hiss hall?he dede Droh till þatt an, to turrnenn follc Inntill þe rihhte we??e, Till fulluhht, & till Crisstenndom, & till þe rihhte læfe. SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXVII. Postea venit Ihc in Judeam terram & discipuli ejus, & illic morabatur, & bapti?abat. Annd siþþenn comm þe Laferrd Crist, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Inntill Judealand himm sellf Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess, & tær bilæf he þa wiþþ hemm & toc þa þær to fullhtnenn, Nohht þurrh himm sellfenn, acc þurrh hemm All affterr þatt he tahhte. & Sannt Johan Bapptisste wass Þatt tíme, forr to fullhtnenn, Nohht ferr þær inn an endeland Þatt wass Ennón ?ehatenn; & he wass neh an casstelltun Þatt wass Salím ?ehatenn, Þær wass he þa forrþi þatt tær Well fele wattress wærenn, & swillke þatt he mihhte wel Fullhtnenn þe follc þærinne. & tiderr comm þe follc till himm, Att himm to wurrþenn fullhtnedd, Forr nass nohht Sannt Johan ?ét ta Inntill cwarrterrne worrpenn. & ta bilammp, þatt witt tu wel, Þatt hise Lerninngcnihhtess Tokenn to sannenn fasste onn?æn Þe Judewisshe lede Off Johaness fulluhht, & off Þatt fulluhht tatt te Laferrd Bigunnenn haffde amang þe follc Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess, & comenn sone till Johan Bapptisste þe??re ma??stre, & se??denn sone þuss till himm, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ; Ma??stre, þatt mann þatt wass wiþþ þe Bi?onndenn flumm i wesste, Whamm þu bar wittness to þe follc, He fullhtneþþ nu bilife, & alle turrnenn nu till himm, Hiss fulluhht tunnderrganngenn. & Sannt Johan Bapptisste hemm ?aff Annswere onn?æn & se??de; Ne ma?? nan mann onnfon nan þing, Þatt segge icc ?uw to soþe, Bút iff þatt itt himm ?ifenn be Þurrh Drihhtin upp off heffne. & ?e ?uw sellfenn berenn me God wittness þatt I se??de Till ?uw, þatt I ne wass nohht Crist, Acc þatt I wass to manne Þurrh Drihhtin sennd biforenn Crist, To ?arrkenn hise we??ess. Bridgume iss he þatt hafeþþ brid, & swa mann birrþ himm haldenn, & whase iss þatt bridgumess frend, He stannt wiþþ himm, & herrcneþþ Wel ?errne hise word, & forr hiss word He blisseþþ inn hiss herrte; Þiss blisse iss min la fuliwiss, & itt iss nu??u filledd. Ned iss, & itt bihofeþþ wel Þatt he nu forrþwarrd waxe, & ec iss ned & god off me Þatt I nu forrþwarrd wannse. Forr he þatt fra bibufenn comm Iss ane abufenn alle; He þatt off erþe cumenn iss He spekeþþ here off erþe; & he þatt comm off heffness ærd, Iss ane abusenn alle, & bereþþ wittness opennli? Off-þatt he sahh & herrde, & niss nan mann þatt kepeþþ ohht Hiss wittness tunnderrfanngenn; & wha sitt iss þatt takeþþ wiþþ Hiss wittness tunnderrfanngenn, He setteþþ merrke off þatt he wiss Iss Godd soþfasst i spæche. SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXVIII. Quem enim misit Deus verba Dei loquitur, non enim ad mensuram dat Deus Spiritum. He þatt wass hiderr sennd þurrh Godd He spekeþþ Godess wordess, Forr Godd ne ?ifeþþ nohht wiþþ mett Hiss Gastess Hall?he Frofre. Þe Faderr lufeþþ þwerrt út wel Hiss Sune onn alle wise, & hafeþþ ?ifenn himm inn hannd To weldenn alle þingess. & whase itt iss þatt lefeþþ wel Uppo þe Sune onn erþe, Þatt illke mann hafeþþ nu??u Hiss læn inn heffness blisse. & whase itt iss þatt nile nohht Uppo þe Sune trowwenn, Þatt illke mann ne shall nohht sen Þe lif off heffness blisse, Acc Godess irre iss upponn himm, & Godess rihhte wræche. Her endenn twa Goddspelless þuss & uss birrþ hemm þurrhsekenn, To lokenn whatt te?? lærenn uss Off ure sawle nede. Firrst birrþ uss lokenn whatt bihallt & whatt itt wile uss tacnenn, Þatt Crist for út off ?errsalæm Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess Inntill þe land off Galile, To shæwenn hise tacness, & tatt he for off Galile Inntill Judea siþþenn, To fullhtnenn i þatt land te follc Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess; Þiss birrþ uss lokenn allre firrst, Whatt itt uss wile tacnenn Off hellpe & hald till ure lif, & ec till ure sawle. Soþ lare se??þ þatt ?errsalæm Bitacneþþ griþess sihhþe; & ec itt se??þ þatt Galile Bitacneþþ uss flittinnge. & þurrh Judea tacnedd iss Loffsang Drihhtin to wurrþenn; & ec Judea tacneþþ uss Missdedess annd?ætinnge. & all þatt her bitacnedd iss Bilimmpeþþ wel wiþþ alle Till ure Laferrd Crist, tatt comm To wurrþenn mann onn erþe, Forr þatt he wollde turrnenn menn Inntill þe rihhte læfe, Inntill þatt sellþe þatt iss wiss Soþ griþess eche sihhþe, Swa þatt te??, þurrh hiss hellpe & hald Unnderr þe rihhte læfe, Wel sholldenn mu?henn flittenn hemm & ferrsenn fra þe defell, & fra þe werrldess lufe & lusst, & fra þe flæshess wille, To clennsenn & to bæwenn hemm Off alle þe??re sinness, Þurrh shriffte & þurrh dædbotess baþþ & ec þurrh be??ske tæress, Swa þatt te?? sholldenn mu?henn wel Unnderr þe rihhte læfe Wiþþ clene þohht & word & werrc Rihht losenn Godd & wurrþenn. Þiss comm þe Laferrd Jesu Crist To forþenn her onn erþe, Þurrh spelless & þurrh hali? lif & ec þurrh hall?he tacness, & tatt þurrh himm sellfenn, & ec Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess. & tiss wass all bitacnedd uss Þurrh þatt, tatt ure Laferrd For út off ?errsalæmess land Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess Inntill þe land off Galile, To shæwenn hise tacness, & tatt he for off Galile Inntill Judea siþþenn, To fullhtnenn i þatt land te follc Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess. Forr all þe Laferrd Cristess lif & all hiss hall?he lare, & all hiss we??e, & all hiss werrc, & all hiss hall?he bisne, & all þatt he fra land to land & ec fra tun to tune For oþerr stund bitwenenn menn Inn ure mennisscnesse, All wass itt hali? bisne & god & hefennlike takenn Off all þatt uss wass ned to don To berr?henn ure sawless. Þatt Sannt Johan wass in Ennón To fullhtnenn þær þe lede, Forrþi þatt i þatt endeland Well f?le wattress wærenn, & swillke-þatt he mihhte wel Fullhtnenn þe follc þærinne, Þatt wass inoh ge??nlike don & all wiþþ Godess wille; Forr Latin boc se??þ þatt Ennon Bitacneþþ waterrkinde, & waterrflod bitacneþþ follc, & follc he stod to fullhtnenn. & wel ma?? manness kinde ben Þurrh waterrflod bitacnedd; Forr all all swa se waterrstræm A?? fleteþþ forþ & erneþþ Towarrd te sæ wiþþ mikell sped, ?iff þatt itt nohht ne letteþþ, All swa rihht erneþþ all mannkinn Inn hiss dæþshildinesse Fra ?er to ?er, fra da?? to da??, Inntill hiss lifess ende. & ec þurrh þatt, tatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste wass to fullhtnenn Onnfasst tatt illke kasstelltun Þatt wass Salím ?ehatenn, Þær an mann haffde biggedd ær, Mellchisedæc ?ehatenn, Þatt haffde ben þær Godess prest & king þær off þatt chesstre, Þærþurrh uss dide Sannt Johan To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Wass cumenn þa to manne, To timmbrenn himm þurrh hiss fulluhht An casstell ?æn þe defell, An Crisstnedd follc þatt shollde wel Þurrh rihht god trowwþess wæpenn, Wel stanndenn ?æn þe laþe gast, Þurrh himm þatt shollde baþe Ben þe??re-prest & te??re king, To gengenn hemm wiþþ beness, Biforenn Heffness King, & ec Wiþþ Goddcunndnessess wæpenn. Forr ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Iss Prest off alle prestess, Hiss follc to þingenn wel inoh Towarrd Drihhtin off Heffne Þatt all iss an wiþþ himm, & ec Wiþþ Hali? Gast i kinde. & ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Iss King off alle kingess, To fihhtenn forr hiss hall?he follc O rode ?æn þe defell, & mahhti? king & strang inoh Inn hiss goddcunnde kinde, To tredenn all unnderr hiss fót Þe laþe gastess strenncþe. All all swillc hellpe & all se god Comm þurrh Johan Bapptisste Till all þatt follc þatt unnderrfeng Hiss fulluhht & hiss lare, Biforenn þatt te Laferrd toc To fullhtnenn & to spellenn, Alls iss to da?? till himm þatt iss Primmse??nedd & nohht fullhtnedd, To lernenn all hiss Crisstenndom & all hiss rihhte læfe. Forr all all swa se Sannt Johan Bapptisste comm to lærenn Þe follc to rihhtenn here lif Þurrh shriffte & þurrh dædbote, & all swa summ he þe??m bigrap Off alle þe??re sinness, & all swa summ he kidde þe??m Off Godess Suness come, To fullhtnenn hemm þurrh Hali?
