Þiss wrát uss upponn hiss Goddspell Johan þe Goddspellwrihhte, Forr þatt he wollde don uss wel To sen & tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt swa wass Crist soþ Godd tatt he Wass þohh soþ mann off moderr, Þatt Godd wass mann, & mann wass Godd, An had off þrinne kinde, Inn ure Laferrd Jesu Crist Þatt cumenn wass to manne, To ben bitwenenn menn & Godd, To sahhtlenn hemm & sammnenn. Forr þurrh þatt Crist wass mann wiþþ menn, & ?aff hiss lif o rode, Þær þurrh wass Adam & hiss kinn Útlesedd fra þe defell. & þurrh þatt Crist wass Godd wiþþ Godd & Godess Sune off heffne, Þær þurrh he wann att Godd tatt he Forr?aff mannkinn hiss wraþþe. & forrþi wass þe Laferrd Crist All þwerrt út full off baþe, Off millce, off are, off æddmodle??c, & ec off soþfasstnesse. Off are & millce wass he full, Þiss birrþ þe full wel trowwenn, Forr þatt tatt he wass wurrþenn mann, Þatt wass all þurrh hiss are, Forr þatt he wollde uss lesenn út Off helle þurrh hiss are. Off soþfasstnesse wass he full, Forrþi þatt he wass baþe Soþ Godd off Godd, soþ mann off mann, & haffde himm sellf wel filledd All þatt tatt cwiddedd haffde ben Off himm & off hiss come. & we þatt tokenn wel wiþþ Crist I lufe & ec i trowwþe, We lodenn alle twinne ladd Off hiss godnessess welle, Hiss are,—þatt he þurrh hiss dæþ Uss redde fra þe defell, & drohh uss till þe Crisstenndom & till þe rihhte læfe. & ?ét we lodenn tekenn þatt Off hiss godnessess welle, Hiss are,—þatt he t?kenn shall Uss alle inntill hiss riche, To brukenn resste & ro wiþþ himm Á butenn ende i blisse, ?iff þatt himm likeþþ ure lif & ure lifess ende. Forr Drihhtin sette la?heboc Þurrh Moysæn onn erþe, & þurrh þe Laferrd Crist iss sett Soþ are & soþfasstnesse. Þiss ferrs uss se??de & sette o boc Johan þe Goddspellwrihhte; & itt wass se??d alls iff he þuss Wiþþ openn spæche se??de, Att Crist we tokenn all þatt god & all þatt hald & hellpe, & all þatt witt & all þatt mahht & all þatt gode wille, Þatt æfre iss fundenn her inn uss Þurrh whatt we Drihhtin cwemenn. & tatt we lefenn rihht o Godd & lufenn himm & dredenn, & tatt we Drihhtin cnawenn rihht & þewwtenn himm tocweme, All comm uss þatt þurrh Jesu Crist. & þurrh hiss lefe come, & nohht þurrh Moysæn, ne nohht Þurrh Sannt Johan Bapptisste. Forr Moysæsess la?heboc Wass sett, forr þatt itt shollde Shæwenn þe follc all þe??re woh & alle þe??re sinness, Forr þatt te?? sholldenn mekenn hemm To sekenn till þe læche, Till Godess Sune Jesu Crist Þatt time þatt he come. & ec þe la?heboc wass sett, Forr þatt itt shollde cwiddenn Þatt Godess Sune Messyas To manne cumenn shollde, To lesenn mannkinn þurrh hiss dæþ Út off þe defless walde, Forr þatt hemm shollde þess te bett Affterr hiss come langenn, & t?kenn þess te bett wiþþ himm Þatt tíme þatt he come. & Sannt Johan Bapptisste wass Full god & Godd full cweme, & tohh nass himm nohht ?ifenn mahht To clennsenn menn off sinness, Acc himm wass ?ifenn mahht & witt To kiþenn Cristess come, Þatt shollde lesenn þurrh hiss dæþ Mannkinn út fra þe defell, & clennsenn menn wiþþ Hali? Gast Off alle kinne sinne, Þurrh fulluhht & þurrh Crisstenndom, & þurrh þe rihhte læfe. & forrþi se??de Sannt Johan Bapptisste to þe lede, Þatt he nass nohht Crist, Godess Word, Þatt cumenn wass to manne, Acc sanderrmann biforenn Crist To kiþenn Cristess come. Nan mann ne mihhte næfre sen Allmahhti? Godd onn erþe Wiþþ erþlic e?he off erþli? flæsh I þiss dæþshildi?nesse. Ankennedd Sune Jesu Crist Mannkinne sellþe & hæle, Þatt inn hiss Faderr bosemm iss He kidde, he se??de, he talde. Þiss se??de & sette o þiss Goddspell Johan þe Goddspellwrihhte, & uss birrþ lokenn whatt itt se??þ, & whatt itt uss bitacneþþ, Whatt kidde forþ, whatt talde forþ Crist Godess Sune ankennedd, Þatt inn hiss Faderr bosemm iss All an wiþþ himm i kinde. Whatt kidde he forþ, whatt talde he forþ Till hise dere þewwess, Till þa þatt tokenn wel wiþþ himm Þurrh lufe & ec þurrh trowwþe? He talde þe??m, & kidde þe??m Þurrh Hali? Gastess rune, & þurrh hiss a?henn hall?he spell & þurrh þatt te?? himm cnewenn, He talde þe??m hu mann ma?? Godd Cnawenn & sen onn erþe, Swa þatt-itt ma?? ben rihht inoh To berrhless till þe sawle. Forr nass nan mann þatt mihhte sen, Ne cnawenn, nunnderrstanndenn Þatt an Allmahhti? Godd tatt iss Þrimmnesse inn anfald kinde, Butt iff þatt Godess Sune Crist Itt dide himm tunnderrstanndenn, Þurrh Hali? Gastess hall?he run & þurrh hiss a?henn lare, Þatt wise þatt erþlike mann Ma?? gastlike unnderrstanndenn & cnawenn Drihhtin Godd & sen Wiþþ clennsedd sawless e?he; Forr nass he næfre se?henn her Þurrh erþli? flæshess e?he Þatt wise þatt himm enngless sen Inn hiss goddcunnde kinde. Whatt Abraham, whatt Moysæs, Whatt tiss & tatt profete, Ne sæ?henn þe?? nohht Drihhtin Godd Inn hiss goddcunnde kinde? Na fuli?wiss, ne sahh himm nan Wiþþ erþli? flæshess e?he, Þatt wise þatt himm enngless sen Inn hiss goddcunnde kinde. Hu shall mann unnderrstanndenn þatt Þatt writenn stannt o boke, Þatt hall?he weress sæ?henn Godd Her i þiss lif onn erþe? Þe?? sæ?henn Godd wiþþ ehne, acc nohht Inn hiss goddcunnde kinde, Acc hall?he weress sæ?henn Godd I shafftess onnlicnesse, All o þatt wise þatt Johan Bapptisste sahh wiþþ ehne Off heffne cumenn Godess Gast Inn aness cullfress like Uppo þe Laferrd Jesu Crist, Þær he stod o þe strande, Þær he wass fullhtnedd i þe flumm Att Sannt Johaness hande. & o þatt wise ma?? mann sen Soþ Godd wiþþ erþlic e?he, Þatt Godess Gast off heffne comm I firess onnlicnesse Uppo þe Laferrd Cristess hird, An da?? att unnderrn time. I fir þe?? sæ?henn Godess Gast I shafftess onnlicnesse; Ne mihhte himm nan mann elless sen Wiþþ erþli? flæshess e?he. Forr Godd & Godess a?henn Gast Inn hiss goddcunnde kinde Iss all þwerrt út unnse?hennlic Till erþlic e?he sihhþe. Profetess sæ?henn Drihhtin ec Acc all onn oþerr wise. Þe?? sæ?henn Godd unnse?hennli? Þurrh sawless gastli? sihhþe, & ec i gastli? shafftess hew, Nohht inn hiss a?henn kinde. & Godd Allmahhti? ?ife uss swa Gastlike tunnderrstanndenn, & swa to cnawenn & to sen Himm sellfenn & hiss kinde, Swa þatt we motenn alle imæn Himm sen inn heffness blisse, Þatt wise þatt himm enngless sen Inn all hiss Goddcunndnesse. Amæn; Icc hafe se??d whatt Sannt Johan Þe Goddspellwrihhte se??de Off ure Laferrd Jesu Crist, & off Johan Bapptisste; Off Crist tatt he wass wurrþenn mann To lesenn menn off helle, & off Johan þatt he wass sennd Biforenn Cristess come, To kiþenn i þe follc þatt Crist Þa shollde cumenn newenn. & tær biforenn se??de icc ec, Me mineþþ, off hemm baþe, Off ure Laferrd Jesu Crist, & off Johan Bapptisste; Off þatt te Laferrd Crist bigann, Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess, To fullhtnenn follc þurrh Hali? Gast, To clennsenn hemm off sinness, Rihht i þatt time þatt Johan Bapptisste wass to fullhtnenn, Onnfasst an kasstelltun þatt wass Salím bi name nemmnedd, & tatt wass inn an ende land Þatt wass Ennón ?ehatenn. & ec I se??de þær summ del Off þe??re Lerninngcnihhtess. I se??de þær summ del off-hu Johaness Lerninngcnihhtess Tokenn to sannenn fasste onn?æn Þe Judewisshe lede, Off Johaness fulluhht, & off Þatt fulluhht tatt te Laferrd Bigunnenn haffde amang þe follc Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess; & hu þe?? comenn till Johan Bapptisste þe??re ma??stre, To wre?enn ure Laferrd Crist Off þatt he toc to fullhtnenn; Forr þatt te?? wolldenn brinngenn niþ I Sannt Johaness herrte Onn?æn þe Laferrd Crist, acc þe?? Ne mihhtenn nohht itt forþenn. & ec I se??de þær summ del, Hu Sannt Johan Bapptisste ?aff sware off ure Laferrd Crist Till hise Lerninngcnihhtess, To don hemm tunnderrstanndenn wel Þatt Crist wass Godd off heffne, & tatt he nass himm sellf nohht Crist, Acc mann i sinne strenedd; Forr þatt he wollde cwennkenn swa Inn hise Lerninngcnihhtess All þe??re wraþþe, & hete, & niþ, Þatt te?? onn?æn þe Laferrd Haffdenn, þurrh sinne & all wiþþ woh, Off þatt he toc to fullhtnenn; Forr, ?iff þe?? wolldenn w?tenn itt, Þe?? mihhtenn unnderrstanndenn Att te??re ma??stress muþ inoh Þatt he wass sennd to fullhtnenn, To wunenn swa þe follc þærto, Forr þatt te?? sholldenn ?ernenn Affterr þe Laferrd Jesu Crist, Þatt shollde hemm l?tenn fullhtnenn Þurrh Hali? Gast inn hall?hedd funnt, To clennsenn hemm off sinness. & her icc wile tellenn forþ Off whatt bilammp þa siþþenn, Off ure Laferrd Jesu Crist, & off Johan Bapptisste. SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXX. Ihc audiens quia murmurabant Pharisei quod baptizaret. Affterr þatt ure Laferrd Crist Þe follc bigunnenn haffde To fullhtnenn i Judealand Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess, He cnew well, alls itt writeþþ uss Johan þe Goddspellwrihhte, Þatt tatt Farisewisshe follc Strang wraþþe takenn haffde ?æn himm, þatt wass att Sannt Johan Bapptisste wurrþenn fullhtnedd, & heldenn, alls hemm þuhhte wel, Wiþþ Sannt Johan Bapptisste. He wisste þatt tatt laþe follc ?æn himm wass wurrþenn boll?henn, Forr þatt te?? haffdenn herrd off himm, Þatt miccle mare genge Off Lerninngcnihhtess wass att himm Þann att Johan Bapptisste; & ec forr þatt mann haffde hemm se??d Þatt he fullhtnede lede, Forrþi þe?? haffdenn niþ wiþþ himm & sinnfull hete & wraþþe. & Crist sellf ne fullhtnede nohht, Acc hise Lerninngcnihhtess Fullhtnedenn follc inn hali? funnt, To clennsenn hemm off sinne; & forr þatt Crist itt cnew inoh & wisste itt wel wiþþ alle, Þatt tatt Farisewisshe follc ?æn himm wass wurrþenn boll?henn, He for út off Judealand Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess Inntill þe land off Galile, Forr þe??re niþ to kelenn. Herode King off Galile Wass ifell mann wiþþ alle, Þatt illke laþe Herodess stren Þatt sloh þe little barrness, Forr þatt he wollde cwellenn Crist Amang hemm, ?iff he mihhte, & forr þatt tiss Herode King Wass ifell mann wiþþ alle, & haffde t?kenn all wiþþ woh Filippess wif hiss broþerr, Johan Bapptisste wisste itt wel & itt himm oferrþuhhte, & he bigrap þe king, itt se??þ, Wiþþ derrf & openn spæche, Off all hiss ille dede, & ec Off-þatt he takenn haffde Hiss a?henn broþerr wif himm fra, ?æn Godd & all wiþþ sinne. & ta warrþ wraþ Herode King Wiþþ Sannt Johan Bapptisste, & forrþi lét he takenn himm To wrekenn hise téne, & he lét bindenn himm, itt se??þ, & i cwarrterrne werrpenn. & tatt wass forr Herodian Filippess wif hiss broþerr. Herr endeþ nu þiss Goddspel þuss, [& u]ss birþþ itt þurth sekenn, To lokenn watt itt lerneþ uss Off [ure] sawle nede. Nu birrþ uss lokenn whatt bihallt, Þatt ure Laferrd ferrde Út off Judealand anan Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess, Forrþrihht anan summ he wass warr Off, þatt te Farisewess Himm haffdenn niþ & wraþþe onn?æn All þurrh here a?henn sinne. & uss birrþ lokenn whatt bihallt, & whatt uss ma?? bitacnenn, Þatt Sannt Johan Bapptisste wass Inntill cwarrterrne worrpenn. Þa Farisewwess haffdenn skét Off Cristess dedess fra??nedd, Nohht forrþi þatt te?? wolldenn ohht Off all hiss lare foll?henn, Acc forrþi þatt te?? wolldenn himm Forrfarenn all & cwennkenn. & forrþi flæh hemm Jesu Crist, To don uss tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt Godd forrwerrpeþþ alle þa Þatt wiþþrenn himm onn?æness, Butt iff þe?? mu?henn turrnenn hemm To betenn þe??re sinne. & ec þe Laferrd Crist attflæh Forr þe to gifenn bisne, Þatt tu mihht flen & berr?henn swa Þin lif wiþþ Godess lefe, & shunenn þa þatt wilenn þe Wiþþutenn gillte cwellenn, ?iff þu ne mihht nohht habbenn ?ét God lusst, god mahht, god wille, To þolenn marrtirdom forr Crist, & forr þe r?hhte læfe. & ec þe Laferrd Crist attflæh To don þe tunnderrstanndenn, Þatt te birrþ flen þe defless hird Wiþþ þohht, wiþþ word, wiþþ dede. Forr þe birþ all forrsen & flen To foll?henn þe??re sinness; Rihht swa birrþ þe þe defless hird Forrsen & flenn wiþþ herrte, Rihht swa summ he wiþþ bodi? flæh Þa laþe Farisewess. & Crist attflæh þe defless hird Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess, & te birrþ flen þe defless hird Wiþþ alle gode þæwess, & nohht ne birrþ þe ferrsenn þe, Ne flen fra þe??m off tune, Butt iff þe?? nohht ne þolenn þe Wiþþ griþþ þin Godd to þewwtenn. Itt se??þ þatt Crist itt wisste wel & cnew itt wel wiþþ alle, Þær he wass off Judealand Inn all an oþerr ende, Þatt tatt Farisewisshe follc ?æn himm wass wurrþenn boll?henn. & Crist wass æþ to w?tenn þatt Forr Crist wát alle þingess, & Crist wát all þe manness þohht & all þe manness herrte. & forrþi wa[ss þe] Laferrd Crist Full æþ to sen & cnawenn, Þatt tatt Farisewisshe follc ?æn himm wass wurrþenn boll?henn; & he flæh off þe land forrþi Wiþþ hise Lerninngcnihhtess, Forr þatt he wollde þurrh hiss flihht Uss mikell þing bitacnenn. Forr nass he nohht forrdredd off hemm, Noff here laþe strenncþe, He-þatt wass Godess Sune, & Godd Þatt all þe werelld wrohhte, Þatt mihhte hemm alle wiþþ an word Inn helle wel bisennkenn. Acc he flæh, alls icc habbe se??d, Forr mikell þing to tacnenn, Þatt uss iss alle samenn god To lernenn & to cunnenn. Þatt tatt Farisewisshe follc Off ure Laferrd se??de, Þatt mare genge comm till himm Þann till Johan Bapptisste, Þatt se??denn þe?? þurrh h?te & niþ & þurrh full hefi? sinne, Forr þatt hemm þuhhte þatt itt wass Rihht hæþinng & nohht elless, Þatt Crist drohh þurrh hiss modi?le??c Upponn himm, alls hemm þuhhte, To fullhtnenn follc þatt himm rihht nohht Ne fell, swa summ þe?? létenn. Þuss létenn þe?? off Jesu Crist Þurrh þe??re depe sinne, & ec þurrh þatt te laþe gast Hemm all forrblendedd haffde, Swa þatt te?? nohht ne mihhtenn sen, Ne cnawenn Godd onn erþe. Þe?? se??denn ec off Jesu Crist, Þatt he fullhtnede lede; & tatt wass se??d all soþ off Crist Acc þe??t rihht nohht ne wisstenn Þatt wass all soþ, forr Jesu Crist Inn Hali? Gastess welle A?? fullhtneþþ follc, a?? bæweþþ follc Unnse?hennlike off sinness. & ec þe Laferrd Jesu Crist Fullhtnede himm sellf þatt lede, Þatt fullhtnedd wass inn Hali? funnt Þurrh hise Lerninngcnihhtess. Forr þurrh þe ?ife off Jesu Crist, & þurrh hiss namess mahhte, & þurrh hiss a?henn Hali? Gast Fullhtnedenn þe?? þe lede. & forrþi se??denn þe?? full soþ Þatt Crist fullhtnede lede, Forr all þatt fullhtnedd iss þurrh Crist All fullhtneþþ Crist to soþe, & all þatt onn hiss name iss don, All doþ he þatt to soþe. & all þatt follc þatt fullhtnedd wass Att Cristess Lerninngcnihhtess, Þe?? alle tokenn Hali? Gast, Þatt witt tu wel to soþe, Acc nohht swa forrþerrlike þohh Ne swa fullike nowwþerr, Alls ure Laferrd Cristess hird ?aff Hali? Gastess mahhte Affterr þatt Crist wass sti?henn upp Inn ure mennisscnesse, & haffde hemm sennd off Hali? Gast Unnse??enndlike strenncþe. Forr siþþenn ?æfenn þe?? þe follc All opennlike, & alle Þurrh hali? funnt, & þurrh hanndgang Off Hali? Gast swillc mahhte, Þatt alle spækenn sone anan Þe spæche off alle þede. & forrþi þatt te?? naffdenn nohht Off Hali? Gast swillc strenncþe, Biforenn þatt te Laferrd Crist Itt haffde hemm sennd off heffne, Forrþi ne ?æfe þe?? nohht ?ét Þatt tatt te?? nohht ne tokenn, Biforenn þatt te Laferrd Crist Wass sti?henn upp till heffne. Affterr þatt ure Laferrd Crist Þurrh fulluhht & þurrh lare Þær haffde off Judewisshe follc Himm chosenn ane fæwe, He for awe??, & all forrwarrp Þa laþe Farisewess, Þatt nolldenn lefenn upponn himm Ne bu?henn till hiss lare, Acc wolldenn off all þe??re boc Stafflike lare foll?henn, Þatt lare þatt ne mihhte nohht Hemm berr?henn lif, ne sawle. & Crist fór inntill Galile, Forr þatt he wollde tacnenn, Þatt whase wile borr?henn ben Himm birrþ hiss herrte [turrnen]n Till hali? bokess gastli? witt Út off stafflike lare. Forr gastli? witt off hali? boc Iss fode to þe sawle, & itt iss halsumm to þe lif Till himm þatt wel itt foll?heþþ. Þa Farisewess sæ?henn wel & wel þe?? unnderrstodenn, Þatt te??re la?he & te??re lif, Þatt lif þatt te?? þa leddenn, All full nehh munnde cwennkedd ben Þurrh Crist & þurrh hiss lare, & ec þurrh hiss fulluhht þatt wex Full swiþe, summ þe?? herrdenn, Þurrh þatt te follc sohhte þærto Att hise Lerninngcnihhtess. & ec þurrh þatt te follc toc wel Wiþþ Crist a?? mare & mare, Þærþurrh þe?? unnderrstodenn wel, Þatt te??re lare munnde & te??re la?he all endedd ben Þurrh Cristess newe lare, Þatt munnde ?ifenn gastli? witt Onn hali? bokess lare, & tæchenn follc to þewwtenn Godd All onn an oþerr wise. Þiss unnderrstodenn þe?? off Crist & dide hemm mikell ange, & forrþi tokenn þe?? till Crist Full hefi? niþ & wraþþe, Swa þatt te?? wolldenn cwellenn himm Gladdlike,—?iff þe?? mihhtenn. & siþþenn, whanne itt comm þærto Þatt ure Laferrd wollde O rode þolenn dæþ, forr uss To lesenn út off helle, Þiss laþe follc, unnfæle follc Off þise Farisewess Wass att tatt laþe raþ þatt Crist Wass na??ledd uppo rode, Forr þatt te?? haffdenn mikell niþ ?æn himm & ?æn hiss lare. SECUNDUM LUCAM XXXI. Herodes misit & tenuit Johannem, & alligavit in carcere propter Herodiadem. Herode King off Galile Toc Sannt Johan Bapptisste, & band himm wiþþ irrene band & warrp himm i cwarrterrne. & tatt wass forr Herodian Filippess wif hiss broþerr, Þatt fra Filippe ræfedd wass Þurrh hire faderr wraþþe, & gifenn till Herode King All forr Filippess tene. Þatt laþe wifess faderr wass Aréte King ?ehatenn, & he wass wurrþenn swiþe wraþ Wiþþ hiss aþumm Filippe, & toc hiss doh[hterr all] forrþi Forr wraþþe fra Filippe, & ?aff Herode King þatt wif All forr Filippess tene, Þatt tíme þatt Herode wass Unnwine wiþþ Filippe; Swa þatt he wass himm swiþe wraþ Þohh þatt he wass hiss broþerr, & toc hiss wif himm fra forrþi Full bliþeli? forr tene. & hire itt þuhhte swiþe god Þatt ?ho wass wiþþ Herode, Forrþi þatt ?ho wass ifell wif & Drihhtin all unncweme. & Sannt Johan Bapptisste comm Biforr þe King Herode, & se??de himm þuss all opennli?, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Ne birrþ þe nohht tin broþerr wiff Þuss habbenn þe to wife Whil þatt tin broþerr lifeþþ ?ét, Þu list inn hæfedd sinne. & wel itt haffde Herodias All herrd & unnderrstanndenn, Þatt Sannt Johan haffde þe king Bigripenn off hiss sinne. & ?ho warrþ sone gramm & grill ?æn Sannt Johan Bapptisste, Forr þatt he wollde hire & te king Todælenn & toshædenn. & ?ho toc wraþþe & h?te & niþ Till Sannt Johan þæroffe, & þohhte þatt ?ho shollde onn himm Wel wrekenn hire tene, & þohhte þatt ?ho wollde himm slan ?iff þatt ?hót mihhte forþenn. Acc ?hót ne mihhte forrþenn nohht Swa raþe summ ?ho wollde, Forr þatt itt ?ede off Sannt Johan All affterr Godess wille, Nohht affterr hire, forr ?ho wass Godd laþ & all unncweme; & forrþi wass ?ho wurrþ att Godd, Þurrh hire depe sinness, To don þatt dede o Sannt Johan Wiþþutenn hise wrihhte, Þatt shollde dra?henn hire dun To dre?henn helle pine, & ?ifenn himm to sti?henn upp To brukenn heffness blisse, Þurrh Cristess dom þatt all wass god & rihht onn e??þerr hallfe. Forr all iss Cristess dom rihht dom, Acc itt iss dep & dærne, & all iss sett i Cristess dom Þatt æfre iss don onn erþe, & Crist shall demenn all þatt beþ O Domess da?? to demenn. & Cristess dom iss all rihht dom & god onn alle wise, Forr Crist iss alle shaffte Godd & god inn all hiss kinde. Acc þohh swa þehh Herodyas, Þatt laþe wif, ne mihhte Nohht forþenn hire modess will Swa r?þe summ ?ho wollde, To cwellenn Godess þeww Johan, To wrekenn hire tene. Forr Drihhtin wisste whanne & hu He wollde hiss dere kemmpe Hiss mede ?eldenn hunndreddfald Forr hise gode dedess. Acc he wass t?kenn þurrh þe king, Swa summ icc habbe shæwedd, & he wass i cwarrterrne don, & bundenn pære & haldenn; & tatt wass all forr hire don, Swa summ þe Goddspell kiþeþþ, Forr ?ho wass lef þe king, & he Ne namm nan gom off sinne, & wollde cwemenn hire swa, & forþenn hire wille. & her mann unnderrstanndenn ma??, ?iff mann itt ummbeþennkeþþ, Þatt tiss Herode King wass an Full ifell mann onn erþe, Þatt haffde mikell wille & lusst To slan Johan Bapptisste, To slan þatt mann,—whamm all follc held Forr hali? mann wiþþ alle, & forr soþ Crist þatt þurrh Drihhtin To manne cumenn wære, & tokenn well wiþþ hiss fulluhht, & wiþþ hiss hall?he lare, & wiþþ hiss bisne off hali? lif Cnihhtess & publicaness, & Farisewess, modi? follc, & læredd follc & læwedd; He wass all þwerrt út ifell mann Þatt wass forrlisst to cwellenn Þatt mann, þatt all wass Godd bitahht & full off Godess wille. Þatt gillt himm wære gillt inoh To dra?h[enn] inntill helle, ?iff he forrwurrpe þwerrt út all Johaness hall?he lare, Þohh þatt he nohht ne léte himm slan Wiþþutenn hise wrihhte. Þatt kasstell-alls uss se?þ soþ boc, Wass hatenn Macherónnte Þatt Sannt Johan wass inne don, & i cwarrterrne worrpenn, Forr þatt he se??de soþ þe king Off hise depe sinness; & nass itt nohht þurrh braþþe se??d, Ne þurrh niþ, ne þurrh wraþþe, Acc itt wass se??d, forrþi þatt he Ne wollde nohht forrbu?henn To seggenn soþ biforr þe king, Þohh þatt himm shollde shetenn To þolenn forr hiss soþe word Full grimme dæþess pine. & off þiss ilke birrþ uss wel Johaness bisne foll?henn, Ne birrþ uss nohht forr e??e off dæþ Flen Godess soþ to seggenn, Forr ?iff we Godess bodeword & Godess dom forrbu?henn, Forr e??e off dæþ, to kiþenn forþ Biforenn kafe & kene, Ne sinndenn we nohht strange inoh To fihhtenn ?æn þe defell. Herode dredde Sannt Johan, Þatt se??þ þe Goddspellwrihhte, Forr þatt he wisste wel þatt he Wass hali? mann & clene, & rihhtwiss mann biforenn Godd & wis off Godess lare. & forr þatt himm wass offte se??d Off Sannt Johaness werrkess, He comm full bliþeli? till himm To lisstenn hise spelless, Þær he wass all wiþþ mikell woh Inn hiss cwarrterrne i bandess. & forr þatt Sannt Johan wass sennd Þurrh Drihhtin her to manne Biforenn Crist, rihht i þatt gast & i þatt illke mahhte Þatt Helyas proféte shall, Inn Anntecristess time, Efft cumenn forþ biforenn Crist Att Cristess lattre come, Forrþi bigrap he dirrstili? & all o Godess hallfe Herode & ec Herodian Off þe??re depe sinness, All o þatt illke wise rihht Þatt Helyas profete Bigripenn haffde dirrstili?, Whanne he wass her wiþþ manne, Acáb þe Ju SECUNDUM JOHANNEM XXXII. Venit Ihc in civitatem Samarie que dicitur Siccar.
